content: 1 These are the words､ which Moses spake unto all Israel, over the Jordan,—in the wilderness､ in the waste plain over against Suph､ between Paran and Tophel､ and Laban and Hazeroth､ and Di-zahab:
content_old: 1 These are the words､ which Moses spake unto all Israel, over the Jordan,—in the wilderness､ in the waste plain over against Suph､ between Paran and Tophel､ and Laban and Hazeroth､ and Di-zahab:

content: 2 eleven days from Horeb, by way of Mount Seir,—as far as Kadesh-barnea.
content_old: 2 eleven days from Horeb, by way of Mount Seir,—as far as Kadesh-barnea.

content: 3 And it came to pass､ in the fortieth year, in the eleventh month､ on the first of the month that Moses spake unto the sons of Israel, according to all that Yahweh had given him in charge､ for them;
content_old: 3 And it came to pass､ in the fortieth year, in the eleventh month､ on the first of the month that Moses spake unto the sons of Israel, according to all that Yahweh had given him in charge､ for them;

content: 4 after he had smitten Sihon､ king of the Amorites, who dwelt in Heshbon,—and Og, king of Bashan, who dwelt in Ashtaroth､ in Edrei:
content_old: 4 after he had smitten Sihon､ king of the Amorites, who dwelt in Heshbon,—and Og, king of Bashan, who dwelt in Ashtaroth､ in Edrei:

content: 5 over the Jordan､ in the land of Moab did Moses take in hand to expound this law､ saying:—
content_old: 5 over the Jordan､ in the land of Moab did Moses take in hand to expound this law､ saying:—

content: 6 Yahweh our God spake unto us in Horeb､ saying,— Long enough have ye dwelt in this mountain:
content_old: 6 Yahweh our God spake unto us in Horeb､ saying,— Long enough have ye dwelt in this mountain:

content: 7 Turn ye and set yourselves forward､ and enter into the hill country of the Amorites､ and into all the places near, in the plain, in the mountain､ and in the lowland､ and in the south､ and in the coast of the sea,—the land of Canaan､ and the Lebanon, as far as the great river､ the river Euphrates.
content_old: 7 Turn ye and set yourselves forward､ and enter into the hill country of the Amorites､ and into all the places near, in the plain, in the mountain､ and in the lowland､ and in the south､ and in the coast of the sea,—the land of Canaan､ and the Lebanon, as far as the great river､ the river Euphrates.

content: 8 See! I have set before you､ the land,—enter､ and possess the land, which Yahweh sware unto your fathers､ to Abraham､ to Isaac､ and to Jacob､ to give unto them, and unto their seed､ after them.
content_old: 8 See! I have set before you､ the land,—enter､ and possess the land, which Yahweh sware unto your fathers､ to Abraham､ to Isaac､ and to Jacob､ to give unto them, and unto their seed､ after them.

content: 9 So I spake unto you､ at that time､ saying,— I am unable by myself､ to carry you.
content_old: 9 So I spake unto you､ at that time､ saying,— I am unable by myself､ to carry you.

content: 10 Yahweh your God hath multiplied you,—and here ye are to-day, like the stars of the heavens､ for multitude.
content_old: 10 Yahweh your God hath multiplied you,—and here ye are to-day, like the stars of the heavens､ for multitude.

content: 11 Yahweh､ the God of your fathers be adding unto you the like of you､ a thousand times,—and bless you, as he hath spoken unto you!
content_old: 11 Yahweh､ the God of your fathers be adding unto you the like of you､ a thousand times,—and bless you, as he hath spoken unto you!

content: 12 How should I carry by myself the fatigue of you and the burden of you､ and your controversies?
content_old: 12 How should I carry by myself the fatigue of you and the burden of you､ and your controversies?

content: 13 Set forth､ for you—men wise and discerning､ and known to your tribes,—that I may appoint them to be heads over you.
content_old: 13 Set forth､ for you—men wise and discerning､ and known to your tribes,—that I may appoint them to be heads over you.

content: 14 And ye answered me,—and said, Good is the word which thou hast spoken､ to be done.
content_old: 14 And ye answered me,—and said, Good is the word which thou hast spoken､ to be done.

content: 15 So I took heads for your tribes､ wise men and known, and placed them as heads over you,—captains of thousands､ and captains of hundreds､ and captains of fifties､ and captains of tens､ and overseers for your tribes.
content_old: 15 So I took heads for your tribes､ wise men and known, and placed them as heads over you,—captains of thousands､ and captains of hundreds､ and captains of fifties､ and captains of tens､ and overseers for your tribes.

content: 16 And I charged your judges, at that time, saying,— Ye are to hear､ between your brethren､ and shall judge righteously, between each man and his brother､ and his sojourner.
content_old: 16 And I charged your judges, at that time, saying,— Ye are to hear､ between your brethren､ and shall judge righteously, between each man and his brother､ and his sojourner.

content: 17 Ye shall not take note of faces､ in judgment—so the small､ as the great shall ye hear, ye shall not shrink from the face of any man, for judgment unto God belongeth,—but the thing which is too hard for you shall ye bring near unto me､ and I will hear it.
content_old: 17 Ye shall not take note of faces､ in judgment—so the small､ as the great shall ye hear, ye shall not shrink from the face of any man, for judgment unto God belongeth,—but the thing which is too hard for you shall ye bring near unto me､ and I will hear it.

content: 18 So I commanded you､ at that time､ all the things which ye should do.
content_old: 18 So I commanded you､ at that time､ all the things which ye should do.

content: 19 And when we brake up from Horeb we came through all that great and terrible desert which ye saw､ by way of the hill-country of the Amorites, as Yahweh our God commanded us,—and we entered in as far as Kadesh-barnea.
content_old: 19 And when we brake up from Horeb we came through all that great and terrible desert which ye saw､ by way of the hill-country of the Amorites, as Yahweh our God commanded us,—and we entered in as far as Kadesh-barnea.

content: 20 Then said I unto you,— Ye are come in as far as the hill-country of the Amorites, which Yahweh our God is giving unto us.
content_old: 20 Then said I unto you,— Ye are come in as far as the hill-country of the Amorites, which Yahweh our God is giving unto us.

content: 21 See thou—Yahweh thy God hath set before thee､ the land,—go up—take possession､ as Yahweh the God of thy fathers hath spoken unto thee､ do not fear､ neither be dismayed.
content_old: 21 See thou—Yahweh thy God hath set before thee､ the land,—go up—take possession､ as Yahweh the God of thy fathers hath spoken unto thee､ do not fear､ neither be dismayed.

content: 22 And ye came near unto me､ all of you, and said— Let us send men before us, that they may search out for us､ the land,—and bring us back word, the way by which we must go up､ and the cities whereinto we must enter.
content_old: 22 And ye came near unto me､ all of you, and said— Let us send men before us, that they may search out for us､ the land,—and bring us back word, the way by which we must go up､ and the cities whereinto we must enter.

content: 23 And the thing was good in mine eyes,—so I took from among you twelve men, one man for each tribe.
content_old: 23 And the thing was good in mine eyes,—so I took from among you twelve men, one man for each tribe.

content: 24 And they turned and went up the hill-country, and entered in as far as the ravine of Eshcol､ and explored it.
content_old: 24 And they turned and went up the hill-country, and entered in as far as the ravine of Eshcol､ and explored it.

content: 25 And they took in their hand of the fruit of the country, and bare it down unto us,—and brought us back word､ and said, Good is the land, which Yahweh our God is giving unto us.
content_old: 25 And they took in their hand of the fruit of the country, and bare it down unto us,—and brought us back word､ and said, Good is the land, which Yahweh our God is giving unto us.

content: 26 Nevertheless ye were not willing to go up,—but rebelled against the bidding of Yahweh､ your God;
content_old: 26 Nevertheless ye were not willing to go up,—but rebelled against the bidding of Yahweh､ your God;

content: 27 and murmured in your tents､ and said, Because Yahweh hated us hath he brought us forth out of the land of Egypt,—to deliver us into the hand of the Amorites､ to destroy us.
content_old: 27 and murmured in your tents､ and said, Because Yahweh hated us hath he brought us forth out of the land of Egypt,—to deliver us into the hand of the Amorites､ to destroy us.

content: 28 Whither are we to go up? Our own brethren have made our heart melt､ saying— A people greater and taller than we, cities large and walled-up into the heavens,—yea､ moreover’､ sons of Anakim have we seen there.
content_old: 28 Whither are we to go up? Our own brethren have made our heart melt､ saying— A people greater and taller than we, cities large and walled-up into the heavens,—yea､ moreover’､ sons of Anakim have we seen there.

content: 29 Then I said unto you,— Ye must not tremble､ nor be afraid of them:
content_old: 29 Then I said unto you,— Ye must not tremble､ nor be afraid of them:

content: 30 Yahweh your God､ who is going before you he will fight for you,—according to all that he did with you in Egypt､ before your eyes;
content_old: 30 Yahweh your God､ who is going before you he will fight for you,—according to all that he did with you in Egypt､ before your eyes;

content: 31 also in the desert which thou hast seen, where Yahweh thy God carried thee as a man will carry his son､ throughout all the way that ye journeyed, until ye entered as far as this place.
content_old: 31 also in the desert which thou hast seen, where Yahweh thy God carried thee as a man will carry his son､ throughout all the way that ye journeyed, until ye entered as far as this place.

content: 32 But in this thing ye were putting no trust in Yahweh your God;
content_old: 32 But in this thing ye were putting no trust in Yahweh your God;

content: 33 who was going before you in the way—to search out for you a place､ where ye might encamp,—in the fire by night､ that ye might get sight of the way wherein ye should go, and in the cloud､ by day.
content_old: 33 who was going before you in the way—to search out for you a place､ where ye might encamp,—in the fire by night､ that ye might get sight of the way wherein ye should go, and in the cloud､ by day.

content: 34 And Yahweh heard the voice of your words,—and was wroth､ and sware—saying:
content_old: 34 And Yahweh heard the voice of your words,—and was wroth､ and sware—saying:

content: 35 Surely､ not one of these men, this wicked generation,—shall see the good land, which I sware to give unto your fathers:
content_old: 35 Surely､ not one of these men, this wicked generation,—shall see the good land, which I sware to give unto your fathers:

content: 36 saving Caleb､ son of Jephunneh, he shall see it, and unto him will I give the land through which he hath trodden､and unto his sons,—because he hath wholly followed Yahweh.
content_old: 36 saving Caleb､ son of Jephunneh, he shall see it, and unto him will I give the land through which he hath trodden､and unto his sons,—because he hath wholly followed Yahweh.

content: 37 Even with me did Yahweh show himself angry､ for your sakes､ saying,— Even thou shalt not enter therein.
content_old: 37 Even with me did Yahweh show himself angry､ for your sakes､ saying,— Even thou shalt not enter therein.

content: 38 Joshua son of Nun､ who standeth before thee he shall enter in thither,—him strengthen thou, for he shall cause Israel to inherit it.
content_old: 38 Joshua son of Nun､ who standeth before thee he shall enter in thither,—him strengthen thou, for he shall cause Israel to inherit it.

content: 39 And your little ones､ of whom ye said they should become a prey､ and your sons､ who to-day know not good and evil they shall enter in thither,—and unto them will I give it, and they shall possess it.
content_old: 39 And your little ones､ of whom ye said they should become a prey､ and your sons､ who to-day know not good and evil they shall enter in thither,—and unto them will I give it, and they shall possess it.

content: 40 But as for you turn ye､ for your part,—and set forward towards the desert､ by way of the Red Sea.
content_old: 40 But as for you turn ye､ for your part,—and set forward towards the desert､ by way of the Red Sea.

content: 41 Then responded ye and said unto me— We have sinned against Yahweh, We､ ourselves will go up､ and fight, according to all that Yahweh our God hath commanded us. And when ye had girded on every man his weapons of war ye foolishly went up towards the hill-country.
content_old: 41 Then responded ye and said unto me— We have sinned against Yahweh, We､ ourselves will go up､ and fight, according to all that Yahweh our God hath commanded us. And when ye had girded on every man his weapons of war ye foolishly went up towards the hill-country.

content: 42 Then said Yahweh unto me— Say unto them､ Ye shall not go up､ nor fight, for I am not in your midst,—lest ye should be smitten before your enemies.
content_old: 42 Then said Yahweh unto me— Say unto them､ Ye shall not go up､ nor fight, for I am not in your midst,—lest ye should be smitten before your enemies.

content: 43 So I spake unto you､ howbeit ye hearkened not,—but rebelled against the bidding of Yahweh, and presumptuously went up the hill-country.
content_old: 43 So I spake unto you､ howbeit ye hearkened not,—but rebelled against the bidding of Yahweh, and presumptuously went up the hill-country.

content: 44 Then came forth the Amorites who were dwelling in that country､ to meet you, and they chased you, as do bees; and struck you down in Seir､ as far as Hormah.
content_old: 44 Then came forth the Amorites who were dwelling in that country､ to meet you, and they chased you, as do bees; and struck you down in Seir､ as far as Hormah.

content: 45 So then ye returned and wept､ before Yahweh,—but Yahweh hearkened not unto your voice, nor gave ear unto you.
content_old: 45 So then ye returned and wept､ before Yahweh,—but Yahweh hearkened not unto your voice, nor gave ear unto you.

content: 1 Then turned we､ and set forward towards the desert､ by way of the Red Sea, as Yahweh, spake unto me; and we encompassed Mount Seir many days.
content_old: 1 Then turned we､ and set forward towards the desert､ by way of the Red Sea, as Yahweh, spake unto me; and we encompassed Mount Seir many days.

content: 2 And Yahweh spake unto me, saying;
content_old: 2 And Yahweh spake unto me, saying;

content: 3 Long enough have ye encompassed this mountain,—turn yourselves north､ wards.
content_old: 3 Long enough have ye encompassed this mountain,—turn yourselves north､ wards.

content: 4 And the people command thou､ saying, Ye are about to pass through the boundary of your brethren､ the sons of Esau, who are dwelling in Seir,—and should they be afraid of you take ye good heed to yourselves:
content_old: 4 And the people command thou､ saying, Ye are about to pass through the boundary of your brethren､ the sons of Esau, who are dwelling in Seir,—and should they be afraid of you take ye good heed to yourselves:

content: 5 do not engage in strife with them, for I will not give you of their land, so much as place for the tread of a foot-sole,—for as a possession to Esau have I given Mount Seir.
content_old: 5 do not engage in strife with them, for I will not give you of their land, so much as place for the tread of a foot-sole,—for as a possession to Esau have I given Mount Seir.

content: 6 Food shall ye buy of them with silver､ so shall ye eat,—yea even water shall ye buy of them with silver､ so shall ye drink.
content_old: 6 Food shall ye buy of them with silver､ so shall ye eat,—yea even water shall ye buy of them with silver､ so shall ye drink.

content: 7 For Yahweh thy God hath blessed thee､ in all the work of thy hand, he hath considered thy traversing of this great desert,—these forty years hath Yahweh thy God been with thee, thou hast lacked nothing.
content_old: 7 For Yahweh thy God hath blessed thee､ in all the work of thy hand, he hath considered thy traversing of this great desert,—these forty years hath Yahweh thy God been with thee, thou hast lacked nothing.

content: 8 So we passed on､ away from our brethren the sons of Esau､ who dwell in Seir, from the way of the waste plain, from Elath､ and from Ezion-geber,—and we turned and passed on by way of the desert of Moab.
content_old: 8 So we passed on､ away from our brethren the sons of Esau､ who dwell in Seir, from the way of the waste plain, from Elath､ and from Ezion-geber,—and we turned and passed on by way of the desert of Moab.

content: 9 And Yahweh said unto me— Do not lay siege to Moab､ nor engage in strife with them､ in battle,—for I will not give unto thee of his land､ as a possession, for unto the sons of Lot have I given Ar､ as a possession.
content_old: 9 And Yahweh said unto me— Do not lay siege to Moab､ nor engage in strife with them､ in battle,—for I will not give unto thee of his land､ as a possession, for unto the sons of Lot have I given Ar､ as a possession.

content: 10 The Emim formerly dwelt therein,—a people great and many and tall､ like the Anakim.
content_old: 10 The Emim formerly dwelt therein,—a people great and many and tall､ like the Anakim.

content: 11 Giants used they also to be accounted､ like the Anakim,—but the Moabites called them Emim.
content_old: 11 Giants used they also to be accounted､ like the Anakim,—but the Moabites called them Emim.

content: 12 And in Seir dwelt the Horim aforetime, but the sons of Esau dispossessed them､ and destroyed them from before them, and dwelt in their stead,—as did Israel unto the land of his own possession, which Yahweh had given unto them.
content_old: 12 And in Seir dwelt the Horim aforetime, but the sons of Esau dispossessed them､ and destroyed them from before them, and dwelt in their stead,—as did Israel unto the land of his own possession, which Yahweh had given unto them.

content: 13 Now arise､ and pass ye over the ravine of Zered. So we passed over the ravine of Zered.
content_old: 13 Now arise､ and pass ye over the ravine of Zered. So we passed over the ravine of Zered.

content: 14 Now the days in which we journeyed from Kadesh-barnea､ as far as where we crossed the ravine of Zered were thirty-eight years,—until all the generation of the men of war were consumed out of the midst of the camp, as Yahweh had sworn unto them.
content_old: 14 Now the days in which we journeyed from Kadesh-barnea､ as far as where we crossed the ravine of Zered were thirty-eight years,—until all the generation of the men of war were consumed out of the midst of the camp, as Yahweh had sworn unto them.

content: 15 Yea even the hand of Yahweh was against them, to destroy them out of the midst of the camp,—until they were consumed.
content_old: 15 Yea even the hand of Yahweh was against them, to destroy them out of the midst of the camp,—until they were consumed.

content: 16 So it came to pass when all the men of war were consumed､ by dying､ out of the midst of the people
content_old: 16 So it came to pass when all the men of war were consumed､ by dying､ out of the midst of the people

content: 17 then spake Yahweh unto me､ saying:
content_old: 17 then spake Yahweh unto me､ saying:

content: 18 Thou art passing､ to-day､ the boundary of Moab､ even Ar;
content_old: 18 Thou art passing､ to-day､ the boundary of Moab､ even Ar;

content: 19 so wilt thou draw near over against the sons of Ammon, do not thou besiege them､ neither engage in strife with them,—for I will not give of the land of the sons of Ammon unto thee､ as a possession, for unto the sons of Lot have I given it as a possession.
content_old: 19 so wilt thou draw near over against the sons of Ammon, do not thou besiege them､ neither engage in strife with them,—for I will not give of the land of the sons of Ammon unto thee､ as a possession, for unto the sons of Lot have I given it as a possession.

content: 20 A land of giants used that also to be accounted,—giants dwelt therein aforetime, but the Ammonites called them Zamzummim:
content_old: 20 A land of giants used that also to be accounted,—giants dwelt therein aforetime, but the Ammonites called them Zamzummim:

content: 21 a people great and many and tall､ like the Anakim,—but Yahweh destroyed them from before them, and they took their possessions､ and dwelt in their stead:
content_old: 21 a people great and many and tall､ like the Anakim,—but Yahweh destroyed them from before them, and they took their possessions､ and dwelt in their stead:

content: 22 as he did for the sons of Esau, who are dwelling in Seir,—when he destroyed the Horim from before them, and they took their possessions､ and have dwelt in their stead, even unto this day.
content_old: 22 as he did for the sons of Esau, who are dwelling in Seir,—when he destroyed the Horim from before them, and they took their possessions､ and have dwelt in their stead, even unto this day.

content: 23 The Avvim also､ who dwelt in settlements as far as Gaza Caphtorim､ who were coming forth out of Caphtor､ destroyed them､ and dwelt in their stead.
content_old: 23 The Avvim also､ who dwelt in settlements as far as Gaza Caphtorim､ who were coming forth out of Caphtor､ destroyed them､ and dwelt in their stead.

content: 24 Arise ye､ set forward､ and cross over the ravine of Arnon, see! I have given into thy hand—Sihon king of Heshbon､ the Amorite､ and his land､ begin—take possession,—and engage in strife with him in battle.
content_old: 24 Arise ye､ set forward､ and cross over the ravine of Arnon, see! I have given into thy hand—Sihon king of Heshbon､ the Amorite､ and his land､ begin—take possession,—and engage in strife with him in battle.

content: 25 This day will I begin to extend the dread of thee､ and the fear of thee､ over the face of the peoples under all the heavens,—who will hear the report of thee, then will they quake､ and writhe in pain because of thee.
content_old: 25 This day will I begin to extend the dread of thee､ and the fear of thee､ over the face of the peoples under all the heavens,—who will hear the report of thee, then will they quake､ and writhe in pain because of thee.

content: 26 So I sent messengers out of the desert of Kademoth, unto Sihon､ king of Heshbon,—with words of peace saying:
content_old: 26 So I sent messengers out of the desert of Kademoth, unto Sihon､ king of Heshbon,—with words of peace saying:

content: 27 I would pass along through thy land, by the road､ by the road will I go,—I will not turn aside､ to the right hand or to the left:
content_old: 27 I would pass along through thy land, by the road､ by the road will I go,—I will not turn aside､ to the right hand or to the left:

content: 28 Food for silver shalt thou sell me､ so will I eat, and water for silver shalt thou let me have､ so will I drink,—only I would pass through on my feet;—
content_old: 28 Food for silver shalt thou sell me､ so will I eat, and water for silver shalt thou let me have､ so will I drink,—only I would pass through on my feet;—

content: 29 as the sons of Esau､ who are dwelling in Seir､ did to me, and the Moabites､ who are dwelling in Ar,—until that I pass over the Jordan, into the land which Yahweh our God is giving unto us.
content_old: 29 as the sons of Esau､ who are dwelling in Seir､ did to me, and the Moabites､ who are dwelling in Ar,—until that I pass over the Jordan, into the land which Yahweh our God is giving unto us.

content: 30 But Sihon king of Heshbon was not willing､ to let us pass along through it,—for Yahweh thy God had suffered him to make his spirit harsh､ and his heart bold, that he might give him into thy hand—(as appeareth this day).
content_old: 30 But Sihon king of Heshbon was not willing､ to let us pass along through it,—for Yahweh thy God had suffered him to make his spirit harsh､ and his heart bold, that he might give him into thy hand—(as appeareth this day).

content: 31 Then said Yahweh unto me, See! I have begun to deliver up before thee､ Sihon and his land,—begin､ take possession, that thou mayest make a possession of his land.
content_old: 31 Then said Yahweh unto me, See! I have begun to deliver up before thee､ Sihon and his land,—begin､ take possession, that thou mayest make a possession of his land.

content: 32 So then Sihon came out to meet us､ he､ and all his people､ to give battle at Jahaz.
content_old: 32 So then Sihon came out to meet us､ he､ and all his people､ to give battle at Jahaz.

content: 33 And Yahweh our God delivered him up before us,—and we smote him､ and his sons､ and all his people.
content_old: 33 And Yahweh our God delivered him up before us,—and we smote him､ and his sons､ and all his people.

content: 34 And we captured all his cities､ at that time, and devoted to destruction every city of males, with the women､ and the little ones,—we left not remaining a survivor:
content_old: 34 And we captured all his cities､ at that time, and devoted to destruction every city of males, with the women､ and the little ones,—we left not remaining a survivor:

content: 35 only the cattle made we our prey,—and the spoil of the cities which we captured.
content_old: 35 only the cattle made we our prey,—and the spoil of the cities which we captured.

content: 36 From Aroer, which is on the edge of the ravine of Arnon､ and the city that is in the ravine､ even as far as Gilead there was not a fortress that proved too high for us,—the whole did Yahweh our God deliver up before us.
content_old: 36 From Aroer, which is on the edge of the ravine of Arnon､ and the city that is in the ravine､ even as far as Gilead there was not a fortress that proved too high for us,—the whole did Yahweh our God deliver up before us.

content: 1 Then turned we､ and went up, the way of Bashan; and Og king of Bashan came out to meet us､ he､ and all his people to give battle at Edrei.
content_old: 1 Then turned we､ and went up, the way of Bashan; and Og king of Bashan came out to meet us､ he､ and all his people to give battle at Edrei.

content: 2 And Yahweh said unto me: Do not fear him, for into thy hand have I delivered him､ and all his people､ and his land,—so then thou shalt do unto him, as thou didst unto Sihon king of the Amorites､ who was dwelling in Heshbon.
content_old: 2 And Yahweh said unto me: Do not fear him, for into thy hand have I delivered him､ and all his people､ and his land,—so then thou shalt do unto him, as thou didst unto Sihon king of the Amorites､ who was dwelling in Heshbon.

content: 3 Then did Yahweh our God deliver into our hand､ Og also､ king of Bashan､ and all his people,—so we smote him､ until there was not left remaining to him a survivor.
content_old: 3 Then did Yahweh our God deliver into our hand､ Og also､ king of Bashan､ and all his people,—so we smote him､ until there was not left remaining to him a survivor.

content: 4 And we captured all his cities､ at that time, there was no fortress､ which we took not from them,—sixty cities､ all the region of Argob, the kingdom of Og in Bashan.
content_old: 4 And we captured all his cities､ at that time, there was no fortress､ which we took not from them,—sixty cities､ all the region of Argob, the kingdom of Og in Bashan.

content: 5 All these were fortified cities､ each with a high wall､ folding gates and a bar,—besides country towns exceeding many.
content_old: 5 All these were fortified cities､ each with a high wall､ folding gates and a bar,—besides country towns exceeding many.

content: 6 And we devoted them to destruction, doing unto them as we did unto Sihon king of Heshbon,—devoting to destruction every city of males, the women､ and the little ones.
content_old: 6 And we devoted them to destruction, doing unto them as we did unto Sihon king of Heshbon,—devoting to destruction every city of males, the women､ and the little ones.

content: 7 But all the cattle､ and the spoil of the cities made we our prey.
content_old: 7 But all the cattle､ and the spoil of the cities made we our prey.

content: 8 Thus did we､ at that time､ take the land out of the hand of the two kings of the Amorites (which was over the Jordan),—from the ravine of Arnon as far as Mount Hermon.
content_old: 8 Thus did we､ at that time､ take the land out of the hand of the two kings of the Amorites (which was over the Jordan),—from the ravine of Arnon as far as Mount Hermon.

content: 9 Sidonians call Hermon､ Sirion,—but the Amorites call it Senir.
content_old: 9 Sidonians call Hermon､ Sirion,—but the Amorites call it Senir.

content: 10 All the cities of the table-land､ and all Gilead, and all Bashan,—unto Salecah､ and Edrei,—cities of the kingdom of Og､ in Bashan.
content_old: 10 All the cities of the table-land､ and all Gilead, and all Bashan,—unto Salecah､ and Edrei,—cities of the kingdom of Og､ in Bashan.

content: 11 For only Og､ king of Bashan was left remaining of the remnant of the giants, lo! his bedstead was a bedstead of iron, is not the same in Rabbath､ of the sons of Ammon? nine cubits the length thereof､ and four cubits the breadth thereof､ by the fore-arm of a man.
content_old: 11 For only Og､ king of Bashan was left remaining of the remnant of the giants, lo! his bedstead was a bedstead of iron, is not the same in Rabbath､ of the sons of Ammon? nine cubits the length thereof､ and four cubits the breadth thereof､ by the fore-arm of a man.

content: 12 And this land took we in possession at that time,—from Aroer which is by the ravine of Arnon､ and half the hill-country of Gilead and the cities thereof gave I unto the Reubenites､ and unto the Gadites;
content_old: 12 And this land took we in possession at that time,—from Aroer which is by the ravine of Arnon､ and half the hill-country of Gilead and the cities thereof gave I unto the Reubenites､ and unto the Gadites;

content: 13 but the remainder of Gilead､ and all Bashan､ the kingdom of Og gave I unto the half tribe of Manasseh,—all the region of the Argob､ with all Bashan. The same is called､ A land of giants.
content_old: 13 but the remainder of Gilead､ and all Bashan､ the kingdom of Og gave I unto the half tribe of Manasseh,—all the region of the Argob､ with all Bashan. The same is called､ A land of giants.

content: 14 Jair､ son of Manasseh took all the region of Argob, as far as the boundary of the Geshurites､ and the Maachathites,—and called them､ after his own name､ The Bashan of Havvoth-jair unto this day.
content_old: 14 Jair､ son of Manasseh took all the region of Argob, as far as the boundary of the Geshurites､ and the Maachathites,—and called them､ after his own name､ The Bashan of Havvoth-jair unto this day.

content: 15 And unto Machir gave I Gilead;
content_old: 15 And unto Machir gave I Gilead;

content: 16 And unto the Reubenites and unto the Gadites gave I—from Gilead､ even as far as the ravine of Arnon, the middle of the ravine､ and boundary,—even as far as the Jabbok ravine, the boundary of the sons of Ammon;
content_old: 16 And unto the Reubenites and unto the Gadites gave I—from Gilead､ even as far as the ravine of Arnon, the middle of the ravine､ and boundary,—even as far as the Jabbok ravine, the boundary of the sons of Ammon;

content: 17 the Waste Plain also､ and the Jordan and boundary,—from Chinnereth､ even as far as the sea of the Waste Plain､ the Salt Sea, under the slopes of Pisgah､ on the east.
content_old: 17 the Waste Plain also､ and the Jordan and boundary,—from Chinnereth､ even as far as the sea of the Waste Plain､ the Salt Sea, under the slopes of Pisgah､ on the east.

content: 18 So I commanded you､ at that time､ saying,— Yahweh your God hath given unto you this land to possess it, armed shall ye pass over before your brethren the sons of Israel､ all the sons of valour.
content_old: 18 So I commanded you､ at that time､ saying,— Yahweh your God hath given unto you this land to possess it, armed shall ye pass over before your brethren the sons of Israel､ all the sons of valour.

content: 19 Only your wives and your little ones and your cattle—I know that ye have much cattle—shall abide in your cities which I have given unto you;
content_old: 19 Only your wives and your little ones and your cattle—I know that ye have much cattle—shall abide in your cities which I have given unto you;

content: 20 until that Yahweh shall give rest unto your brethren､ as well as you, so shall they too possess the land which Yahweh your God is giving unto them､ over the Jordan,—then shall ye return､ every man unto his possession, which I have given unto you.
content_old: 20 until that Yahweh shall give rest unto your brethren､ as well as you, so shall they too possess the land which Yahweh your God is giving unto them､ over the Jordan,—then shall ye return､ every man unto his possession, which I have given unto you.

content: 21 Joshua also commanded I､ at that time､ saying,— Thine are the eyes that have seen all that Yahweh your God hath done unto those two kings, thus will Yahweh do unto all the kingdoms､ whereunto thou art passing over:
content_old: 21 Joshua also commanded I､ at that time､ saying,— Thine are the eyes that have seen all that Yahweh your God hath done unto those two kings, thus will Yahweh do unto all the kingdoms､ whereunto thou art passing over:

content: 22 ye shall not fear them,—for Yahweh your God he it is that is fighting for you.
content_old: 22 ye shall not fear them,—for Yahweh your God he it is that is fighting for you.

content: 23 Then sought I Yahweh､ at that time､ for a favour､ saying:
content_old: 23 Then sought I Yahweh､ at that time､ for a favour､ saying:

content: 24 My Lord Yahweh､ thou thyself hast begun to shew thy servant thy greatness, and thy firm hand,—as to which��� what GOD is there､ in the heavens or in the earth, that can do according to thy doings､ and according to thy mighty deeds?
content_old: 24 My Lord Yahweh､ thou thyself hast begun to shew thy servant thy greatness, and thy firm hand,—as to which��� what GOD is there､ in the heavens or in the earth, that can do according to thy doings､ and according to thy mighty deeds?

content: 25 Let me pass over､ I pray thee､ that I may see the good land that is over the Jordan,—this good mountain､ and the Lebanon.
content_old: 25 Let me pass over､ I pray thee､ that I may see the good land that is over the Jordan,—this good mountain､ and the Lebanon.

content: 26 But Yahweh had been provoked with me､ for your sakes, and hearkened not unto me,—and Yahweh said unto me､ Enough for thee! do not add a word unto me further､ in this matter.
content_old: 26 But Yahweh had been provoked with me､ for your sakes, and hearkened not unto me,—and Yahweh said unto me､ Enough for thee! do not add a word unto me further､ in this matter.

content: 27 Ascend the top of the Pisgah､ and lift up thine eyes—westward､ and northward､ and southward and eastward—and see with thine own eyes,—for thou shalt not pass over this Jordan.
content_old: 27 Ascend the top of the Pisgah､ and lift up thine eyes—westward､ and northward､ and southward and eastward—and see with thine own eyes,—for thou shalt not pass over this Jordan.

content: 28 But command thou Joshua､ and confirm him and embolden him,—for he shall pass over before this people, and he shall cause them to inherit the land､ which thou shalt see.
content_old: 28 But command thou Joshua､ and confirm him and embolden him,—for he shall pass over before this people, and he shall cause them to inherit the land､ which thou shalt see.

content: 1 Now therefore､ O Israel､ hearken thou unto the statutes､ and unto the regulations, which I am teaching you､ to do them,—to the end ye may live､ and enter､ and possess the land, which Yahweh､ the God of your fathers is giving unto you.
content_old: 1 Now therefore､ O Israel､ hearken thou unto the statutes､ and unto the regulations, which I am teaching you､ to do them,—to the end ye may live､ and enter､ and possess the land, which Yahweh､ the God of your fathers is giving unto you.

content: 2 Ye shall not add unto the word which I am commanding you, neither shall ye take away therefrom,—that ye may keep the commandments of Yahweh your God, which I am commanding you.
content_old: 2 Ye shall not add unto the word which I am commanding you, neither shall ye take away therefrom,—that ye may keep the commandments of Yahweh your God, which I am commanding you.

content: 3 Yours are the eyes that have seen what Yahweh did in Baal-peor, for every man who went after Baal-peor did Yahweh thy God destroy out of thy midst;
content_old: 3 Yours are the eyes that have seen what Yahweh did in Baal-peor, for every man who went after Baal-peor did Yahweh thy God destroy out of thy midst;

content: 4 but ye who kept on cleaving unto Yahweh your God alive are ye all to-day.
content_old: 4 but ye who kept on cleaving unto Yahweh your God alive are ye all to-day.

content: 5 See! I have taught you statutes､ and regulations, as Yahweh my God commanded me,—that ye should do so, in the midst of the land whereinto ye are entering to possess it.
content_old: 5 See! I have taught you statutes､ and regulations, as Yahweh my God commanded me,—that ye should do so, in the midst of the land whereinto ye are entering to possess it.

content: 6 Therefore shall ye observe､ and do them, for that will be your wisdom､ and discernment, in the eyes of the peoples,—who will hear all these statutes, and will say— Nevertheless a people wise and discerning is this great nation.
content_old: 6 Therefore shall ye observe､ and do them, for that will be your wisdom､ and discernment, in the eyes of the peoples,—who will hear all these statutes, and will say— Nevertheless a people wise and discerning is this great nation.

content: 7 For what great nation is there which hath gods nigh unto it,—like Yahweh our God, whensoever we have cried out unto him?
content_old: 7 For what great nation is there which hath gods nigh unto it,—like Yahweh our God, whensoever we have cried out unto him?

content: 8 Or what great nation which hath righteous statutes and regulations､ like all this law, which I am setting before you､ to-day?
content_old: 8 Or what great nation which hath righteous statutes and regulations､ like all this law, which I am setting before you､ to-day?

content: 9 Only take thou heed to thyself､ and keep thy soul diligently､ so that thou forget not the things which thine own eyes have seen､ and so that they go not out of thy heart, all the days of thy life,—but thou shalt make them known unto thy sons､ and unto thy sons’ sons:—
content_old: 9 Only take thou heed to thyself､ and keep thy soul diligently､ so that thou forget not the things which thine own eyes have seen､ and so that they go not out of thy heart, all the days of thy life,—but thou shalt make them known unto thy sons､ and unto thy sons’ sons:—

content: 10 What day thou didst stand before Yahweh thy God､ in Horeb, when Yahweh said unto me, Gather unto me the people, that I may let them hear my words,—which they must learn､ that they may revere me､ all the days which they are living upon the soil, their children also must they teach.
content_old: 10 What day thou didst stand before Yahweh thy God､ in Horeb, when Yahweh said unto me, Gather unto me the people, that I may let them hear my words,—which they must learn､ that they may revere me､ all the days which they are living upon the soil, their children also must they teach.

content: 11 So ye drew near and stood､ under the mountain. Now the mountain was burning with fire､ up to the midst of the heavens,—darkness､ cloud､ and thick gloom.
content_old: 11 So ye drew near and stood､ under the mountain. Now the mountain was burning with fire､ up to the midst of the heavens,—darkness､ cloud､ and thick gloom.

content: 12 Then spake Yahweh unto you､ out of the midst of the fire,—a voice of words ye were hearing, no form were ye seeing､ there was only a voice.
content_old: 12 Then spake Yahweh unto you､ out of the midst of the fire,—a voice of words ye were hearing, no form were ye seeing､ there was only a voice.

content: 13 Then declared he unto you his covenant､ which he commanded you to do, the ten words,—and wrote them upon two tables of stone.
content_old: 13 Then declared he unto you his covenant､ which he commanded you to do, the ten words,—and wrote them upon two tables of stone.

content: 14 And unto me gave Yahweh command､ at that time, to teach you､ statutes and regulations,—that ye should do them, in the land whereinto ye are passing over､ to possess it.
content_old: 14 And unto me gave Yahweh command､ at that time, to teach you､ statutes and regulations,—that ye should do them, in the land whereinto ye are passing over､ to possess it.

content: 15 Ye must take diligent heed､ therefore､ unto your own souls,—for ye saw no manner of form, on the day Yahweh spake unto you in Horeb､ out of the midst of the fire;
content_old: 15 Ye must take diligent heed､ therefore､ unto your own souls,—for ye saw no manner of form, on the day Yahweh spake unto you in Horeb､ out of the midst of the fire;

content: 16 lest ye should break faith, and make you an image､ a form of any likeness,—a model of male or female;
content_old: 16 lest ye should break faith, and make you an image､ a form of any likeness,—a model of male or female;

content: 17 a model of any beast､ that is in the earth,—a model of any winged bird､ that flieth in the heavens;
content_old: 17 a model of any beast､ that is in the earth,—a model of any winged bird､ that flieth in the heavens;

content: 18 a model of any thing that creepeth on the ground,—a model of any fish that is in the waters beneath the earth;
content_old: 18 a model of any thing that creepeth on the ground,—a model of any fish that is in the waters beneath the earth;

content: 19 or lest thou shouldest lift up thine eyes towards the heavens､ and see the sun､ and the moon､ and the stars—all the host of the heavens, and shouldest be seduced､ and shouldest bow thyself down to them､ and be led to serve them,—the which Yahweh thy God hath assigned unto all the peoples under all the heavens;
content_old: 19 or lest thou shouldest lift up thine eyes towards the heavens､ and see the sun､ and the moon､ and the stars—all the host of the heavens, and shouldest be seduced､ and shouldest bow thyself down to them､ and be led to serve them,—the which Yahweh thy God hath assigned unto all the peoples under all the heavens;

content: 20 whereas you hath Yahweh taken, and brought you forth out of a smelting-pot of iron､ out of Egypt,—that ye might become his own inherited people､ as at this day.
content_old: 20 whereas you hath Yahweh taken, and brought you forth out of a smelting-pot of iron､ out of Egypt,—that ye might become his own inherited people､ as at this day.

content: 21 But Yahweh shewed himself angry with me､ for your sakes,—and sware､ that I should not pass over the Jordan, and that I should not enter into the good land, which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee､ as an inheritance;
content_old: 21 But Yahweh shewed himself angry with me､ for your sakes,—and sware､ that I should not pass over the Jordan, and that I should not enter into the good land, which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee､ as an inheritance;

content: 22 for I am about to die in this land, I am not to pass over the Jordan,—but ye are to pass over, and possess this good land.
content_old: 22 for I am about to die in this land, I am not to pass over the Jordan,—but ye are to pass over, and possess this good land.

content: 23 Take heed to yourselves､ lest ye forget the covenant of Yahweh your God, which he hath solemnised with you,—and so make for yourselves an image､ the form of anything, the which Yahweh thy God hath forbidden thee;
content_old: 23 Take heed to yourselves､ lest ye forget the covenant of Yahweh your God, which he hath solemnised with you,—and so make for yourselves an image､ the form of anything, the which Yahweh thy God hath forbidden thee;

content: 24 seeing that as for Yahweh thy God a consuming fire he is,—a jealous GOD.
content_old: 24 seeing that as for Yahweh thy God a consuming fire he is,—a jealous GOD.

content: 25 When thou shalt beget sons､ and sons’ sons, and become careless in the land､ and break faith､ and make an image､ the form of any thing, and shalt do the thing that is wicked in the eyes of Yahweh thy God､ provoking him to anger
content_old: 25 When thou shalt beget sons､ and sons’ sons, and become careless in the land､ and break faith､ and make an image､ the form of any thing, and shalt do the thing that is wicked in the eyes of Yahweh thy God､ provoking him to anger

content: 26 I take both the heavens and the earth to witness against you､ to-day､ that ye shall perish speedily from off the land which ye are passing over the Jordan to possess,—ye shall not prolong your days thereupon; for ye shall surely be laid waste;
content_old: 26 I take both the heavens and the earth to witness against you､ to-day､ that ye shall perish speedily from off the land which ye are passing over the Jordan to possess,—ye shall not prolong your days thereupon; for ye shall surely be laid waste;

content: 27 and Yahweh will scatter you among the peoples,—and ye shall have left remaining of you､ men easily counted, among the nations whither Yahweh will drive you;
content_old: 27 and Yahweh will scatter you among the peoples,—and ye shall have left remaining of you､ men easily counted, among the nations whither Yahweh will drive you;

content: 28 and ye will serve､ there､ gods made by the hands of man,—wood or stone, which neither see､ nor hear､ nor eat､ nor smell.
content_old: 28 and ye will serve､ there､ gods made by the hands of man,—wood or stone, which neither see､ nor hear､ nor eat､ nor smell.

content: 29 If thou shalt seek from thence､ Yahweh thy God then shalt thou find him,—when thou shalt search after him with all thy heart､ and with all thy soul.
content_old: 29 If thou shalt seek from thence､ Yahweh thy God then shalt thou find him,—when thou shalt search after him with all thy heart､ and with all thy soul.

content: 30 In thy distress, when all these things have found thee out—in the afterpart of the days thou wilt return unto Yahweh thy God, and wilt hearken to his voice.
content_old: 30 In thy distress, when all these things have found thee out—in the afterpart of the days thou wilt return unto Yahweh thy God, and wilt hearken to his voice.

content: 31 For a GOD of compassion is Yahweh thy God, he will not forsake thee､ neither will he destroy thee,—nor forget the covenant of thy fathers which he sware unto them.
content_old: 31 For a GOD of compassion is Yahweh thy God, he will not forsake thee､ neither will he destroy thee,—nor forget the covenant of thy fathers which he sware unto them.

content: 32 For ask､ I pray you､ of the former days which were before thee､ even from the day when God created man upon the earth, yea from one end of the heavens､ even to the other end of the heavens,—whether aught was ever brought to pass､ like this great thing, or was ever heard of like it:
content_old: 32 For ask､ I pray you､ of the former days which were before thee､ even from the day when God created man upon the earth, yea from one end of the heavens､ even to the other end of the heavens,—whether aught was ever brought to pass､ like this great thing, or was ever heard of like it:

content: 33 Did a people ever hear the voice of a god speaking out of the midst of fire､ as thou didst hear､ and yet live?
content_old: 33 Did a people ever hear the voice of a god speaking out of the midst of fire､ as thou didst hear､ and yet live?

content: 34 Or did a god ever make trial of entering in､ to take unto him a nation､ out of the midst of a nation, by provings､ by signs and by wonders､ and by fighting､ and by a firm hand and by a stretched-out arm, and by great terrors,—according to all that Yahweh your God did for you in Egypt､ before your eyes?､
content_old: 34 Or did a god ever make trial of entering in､ to take unto him a nation､ out of the midst of a nation, by provings､ by signs and by wonders､ and by fighting､ and by a firm hand and by a stretched-out arm, and by great terrors,—according to all that Yahweh your God did for you in Egypt､ before your eyes?､

content: 35 Thou wast allowed to see､ that thou mightest know, that Yahweh he is God, there is none other than he alone.
content_old: 35 Thou wast allowed to see､ that thou mightest know, that Yahweh he is God, there is none other than he alone.

content: 36 Out of the heavens he let thee hear his voice､ to instruct thee,—and upon the earth he let thee see his great fire, and his own words thou didst hear､ out of the midst of the fire.
content_old: 36 Out of the heavens he let thee hear his voice､ to instruct thee,—and upon the earth he let thee see his great fire, and his own words thou didst hear､ out of the midst of the fire.

content: 37 And because that he loved thy fathers therefore chose he his seed after him,—and brought thee forth､ with his presence､ with his great might､ out of Egypt;
content_old: 37 And because that he loved thy fathers therefore chose he his seed after him,—and brought thee forth､ with his presence､ with his great might､ out of Egypt;

content: 38 to dispossess nations､ greater and stronger than thou､ from before thee,—to bring thee in､ to give unto thee their land for an inheritance: As at this day.
content_old: 38 to dispossess nations､ greater and stronger than thou､ from before thee,—to bring thee in､ to give unto thee their land for an inheritance: As at this day.

content: 39 So then thou must consider to-day､ and bring it back to thy heart, that Yahweh he is God, in the heavens above､ and upon the earth beneath,—there is none other.
content_old: 39 So then thou must consider to-day､ and bring it back to thy heart, that Yahweh he is God, in the heavens above､ and upon the earth beneath,—there is none other.

content: 40 So shalt thou keep his statutes and his commandments､ which I am commanding thee､ to-day, that it may go well with thee, and with thy sons､ after thee,—and to the end thou mayest prolong thy days upon the soil, which Yahweh thy God is giving thee､ all the days.
content_old: 40 So shalt thou keep his statutes and his commandments､ which I am commanding thee､ to-day, that it may go well with thee, and with thy sons､ after thee,—and to the end thou mayest prolong thy days upon the soil, which Yahweh thy God is giving thee､ all the days.

content: 41 Then did Moses set apart three cities, over the Jordan,—towards the rising of the sun:
content_old: 41 Then did Moses set apart three cities, over the Jordan,—towards the rising of the sun:

content: 42 that the manslayer might flee thither､ who should slay his neighbour､ unawares, he not having hated him､ aforetime,—and might flee unto one of these cities､ and live:
content_old: 42 that the manslayer might flee thither､ who should slay his neighbour､ unawares, he not having hated him､ aforetime,—and might flee unto one of these cities､ and live:

content: 43 namely Bezer､ in the desert of the table-land､ for the Reubenites,—and Ramoth in Gilead､ for the Gadites, and Golan in Bashan､ for the Manassites.
content_old: 43 namely Bezer､ in the desert of the table-land､ for the Reubenites,—and Ramoth in Gilead､ for the Gadites, and Golan in Bashan､ for the Manassites.

content: 44 This then is the law which Moses set before the sons of Israel:
content_old: 44 This then is the law which Moses set before the sons of Israel:

content: 45 These are the testimonies, and the statutes､ and the regulations,—which Moses spake unto the sons of Israel､ when they came forth out of Egypt:
content_old: 45 These are the testimonies, and the statutes､ and the regulations,—which Moses spake unto the sons of Israel､ when they came forth out of Egypt:

content: 46 over the Jordan､ in the valley over against Beth-peor, in the land of Sihon king of the Amorites, who dwelt in Heshbon,—whom Moses and the sons of Israel smote, when they came forth out of Egypt:
content_old: 46 over the Jordan､ in the valley over against Beth-peor, in the land of Sihon king of the Amorites, who dwelt in Heshbon,—whom Moses and the sons of Israel smote, when they came forth out of Egypt:

content: 47 so they took possession of his land, and the land of Og king of Bashan､ the two kings of the Amorites, who were over the Jordan,—towards the rising of the sun;
content_old: 47 so they took possession of his land, and the land of Og king of Bashan､ the two kings of the Amorites, who were over the Jordan,—towards the rising of the sun;

content: 48 from Aroer which is on the edge of the ravine of Arnon､ even unto Mount Siôn､ the same is Hermon;
content_old: 48 from Aroer which is on the edge of the ravine of Arnon､ even unto Mount Siôn､ the same is Hermon;

content: 1 Then called Moses unto all Israel､ and said unto them— Hear､ O Israel､ the statutes and the regulations, which I am speaking in your ears to-day,—so shall ye learn them, and observe､ to do them.
content_old: 1 Then called Moses unto all Israel､ and said unto them— Hear､ O Israel､ the statutes and the regulations, which I am speaking in your ears to-day,—so shall ye learn them, and observe､ to do them.

content: 2 Yahweh our God solemnised with us a covenant in Horeb:
content_old: 2 Yahweh our God solemnised with us a covenant in Horeb:

content: 3 not with our fathers did Yahweh solemnise this covenant,—but with us, ourselves—these here to-day､ all of us living.
content_old: 3 not with our fathers did Yahweh solemnise this covenant,—but with us, ourselves—these here to-day､ all of us living.

content: 4 Face to face spake Yahweh with you､ in the mount､ out of the midst of the fire,
content_old: 4 Face to face spake Yahweh with you､ in the mount､ out of the midst of the fire,

content: 5 (I was standing between Yahweh and you､ at that time, to declare unto you the word of Yahweh,—for ye shrank with fear from the presence of the fire, and went not up in the mount) saying:—
content_old: 5 (I was standing between Yahweh and you､ at that time, to declare unto you the word of Yahweh,—for ye shrank with fear from the presence of the fire, and went not up in the mount) saying:—

content: 6 I am Yahweh thy God, who have brought thee forth out of the land of Egypt､ out of the house of servants:—
content_old: 6 I am Yahweh thy God, who have brought thee forth out of the land of Egypt､ out of the house of servants:—

content: 7 Thou shalt not have other gods､ besides me:
content_old: 7 Thou shalt not have other gods､ besides me:

content: 8 Thou shalt not make unto thee an image, any form that is in the heavens above, or that is in the earth beneath､ or that is in the waters beneath the earth:
content_old: 8 Thou shalt not make unto thee an image, any form that is in the heavens above, or that is in the earth beneath､ or that is in the waters beneath the earth:

content: 9 thou shalt not bow thyself down to them､ nor be led to serve them,—for I Yahweh､ thy God am a jealous GOD, visiting the iniquity of fathers upon sons､ even unto three generations and unto four､ unto them that hate me;
content_old: 9 thou shalt not bow thyself down to them､ nor be led to serve them,—for I Yahweh､ thy God am a jealous GOD, visiting the iniquity of fathers upon sons､ even unto three generations and unto four､ unto them that hate me;

content: 10 but shewing lovingkindness unto a thousand generation,—unto them who love me､ and keep my commandments:
content_old: 10 but shewing lovingkindness unto a thousand generation,—unto them who love me､ and keep my commandments:

content: 11 Thou shalt not utter the name of Yahweh thy God､ for falsehood,—for Yahweh will not let him go unpunished who uttereth his name､ for falsehood:
content_old: 11 Thou shalt not utter the name of Yahweh thy God､ for falsehood,—for Yahweh will not let him go unpunished who uttereth his name､ for falsehood:

content: 12 Observe the sabbath day､ to hallow it,—as Yahweh thy God hath commanded thee:
content_old: 12 Observe the sabbath day､ to hallow it,—as Yahweh thy God hath commanded thee:

content: 13 six days shalt thou labour､ and do all thy work;
content_old: 13 six days shalt thou labour､ and do all thy work;

content: 14 but the seventh day is a sabbath unto Yahweh thy God,—thou shalt do no work—thou､ nor thy son nor thy daughter､ nor thy servant nor thy handmaid､ nor thine ox nor thine ass､ nor any of thy cattle, nor thy sojourner who is within thy gates, that thy servant and thy handmaid may rest as well as thou.
content_old: 14 but the seventh day is a sabbath unto Yahweh thy God,—thou shalt do no work—thou､ nor thy son nor thy daughter､ nor thy servant nor thy handmaid､ nor thine ox nor thine ass､ nor any of thy cattle, nor thy sojourner who is within thy gates, that thy servant and thy handmaid may rest as well as thou.

content: 15 So shalt thou remember that a servant wast thou､ in the land of Egypt, and that Yahweh thy God brought thee forth from thence, with a firm hand､ and with a stretched-out arm,—for this cause hath Yahweh thy God commanded thee to keep the sabbath day:
content_old: 15 So shalt thou remember that a servant wast thou､ in the land of Egypt, and that Yahweh thy God brought thee forth from thence, with a firm hand､ and with a stretched-out arm,—for this cause hath Yahweh thy God commanded thee to keep the sabbath day:

content: 16 Honour thy father､ and thy mother, as Yahweh thy God hath commanded thee,—that thy days may be prolonged､ and that it may go well with thee, upon the soil which Yahweh thy God is about to give unto thee:
content_old: 16 Honour thy father､ and thy mother, as Yahweh thy God hath commanded thee,—that thy days may be prolonged､ and that it may go well with thee, upon the soil which Yahweh thy God is about to give unto thee:

content: 17 Thou shalt not commit murder:
content_old: 17 Thou shalt not commit murder:

content: 18 Neither shalt thou commit adultery:
content_old: 18 Neither shalt thou commit adultery:

content: 19 Neither shalt thou steal:
content_old: 19 Neither shalt thou steal:

content: 20 Neither shalt thou testify against thy neighbour､ with a witness of falsehood:
content_old: 20 Neither shalt thou testify against thy neighbour､ with a witness of falsehood:

content: 21 Neither shalt thou covet thy neighbour’s wife,—neither shalt thou desire thy neighbour’s house､ his field､ or his servant､ or his handmaid､ his ox or his ass､ or anything that is thy neighbour’s.
content_old: 21 Neither shalt thou covet thy neighbour’s wife,—neither shalt thou desire thy neighbour’s house､ his field､ or his servant､ or his handmaid､ his ox or his ass､ or anything that is thy neighbour’s.

content: 22 These words spake Yahweh､ unto all the convocation of you､ in the mount､ out of the midst of the fire､ the cloud､ and the thick gloom, a loud voice､ and added not,—and he wrote them upon two tables of stone, and gave them unto me.
content_old: 22 These words spake Yahweh､ unto all the convocation of you､ in the mount､ out of the midst of the fire､ the cloud､ and the thick gloom, a loud voice､ and added not,—and he wrote them upon two tables of stone, and gave them unto me.

content: 23 And it came to pass, when ye heard the voice､ out of the midst of the darkness, the mountain also burning with fire then drew ye near unto me, even all the heads of your tribes､ and your elders,
content_old: 23 And it came to pass, when ye heard the voice､ out of the midst of the darkness, the mountain also burning with fire then drew ye near unto me, even all the heads of your tribes､ and your elders,

content: 24 and ye said— Lo! Yahweh our God hath let us see his glory and his greatness, his voice also have we heard out of the midst of the fire,—this day have we seen, that God may speak with man､ who yet may live.
content_old: 24 and ye said— Lo! Yahweh our God hath let us see his glory and his greatness, his voice also have we heard out of the midst of the fire,—this day have we seen, that God may speak with man､ who yet may live.

content: 25 Now therefore､ why should we die? for this great fire will consume us,—if we ourselves hear the voice of Yahweh our God any more we shall die.
content_old: 25 Now therefore､ why should we die? for this great fire will consume us,—if we ourselves hear the voice of Yahweh our God any more we shall die.

content: 26 For who is there of all flesh､ that ever heard the voice of a Living God､ speaking out of the midst of fire､ as we､ and yet lived?
content_old: 26 For who is there of all flesh､ that ever heard the voice of a Living God､ speaking out of the midst of fire､ as we､ and yet lived?

content: 27 Go thou near､ and hear, all that Yahweh our God shall say,—so shalt thou speak unto us､ all that Yahweh our God shall speak unto thee､ and we will hear and do.
content_old: 27 Go thou near､ and hear, all that Yahweh our God shall say,—so shalt thou speak unto us､ all that Yahweh our God shall speak unto thee､ and we will hear and do.

content: 28 And Yahweh heard the voice of your words, when ye spake unto me,—and Yahweh said unto me— I have heard the voice of the words of this people､ which they have spoken unto thee, they have well said all which they have spoken.
content_old: 28 And Yahweh heard the voice of your words, when ye spake unto me,—and Yahweh said unto me— I have heard the voice of the words of this people､ which they have spoken unto thee, they have well said all which they have spoken.

content: 29 Oh that this their heart might remain in them､ to revere me､ and to keep all my commandments､ all the days,—that it might be well with them and with their sons､ unto times age-abiding.
content_old: 29 Oh that this their heart might remain in them､ to revere me､ and to keep all my commandments､ all the days,—that it might be well with them and with their sons､ unto times age-abiding.

content: 30 Go､ say unto them,— Return ye to your tents.
content_old: 30 Go､ say unto them,— Return ye to your tents.

content: 31 Thou therefore､ here stand with me and let me speak unto thee—all the commandment､ and the statutes､ and the regulations､ which thou shalt teach them,—that they may do them in the land which I am giving unto them､ to possess it.
content_old: 31 Thou therefore､ here stand with me and let me speak unto thee—all the commandment､ and the statutes､ and the regulations､ which thou shalt teach them,—that they may do them in the land which I am giving unto them､ to possess it.

content: 32 So then ye must observe to do, as Yahweh your God hath commanded you,—ye must not turn aside､ to the right hand or to the left.
content_old: 32 So then ye must observe to do, as Yahweh your God hath commanded you,—ye must not turn aside､ to the right hand or to the left.

content: 1 This then､ is the commandment､—namely the statutes and the regulations, which Yahweh your God hath commanded､ to teach you,—that ye may do them in the land whither ye are passing over to possess it:
content_old: 1 This then､ is the commandment､—namely the statutes and the regulations, which Yahweh your God hath commanded､ to teach you,—that ye may do them in the land whither ye are passing over to possess it:

content: 2 that thou mayest revere Yahweh thy God､ so as to keep all his statutes and his commandments which I am commanding thee, thou､ and thy son and thy son’s son, all the days of thy life,—and that thy days may be prolonged.
content_old: 2 that thou mayest revere Yahweh thy God､ so as to keep all his statutes and his commandments which I am commanding thee, thou､ and thy son and thy son’s son, all the days of thy life,—and that thy days may be prolonged.

content: 3 Therefore shalt thou hear､ O Israel､ and shalt observe to do, that it may be well with thee, and that ye may multiply greatly, as Yahweh the God of thy fathers hath spoken to thee, in a land flowing with milk and honey.
content_old: 3 Therefore shalt thou hear､ O Israel､ and shalt observe to do, that it may be well with thee, and that ye may multiply greatly, as Yahweh the God of thy fathers hath spoken to thee, in a land flowing with milk and honey.

content: 4 Hear, O Israel: Yahweh is our God,—Yahweh alone.
content_old: 4 Hear, O Israel: Yahweh is our God,—Yahweh alone.

content: 5 Thou shalt therefore love Yahweh thy God,—with all thy heart､ and with all thy soul､ and with all thy might;
content_old: 5 Thou shalt therefore love Yahweh thy God,—with all thy heart､ and with all thy soul､ and with all thy might;

content: 6 so shall these words､ which I am commanding thee to-day､ be upon thy heart;
content_old: 6 so shall these words､ which I am commanding thee to-day､ be upon thy heart;

content: 7 and thou shalt impress them upon thy sons, and shalt speak of them,—when thou sittest in thy house､ and when thou walkest by the way, and when thou liest down､ and when thou risest up;
content_old: 7 and thou shalt impress them upon thy sons, and shalt speak of them,—when thou sittest in thy house､ and when thou walkest by the way, and when thou liest down､ and when thou risest up;

content: 8 and thou shalt bind them for a sign upon thy hand,—and they shall serve for bands､ between thine eyes;
content_old: 8 and thou shalt bind them for a sign upon thy hand,—and they shall serve for bands､ between thine eyes;

content: 9 and thou shalt write them upon the posts of thy house､ and within thy gates.
content_old: 9 and thou shalt write them upon the posts of thy house､ and within thy gates.

content: 10 So shall it be when Yahweh thy God shall bring thee into the land､ which he sware to thy fathers—to Abraham､ to Isaac and to Jacob､ to give unto thee,—into cities great and goodly､ which thou didst not build;
content_old: 10 So shall it be when Yahweh thy God shall bring thee into the land､ which he sware to thy fathers—to Abraham､ to Isaac and to Jacob､ to give unto thee,—into cities great and goodly､ which thou didst not build;

content: 11 and houses full of all good things､ which thou filledst not, and hewn cisterns which thou hewedst not, vineyards and oliveyards which thou plantedst not,—and shalt eat and be full
content_old: 11 and houses full of all good things､ which thou filledst not, and hewn cisterns which thou hewedst not, vineyards and oliveyards which thou plantedst not,—and shalt eat and be full

content: 12 take heed unto thyself, lest thou forget Yahweh,—who brought thee forth out of the land of Egypt､ out of the house of servants.
content_old: 12 take heed unto thyself, lest thou forget Yahweh,—who brought thee forth out of the land of Egypt､ out of the house of servants.

content: 13 Yahweh thy God shalt thou revere､ And him shalt thou serve,— And by his name shalt thou swear.
content_old: 13 Yahweh thy God shalt thou revere､ And him shalt thou serve,— And by his name shalt thou swear.

content: 14 Ye shall not go after other gods,—of the gods of the peoples who are surrounding you;
content_old: 14 Ye shall not go after other gods,—of the gods of the peoples who are surrounding you;

content: 15 for a jealous GOD is Yahweh thy God､ in thy midst,—lest the anger of Yahweh thy God kindle upon thee, and so he destroy thee from off the face of the ground.
content_old: 15 for a jealous GOD is Yahweh thy God､ in thy midst,—lest the anger of Yahweh thy God kindle upon thee, and so he destroy thee from off the face of the ground.

content: 16 Ye shall not put Yahweh your God to the proof,—as ye put him to the proof in Massah that is, “The place of proving”.
content_old: 16 Ye shall not put Yahweh your God to the proof,—as ye put him to the proof in Massah that is, “The place of proving”.

content: 17 Ye shall keep the commandments of Yahweh your God and his testimonies and his statutes､ which he hath commanded thee;
content_old: 17 Ye shall keep the commandments of Yahweh your God and his testimonies and his statutes､ which he hath commanded thee;

content: 18 so shalt thou do what is right and what is pleasing in the eyes of Yahweh,—that it may be well with thee, and thou mayest enter in and possess the good land, which Yahweh sware unto thy fathers;
content_old: 18 so shalt thou do what is right and what is pleasing in the eyes of Yahweh,—that it may be well with thee, and thou mayest enter in and possess the good land, which Yahweh sware unto thy fathers;

content: 19 to thrust out all thine enemies from before thee,— As spake Yahweh.
content_old: 19 to thrust out all thine enemies from before thee,— As spake Yahweh.

content: 20 When thy son shall ask thee in time to come､ saying,— What mean the testimonies､ and the statutes and the regulations, which Yahweh our God commanded you?
content_old: 20 When thy son shall ask thee in time to come､ saying,— What mean the testimonies､ and the statutes and the regulations, which Yahweh our God commanded you?

content: 21 Then shalt thou say unto thy son, Servants were we unto Pharaoh､ in Egypt,—and Yahweh brought us forth out of Egypt､ with a firm hand;
content_old: 21 Then shalt thou say unto thy son, Servants were we unto Pharaoh､ in Egypt,—and Yahweh brought us forth out of Egypt､ with a firm hand;

content: 22 and Yahweh put forth signs and wonders､ great and sore､ upon Egypt､ upon Pharaoh and upon all his household､ before our eyes;
content_old: 22 and Yahweh put forth signs and wonders､ great and sore､ upon Egypt､ upon Pharaoh and upon all his household､ before our eyes;

content: 23 but he brought us forth from thence,—that he might bring us in, to give unto us the land, which he sware unto our fathers.
content_old: 23 but he brought us forth from thence,—that he might bring us in, to give unto us the land, which he sware unto our fathers.

content: 24 So then Yahweh commanded us to do all these statutes, to revere Yahweh our God,—for our､good､ all the days, to preserve us alive､ (as at this day);
content_old: 24 So then Yahweh commanded us to do all these statutes, to revere Yahweh our God,—for our､good､ all the days, to preserve us alive､ (as at this day);

content: 1 When Yahweh thy God shall bring thee into the land which thou art going in to possess, and shall clear away many nations from before thee—the Hittites and the Girgashites and the Amorites､ and the Canaanites and the Perizzites､ and the Hivites and the Jebusites—seven nations greater in number and stronger than thou;
content_old: 1 When Yahweh thy God shall bring thee into the land which thou art going in to possess, and shall clear away many nations from before thee—the Hittites and the Girgashites and the Amorites､ and the Canaanites and the Perizzites､ and the Hivites and the Jebusites—seven nations greater in number and stronger than thou;

content: 2 and Yahweh thy God shall deliver them up before thee, and thou shalt smite them thou shalt devote them to destruction, thou shalt not solemnise with them a covenant､ neither shalt thou shew them favour;
content_old: 2 and Yahweh thy God shall deliver them up before thee, and thou shalt smite them thou shalt devote them to destruction, thou shalt not solemnise with them a covenant､ neither shalt thou shew them favour;

content: 3 neither shalt thou intermarry with them,—thy daughter shalt thou not give unto his son, nor his daughter shalt thou take for thy son;
content_old: 3 neither shalt thou intermarry with them,—thy daughter shalt thou not give unto his son, nor his daughter shalt thou take for thy son;

content: 4 for he will turn aside thy son from following me, and they will serve other gods,— so shall the anger of Yahweh kindle upon you, and he will destroy thee､ speedily.
content_old: 4 for he will turn aside thy son from following me, and they will serve other gods,— so shall the anger of Yahweh kindle upon you, and he will destroy thee､ speedily.

content: 5 Verily thus shall ye do unto them: Their altars shall ye tear down, And their pillars shall ye break in pieces,— And their sacred stems shall ye hew down, And their carved images shall ye burn up in the fire.
content_old: 5 Verily thus shall ye do unto them: Their altars shall ye tear down, And their pillars shall ye break in pieces,— And their sacred stems shall ye hew down, And their carved images shall ye burn up in the fire.

content: 6 For a holy people art thou unto Yahweh thy God: of thee hath Yahweh thy God made choice､ that thou shouldest become his people as a treasure, above all the peoples that are on the face of the ground:
content_old: 6 For a holy people art thou unto Yahweh thy God: of thee hath Yahweh thy God made choice､ that thou shouldest become his people as a treasure, above all the peoples that are on the face of the ground:

content: 7 not because ye were more in number than any of the peoples did Yahweh become attached to you､ and make choice of you,—for ye were fewer than any of the peoples;
content_old: 7 not because ye were more in number than any of the peoples did Yahweh become attached to you､ and make choice of you,—for ye were fewer than any of the peoples;

content: 8 but because Yahweh loved you､ and because he would keep the oath which he sware unto your fathers did Yahweh bring you forth with a firm hand,—and redeem thee out of the house of servants, out of the hand of Pharaoh､ king of Egypt.
content_old: 8 but because Yahweh loved you､ and because he would keep the oath which he sware unto your fathers did Yahweh bring you forth with a firm hand,—and redeem thee out of the house of servants, out of the hand of Pharaoh､ king of Egypt.

content: 9 So then, thou must know that Yahweh thy God he is God,—the faithful GOD, keeping his covenant and his lovingkindness with them that love him､ and keep his commandments, to a thousand generations
content_old: 9 So then, thou must know that Yahweh thy God he is God,—the faithful GOD, keeping his covenant and his lovingkindness with them that love him､ and keep his commandments, to a thousand generations

content: 10 but requiting them who hate him unto his face､ to destroy them,—he will not be slack towards him that hateth him, unto his face will he requite him.
content_old: 10 but requiting them who hate him unto his face､ to destroy them,—he will not be slack towards him that hateth him, unto his face will he requite him.

content: 11 So shalt thou keep the commandment､ and the statutes and the regulations､ which I am commanding thee to-day､ to do them.
content_old: 11 So shalt thou keep the commandment､ and the statutes and the regulations､ which I am commanding thee to-day､ to do them.

content: 12 Then shall it come to pass if ye will hearken unto these regulations, and keep and do them then will Yahweh thy God keep with thee､ the covenant and the lovingkindness which he sware unto thy fathers;
content_old: 12 Then shall it come to pass if ye will hearken unto these regulations, and keep and do them then will Yahweh thy God keep with thee､ the covenant and the lovingkindness which he sware unto thy fathers;

content: 13 and will love thee, and bless thee､ and multiply thee,—and bless the fruit of thy body and the fruit of thy ground､ thy corn､ and thy new wine and thine oil､ the young of thy kine､ and the ewes of thy flock, upon the soil which he sware unto thy fathers to give unto thee.
content_old: 13 and will love thee, and bless thee､ and multiply thee,—and bless the fruit of thy body and the fruit of thy ground､ thy corn､ and thy new wine and thine oil､ the young of thy kine､ and the ewes of thy flock, upon the soil which he sware unto thy fathers to give unto thee.

content: 14 Blessed shalt thou be beyond all the peoples,—there shall not be in thee a barren male or female､ nor among thy cattle;
content_old: 14 Blessed shalt thou be beyond all the peoples,—there shall not be in thee a barren male or female､ nor among thy cattle;

content: 15 and Yahweh will turn away from thee､ all disease,—and as for all the sore sicknesses of Egypt which thou knowest he will not lay them upon thee, but will put them upon all who hate thee;
content_old: 15 and Yahweh will turn away from thee､ all disease,—and as for all the sore sicknesses of Egypt which thou knowest he will not lay them upon thee, but will put them upon all who hate thee;

content: 16 and thou shalt devour all the peoples whom Yahweh thy God is delivering up unto thee, thine eye shall not look with pity upon them,—neither shalt thou serve their gods, for a snare would it be unto thee.
content_old: 16 and thou shalt devour all the peoples whom Yahweh thy God is delivering up unto thee, thine eye shall not look with pity upon them,—neither shalt thou serve their gods, for a snare would it be unto thee.

content: 17 Although thou mightest say in thy heart: More in number are these nations than I,—how can I dispossess them?
content_old: 17 Although thou mightest say in thy heart: More in number are these nations than I,—how can I dispossess them?

content: 18 thou must not be afraid of them,—thou must remember what Yahweh thy God did, unto Pharaoh､ and unto all Egypt:
content_old: 18 thou must not be afraid of them,—thou must remember what Yahweh thy God did, unto Pharaoh､ and unto all Egypt:

content: 19 the great provings which thine own eyes saw､ and the signs and the wonders､ and the firm hand､ and the stretched-out arm, wherewith Yahweh thy God brought thee forth,—so will Yahweh thy God do unto all the peoples, before whom thou art afraid.
content_old: 19 the great provings which thine own eyes saw､ and the signs and the wonders､ and the firm hand､ and the stretched-out arm, wherewith Yahweh thy God brought thee forth,—so will Yahweh thy God do unto all the peoples, before whom thou art afraid.

content: 20 Moreover also the hornet will Yahweh thy God send among them,—until they are destroyed who are left remaining､ and who are hiding themselves from thy face.
content_old: 20 Moreover also the hornet will Yahweh thy God send among them,—until they are destroyed who are left remaining､ and who are hiding themselves from thy face.

content: 21 Thou shalt not be affrighted at their presence,—for Yahweh thy God in thy midst is a GOD great and to be revered.
content_old: 21 Thou shalt not be affrighted at their presence,—for Yahweh thy God in thy midst is a GOD great and to be revered.

content: 22 So will Yahweh thy God clear away these nations from before thee､ little by little,—thou mayest not consume them at once, lest the wild beast of the field should multiply over thee.
content_old: 22 So will Yahweh thy God clear away these nations from before thee､ little by little,—thou mayest not consume them at once, lest the wild beast of the field should multiply over thee.

content: 23 But Yahweh thy God will deliver them up before thee,—and discomfit them with a great discomfiture, until they are destroyed;
content_old: 23 But Yahweh thy God will deliver them up before thee,—and discomfit them with a great discomfiture, until they are destroyed;

content: 24 and will deliver their kings into thy hand and thou shalt destroy their name, from under the heavens,—not a man shall stand before thee, until thou hast destroyed them.
content_old: 24 and will deliver their kings into thy hand and thou shalt destroy their name, from under the heavens,—not a man shall stand before thee, until thou hast destroyed them.

content: 25 The carved images of their gods shalt thou consume with fire,—thou shalt not covet the silver and gold upon them､ to take unto thee, lest thou be ensnared thereby; for the abomination of Yahweh thy God it is;
