content_old: 25 The carved images of their gods shalt thou consume with fire,—thou shalt not covet the silver and gold upon them､ to take unto thee, lest thou be ensnared thereby; for the abomination of Yahweh thy God it is;

content: 1 All the commandment which I am commanding thee to-day shalt thou observe to do,—that ye may live､ and multiply､ and enter in and possess the land, which Yahweh sware unto your fathers.
content_old: 1 All the commandment which I am commanding thee to-day shalt thou observe to do,—that ye may live､ and multiply､ and enter in and possess the land, which Yahweh sware unto your fathers.

content: 2 So then, thou shalt remember all the way in which Yahweh thy God caused thee to journey these forty years in the desert,—that he might humble thee､ to put thee to the proof､ to know what was in thy heart,—whether thou wouldest keep his commandments､ or not.
content_old: 2 So then, thou shalt remember all the way in which Yahweh thy God caused thee to journey these forty years in the desert,—that he might humble thee､ to put thee to the proof､ to know what was in thy heart,—whether thou wouldest keep his commandments､ or not.

content: 3 So he humbled thee､ and suffered thee to hunger, and fed thee with manna which thou hadst not known, neither had thy fathers known,—that he might lead thee to consider that not on bread alone shall the son of earth live, but on whatsoever cometh from the bidding of Yahweh shall the son of earth live.
content_old: 3 So he humbled thee､ and suffered thee to hunger, and fed thee with manna which thou hadst not known, neither had thy fathers known,—that he might lead thee to consider that not on bread alone shall the son of earth live, but on whatsoever cometh from the bidding of Yahweh shall the son of earth live.

content: 4 Thy mantle hath not fallen with age from off thee, and thy foot hath not become swollen,—these forty years.
content_old: 4 Thy mantle hath not fallen with age from off thee, and thy foot hath not become swollen,—these forty years.

content: 5 Thou must consider､ then､ with thy heart,—that as a man chasteneth his son Yahweh thy God hath been chastening thee.
content_old: 5 Thou must consider､ then､ with thy heart,—that as a man chasteneth his son Yahweh thy God hath been chastening thee.

content: 6 Thou shalt therefore keep the commandments of Yahweh thy God,—to walk in his ways､ and to revere him.
content_old: 6 Thou shalt therefore keep the commandments of Yahweh thy God,—to walk in his ways､ and to revere him.

content: 7 For Yahweh thy God is bringing thee into a good land; a land of ravines of water, of fountains and depths, coming forth in valley､ and in mountain:
content_old: 7 For Yahweh thy God is bringing thee into a good land; a land of ravines of water, of fountains and depths, coming forth in valley､ and in mountain:

content: 8 a land of wheat and barley, and vine and fig-tree､ and pomegranate,—a land of olive oil､ and honey:
content_old: 8 a land of wheat and barley, and vine and fig-tree､ and pomegranate,—a land of olive oil､ and honey:

content: 9 a land wherein not in scarcity shalt thou eat food, thou shalt lack nothing therein,—a land whose stones are iron, and out of whose hills thou mayest hew copper.
content_old: 9 a land wherein not in scarcity shalt thou eat food, thou shalt lack nothing therein,—a land whose stones are iron, and out of whose hills thou mayest hew copper.

content: 10 So then thou shalt eat､ and be satisfied,—and bless Yahweh thy God, for the good land which he hath given unto thee.
content_old: 10 So then thou shalt eat､ and be satisfied,—and bless Yahweh thy God, for the good land which he hath given unto thee.

content: 11 Take heed to thyself, lest thou forget Yahweh thy God,—so as not to keep his commandments､ and his regulations and his statutes, which I am commanding thee to-day;
content_old: 11 Take heed to thyself, lest thou forget Yahweh thy God,—so as not to keep his commandments､ and his regulations and his statutes, which I am commanding thee to-day;

content: 12 lest thou eat､ and be satisfied,—and goodly houses thou build､ and inhabit;
content_old: 12 lest thou eat､ and be satisfied,—and goodly houses thou build､ and inhabit;

content: 13 and thy herd and thy flock increase, and silver and gold increase unto thee,—and all that thou hast increase;
content_old: 13 and thy herd and thy flock increase, and silver and gold increase unto thee,—and all that thou hast increase;

content: 14 and so thy heart be lifted up,—and thou forget Yahweh thy God, who brought thee forth out of the land of Egypt､ out of the house of servants;
content_old: 14 and so thy heart be lifted up,—and thou forget Yahweh thy God, who brought thee forth out of the land of Egypt､ out of the house of servants;

content: 15 who caused thee to journey through the great and terrible desert, of fiery serpents and scorpions, and thirsty wastes､ where was no water,—who brought forth for thee water out of the flinty rock;
content_old: 15 who caused thee to journey through the great and terrible desert, of fiery serpents and scorpions, and thirsty wastes､ where was no water,—who brought forth for thee water out of the flinty rock;

content: 16 who fed thee with manna in the desert, which thy fathers had not known,—that he might humble thee､ and that he might put thee to the proof, to do thee good in thy hereafter,
content_old: 16 who fed thee with manna in the desert, which thy fathers had not known,—that he might humble thee､ and that he might put thee to the proof, to do thee good in thy hereafter,

content: 17 and lest thou shouldest say in thy heart,— Mine own strength and the might of mine own hand have gotten me this wealth.
content_old: 17 and lest thou shouldest say in thy heart,— Mine own strength and the might of mine own hand have gotten me this wealth.

content: 18 But thou shalt remember Yahweh thy God, that it was he who had been giving thee strength to get wealth,—that so he might establish his covenant which he sware to thy fathers (as at this day).
content_old: 18 But thou shalt remember Yahweh thy God, that it was he who had been giving thee strength to get wealth,—that so he might establish his covenant which he sware to thy fathers (as at this day).

content: 19 But it shall be if thou forget Yahweh thy God, and go after other gods, and serve them､ and bow thyself down to them I testify against you､ to-day, that ye shall perish:
content_old: 19 But it shall be if thou forget Yahweh thy God, and go after other gods, and serve them､ and bow thyself down to them I testify against you､ to-day, that ye shall perish:

content: 1 Hear､ O Israel! thou art passing､ to-day､ over the Jordan, to go in to dispossess nations, greater and stronger than thou,—cities great and fortified into the heavens;
content_old: 1 Hear､ O Israel! thou art passing､ to-day､ over the Jordan, to go in to dispossess nations, greater and stronger than thou,—cities great and fortified into the heavens;

content: 2 a people great and tall､ the sons of Anakim,—whom thou knowest､ and of whom thou hast heard say, Who can stand before the sons of Anak?
content_old: 2 a people great and tall､ the sons of Anakim,—whom thou knowest､ and of whom thou hast heard say, Who can stand before the sons of Anak?

content: 3 So then, thou must consider to-day､ that Yahweh thy God he it is that is passing over before thee､ as a consuming fire, he will destroy them､ and he will cause them to bow down before thee,—so shalt thou dispossess them､ and destroy them speedily, as Yahweh hath spoken unto thee.
content_old: 3 So then, thou must consider to-day､ that Yahweh thy God he it is that is passing over before thee､ as a consuming fire, he will destroy them､ and he will cause them to bow down before thee,—so shalt thou dispossess them､ and destroy them speedily, as Yahweh hath spoken unto thee.

content: 4 Do not speak in thy heart､ when Yahweh thy God casteth them out from before thee､ saying, For mine own righteousness hath Yahweh brought me in, to possess this land,— whereas it is for the lawlessness of these nations that Yahweh is dispossessing them from before thee.
content_old: 4 Do not speak in thy heart､ when Yahweh thy God casteth them out from before thee､ saying, For mine own righteousness hath Yahweh brought me in, to possess this land,— whereas it is for the lawlessness of these nations that Yahweh is dispossessing them from before thee.

content: 5 Not for thine own righteousness､ nor for the uprightness of thine own heart art thou going in to possess their land,—but for the lawlessness of these nations is Yahweh thy God driving them out from before thee, and that he may establish the word which Yahweh sware unto thy fathers, unto Abraham､ unto Isaac､ and unto Jacob.
content_old: 5 Not for thine own righteousness､ nor for the uprightness of thine own heart art thou going in to possess their land,—but for the lawlessness of these nations is Yahweh thy God driving them out from before thee, and that he may establish the word which Yahweh sware unto thy fathers, unto Abraham､ unto Isaac､ and unto Jacob.

content: 6 So then, thou must consider that not for thine own righteousness is Yahweh thy God giving unto thee this good land､ to possess it,—for a stiff-necked people thou art.
content_old: 6 So then, thou must consider that not for thine own righteousness is Yahweh thy God giving unto thee this good land､ to possess it,—for a stiff-necked people thou art.

content: 7 Remember—do not forget, how thou didst provoke Yahweh thy God､ in the desert,—yea from the day when thou camest forth out of the land of Egypt､ until ye entered as far as this place have ye been quarrelling with Yahweh.
content_old: 7 Remember—do not forget, how thou didst provoke Yahweh thy God､ in the desert,—yea from the day when thou camest forth out of the land of Egypt､ until ye entered as far as this place have ye been quarrelling with Yahweh.

content: 8 Even in Horeb ye provoked Yahweh to wrath,—so that Yahweh showed himself angry with you､ to destroy you.
content_old: 8 Even in Horeb ye provoked Yahweh to wrath,—so that Yahweh showed himself angry with you､ to destroy you.

content: 9 When I went up into the mountain､ to receive the tables of stone—the tables of the covenant, which Yahweh had solemnised with you then abode I in the mountain､ forty days and forty nights, food did I not eat, and water did I not drink.
content_old: 9 When I went up into the mountain､ to receive the tables of stone—the tables of the covenant, which Yahweh had solemnised with you then abode I in the mountain､ forty days and forty nights, food did I not eat, and water did I not drink.

content: 10 Then did Yahweh deliver unto me the two tables of stone, written with the finger of God,—and there was upon them､ according to all the words which Yahweh had spoken with you in the mountain､ out of the midst of the fire､ in the day of the convocation.
content_old: 10 Then did Yahweh deliver unto me the two tables of stone, written with the finger of God,—and there was upon them､ according to all the words which Yahweh had spoken with you in the mountain､ out of the midst of the fire､ in the day of the convocation.

content: 11 So then it came to pass at the end of forty days､ and forty nights that Yahweh gave unto me､ the two tables of stone､ the tables of the covenant.
content_old: 11 So then it came to pass at the end of forty days､ and forty nights that Yahweh gave unto me､ the two tables of stone､ the tables of the covenant.

content: 12 Then said Yahweh unto me— Up! get down quickly out of this mountain, for thy people whom thou hast brought forth out of Egypt have broken faith,—they have turned aside quickly､ out of the way which I commanded them,—they have made them a molten image.
content_old: 12 Then said Yahweh unto me— Up! get down quickly out of this mountain, for thy people whom thou hast brought forth out of Egypt have broken faith,—they have turned aside quickly､ out of the way which I commanded them,—they have made them a molten image.

content: 13 And Yahweh spake unto me､ saying,— I have looked on this people, and lo! a stiff-necked people it is.
content_old: 13 And Yahweh spake unto me､ saying,— I have looked on this people, and lo! a stiff-necked people it is.

content: 14 Let me alone､ that I may destroy them, and wipe out their name､ from under the heavens,—and make thee into a nation stronger and more in number than they.
content_old: 14 Let me alone､ that I may destroy them, and wipe out their name､ from under the heavens,—and make thee into a nation stronger and more in number than they.

content: 15 So I turned､ and came down out of the mountain, now the mountain was burning with fire,—and the two tables of the covenant were upon my two hands.
content_old: 15 So I turned､ and came down out of the mountain, now the mountain was burning with fire,—and the two tables of the covenant were upon my two hands.

content: 16 Then looked I､ and lo! ye had sinned against Yahweh your God, ye had made you a molten calf,—ye had turned aside quickly, out of the way which Yahweh had commanded you.
content_old: 16 Then looked I､ and lo! ye had sinned against Yahweh your God, ye had made you a molten calf,—ye had turned aside quickly, out of the way which Yahweh had commanded you.

content: 17 So I seized the two tables, and cast them from off my two hands,—and brake them in pieces before your eyes.
content_old: 17 So I seized the two tables, and cast them from off my two hands,—and brake them in pieces before your eyes.

content: 18 Then lay I prostrate before Yahweh､ as at the first､ forty days and forty nights, food did I not eat, and water did I not drink,—because of all your sin which ye had sinned, in doing the thing that was wicked in the eyes of Yahweh､ to provoke him to anger.
content_old: 18 Then lay I prostrate before Yahweh､ as at the first､ forty days and forty nights, food did I not eat, and water did I not drink,—because of all your sin which ye had sinned, in doing the thing that was wicked in the eyes of Yahweh､ to provoke him to anger.

content: 19 For I shrank with fear､ from the face of the anger and the hot displeasure, wherewith Yahweh was provoked against you､ to destroy you,—but Yahweh hearkened unto me, even at that time.
content_old: 19 For I shrank with fear､ from the face of the anger and the hot displeasure, wherewith Yahweh was provoked against you､ to destroy you,—but Yahweh hearkened unto me, even at that time.

content: 20 And with Aaron did Yahweh show himself exceedingly angry､ to destroy him,—so I prostrated myself, even in behalf of Aaron､ at that time.
content_old: 20 And with Aaron did Yahweh show himself exceedingly angry､ to destroy him,—so I prostrated myself, even in behalf of Aaron､ at that time.

content: 21 And your sin which ye had made､ even the calf took I､ and burned it up with fire, and pounded it very small, until it was fine as dust,—then cast I the dust thereof into the torrent､ that descended out of the mountain.
content_old: 21 And your sin which ye had made､ even the calf took I､ and burned it up with fire, and pounded it very small, until it was fine as dust,—then cast I the dust thereof into the torrent､ that descended out of the mountain.

content: 22 Also at Taberah､ and at Massah, and at Kibroth-hataavah a cause of provocation became ye､ unto Yahweh.
content_old: 22 Also at Taberah､ and at Massah, and at Kibroth-hataavah a cause of provocation became ye､ unto Yahweh.

content: 23 Also when Yahweh sent you out of Kadeshbarnea､ saying, Go up and possess the land､ which I have given unto you then quarrelled ye with the bidding of Yahweh your God, and trusted him not, neither hearkened unto his voice.
content_old: 23 Also when Yahweh sent you out of Kadeshbarnea､ saying, Go up and possess the land､ which I have given unto you then quarrelled ye with the bidding of Yahweh your God, and trusted him not, neither hearkened unto his voice.

content: 24 Ye have been quarrelling with Yahweh,—from the day that I first knew you.
content_old: 24 Ye have been quarrelling with Yahweh,—from the day that I first knew you.

content: 25 Thus､ then､ lay I prostrate before Yahweh､ the forty days and the forty nights that I did lie prostrate,—because Yahweh spake of destroying you.
content_old: 25 Thus､ then､ lay I prostrate before Yahweh､ the forty days and the forty nights that I did lie prostrate,—because Yahweh spake of destroying you.

content: 26 Therefore I prostrated myself unto Yahweh､ and said, My Lord Yahweh! Do not destroy thy people､ even thine inheritance, which thou hast redeemed in thy greatness,—which thou hast brought forth out of Egypt with a firm hand.
content_old: 26 Therefore I prostrated myself unto Yahweh､ and said, My Lord Yahweh! Do not destroy thy people､ even thine inheritance, which thou hast redeemed in thy greatness,—which thou hast brought forth out of Egypt with a firm hand.

content: 27 Have remembrance of thy servants, of Abraham of Isaac､ and of Jacob,—do not regard the obduracy of this people, or their lawlessness､ or their sin:
content_old: 27 Have remembrance of thy servants, of Abraham of Isaac､ and of Jacob,—do not regard the obduracy of this people, or their lawlessness､ or their sin:

content: 28 lest the land out of which thou hast brought us forth say, Because Yahweh was not able to bring them into the land of which he had spoken to them,—and because he hated them took he them forth､ to put them to death in the desert.
content_old: 28 lest the land out of which thou hast brought us forth say, Because Yahweh was not able to bring them into the land of which he had spoken to them,—and because he hated them took he them forth､ to put them to death in the desert.

content: 1 At that time said Yahweh unto me— Cut thee out two tables of stone､ like the first, and come up unto me､ into the mountain,—and make thee an ark of wood;
content_old: 1 At that time said Yahweh unto me— Cut thee out two tables of stone､ like the first, and come up unto me､ into the mountain,—and make thee an ark of wood;

content: 2 that I may write､ upon the tables, the words which were on the first tables､ which thou brakest in pieces,—then shalt thou put them in the ark.
content_old: 2 that I may write､ upon the tables, the words which were on the first tables､ which thou brakest in pieces,—then shalt thou put them in the ark.

content: 3 So I made an ark､ of acacia wood, and cut out two tables of stone､ like the first,—and went up the mountain, having the two tables in my hand.
content_old: 3 So I made an ark､ of acacia wood, and cut out two tables of stone､ like the first,—and went up the mountain, having the two tables in my hand.

content: 4 And he wrote upon the tables､ according to the first writing—the ten words, which Yahweh had spoken unto you in the mountain､ out of the midst of the fire､ in the day of the convocation,—and Yahweh delivered them unto me.
content_old: 4 And he wrote upon the tables､ according to the first writing—the ten words, which Yahweh had spoken unto you in the mountain､ out of the midst of the fire､ in the day of the convocation,—and Yahweh delivered them unto me.

content: 5 Then turned I､ and came down out of the mountain, and put the tables in the ark which I had made,—and they have remained there, as Yahweh commanded me.
content_old: 5 Then turned I､ and came down out of the mountain, and put the tables in the ark which I had made,—and they have remained there, as Yahweh commanded me.

content: 6 And the sons of Israel set forward out of Beeroth Bene-jaakan to Moserah,—there died Aaron､ and was buried there, and Eleazar､ his son､ became priest in his stead.
content_old: 6 And the sons of Israel set forward out of Beeroth Bene-jaakan to Moserah,—there died Aaron､ and was buried there, and Eleazar､ his son､ became priest in his stead.

content: 7 From thence set they forward unto the Gudgodah,—and from the Gudgodah to Jotbathah､ a land of torrents of water.
content_old: 7 From thence set they forward unto the Gudgodah,—and from the Gudgodah to Jotbathah､ a land of torrents of water.

content: 8 At that time did Yahweh separate the tribe of Levi, to bear the ark of the covenant of Yahweh,—to stand before Yahweh､ to wait upon him､ and to bless in his name (until this day).
content_old: 8 At that time did Yahweh separate the tribe of Levi, to bear the ark of the covenant of Yahweh,—to stand before Yahweh､ to wait upon him､ and to bless in his name (until this day).

content: 9 For this cause hath Levi neither portion norinheritance､ with his brethren,—Yahweh is his inheritance, as Yahweh thy God spake unto him.
content_old: 9 For this cause hath Levi neither portion norinheritance､ with his brethren,—Yahweh is his inheritance, as Yahweh thy God spake unto him.

content: 10 But I stayed in the mountain､ according to the former days, forty days､ and forty nights,—and Yahweh hearkened unto me､ at that time also, Yahweh was not willing to destroy thee.
content_old: 10 But I stayed in the mountain､ according to the former days, forty days､ and forty nights,—and Yahweh hearkened unto me､ at that time also, Yahweh was not willing to destroy thee.

content: 11 So then Yahweh said unto me, Up with thee—to break away onward､ before the people,—that they may enter in､ and possess the land, which I sware unto their fathers､ to give unto them.
content_old: 11 So then Yahweh said unto me, Up with thee—to break away onward､ before the people,—that they may enter in､ and possess the land, which I sware unto their fathers､ to give unto them.

content: 12 Now therefore､ O Israel, what is Yahweh thy God asking of thee,—but to revere Yahweh thy God､ to walk in all his ways､ and to love him, and to serve Yahweh thy God, with all thy heart､ and with all thy soul:
content_old: 12 Now therefore､ O Israel, what is Yahweh thy God asking of thee,—but to revere Yahweh thy God､ to walk in all his ways､ and to love him, and to serve Yahweh thy God, with all thy heart､ and with all thy soul:

content: 13 to keep the commandments of Yahweh､ and his statutes, which I am commanding thee to-day,—for thy good?
content_old: 13 to keep the commandments of Yahweh､ and his statutes, which I am commanding thee to-day,—for thy good?

content: 14 Lo! unto Yahweh thy God belong the heavens､ even the highest heavens,—the earth､ with all that is therein.
content_old: 14 Lo! unto Yahweh thy God belong the heavens､ even the highest heavens,—the earth､ with all that is therein.

content: 15 Only unto thy fathers Yahweh became attached､ so as to love them,—therefore made he choice of their seed after them—of you—out of all the peoples､ (as at this day).
content_old: 15 Only unto thy fathers Yahweh became attached､ so as to love them,—therefore made he choice of their seed after them—of you—out of all the peoples､ (as at this day).

content: 16 Therefore must ye circumcise the foreskin of your hearts,—and your necks must ye stiffen no more.
content_old: 16 Therefore must ye circumcise the foreskin of your hearts,—and your necks must ye stiffen no more.

content: 17 For as touching Yahweh your God he is God of gods, and Lord of lords; the great､ the mighty､ and the fearful GOD, who respecteth not persons, nor accepteth a bribe;
content_old: 17 For as touching Yahweh your God he is God of gods, and Lord of lords; the great､ the mighty､ and the fearful GOD, who respecteth not persons, nor accepteth a bribe;

content: 18 executing the vindication of the orphan､ and the widow,—and loving a sojourner, giving him food and raiment.
content_old: 18 executing the vindication of the orphan､ and the widow,—and loving a sojourner, giving him food and raiment.

content: 19 Therefore shall ye love the sojourner,—for sojourners became ye､ in the land of Egypt.
content_old: 19 Therefore shall ye love the sojourner,—for sojourners became ye､ in the land of Egypt.

content: 20 Yahweh thy God shalt thou revere､ Him shalt thou serve,— And unto him shalt thou cleave, And in his name shalt thou swear.
content_old: 20 Yahweh thy God shalt thou revere､ Him shalt thou serve,— And unto him shalt thou cleave, And in his name shalt thou swear.

content: 21 He is thy song of praise､ And he thy God,—who hath done with thee these great and fearful things､ which thine own eyes have seen.
content_old: 21 He is thy song of praise､ And he thy God,—who hath done with thee these great and fearful things､ which thine own eyes have seen.

content: 1 Therefore shalt thou love Yahweh thy God､ and keep his observance､ and his statutes､ and his regulations､ and his commandments､ all the days.
content_old: 1 Therefore shalt thou love Yahweh thy God､ and keep his observance､ and his statutes､ and his regulations､ and his commandments､ all the days.

content: 2 And ye must know､ to-day, (for not with your sons do I speak who know not, neither have they seen) the discipline of Yahweh your God,—his greatness､ his firm hand, and his stretched-out arm;
content_old: 2 And ye must know､ to-day, (for not with your sons do I speak who know not, neither have they seen) the discipline of Yahweh your God,—his greatness､ his firm hand, and his stretched-out arm;

content: 3 and his signs､ and his doings, which he did in the midst of Egypt,—unto Pharaoh king of Egypt､ and unto all his land;
content_old: 3 and his signs､ and his doings, which he did in the midst of Egypt,—unto Pharaoh king of Egypt､ and unto all his land;

content: 4 and what he did unto the forces of Egypt—unto his horses and unto his chariots､ in that he caused the waters of the Red Sea to flow over their faces, when they were pursuing after you,—and so Yahweh destroyed them (unto this day);
content_old: 4 and what he did unto the forces of Egypt—unto his horses and unto his chariots､ in that he caused the waters of the Red Sea to flow over their faces, when they were pursuing after you,—and so Yahweh destroyed them (unto this day);

content: 5 and what he did unto you､ in the desert,—until ye came in as far as this place;
content_old: 5 and what he did unto you､ in the desert,—until ye came in as far as this place;

content: 6 and what he did to Dathan and to Abiram､ sons of Eliab､ son of Reuben, in that the earth opened wide her mouth, and swallowed-up them and their households､ and their tents,—and all the living things that attended them, in the midst of all Israel.
content_old: 6 and what he did to Dathan and to Abiram､ sons of Eliab､ son of Reuben, in that the earth opened wide her mouth, and swallowed-up them and their households､ and their tents,—and all the living things that attended them, in the midst of all Israel.

content: 7 For yours are the eyes that have seen every great deed of Yahweh,—which he hath done.
content_old: 7 For yours are the eyes that have seen every great deed of Yahweh,—which he hath done.

content: 8 Therefore shall ye keep all the commandment which I am commanding thee､ today,—that ye may be strong､ and so enter and possess the land, whither ye are passing over to possess it;
content_old: 8 Therefore shall ye keep all the commandment which I am commanding thee､ today,—that ye may be strong､ and so enter and possess the land, whither ye are passing over to possess it;

content: 9 and that ye may prolong your days upon the soil which Yahweh sware unto your fathers､ to give unto them and unto their seed,—a land flowing with milk and honey.
content_old: 9 and that ye may prolong your days upon the soil which Yahweh sware unto your fathers､ to give unto them and unto their seed,—a land flowing with milk and honey.

content: 10 For the land which thou art entering to possess not like the land of Egypt, it is, from whence ye came out,—where thou didst sow thy seed, and then water it with thy foot､ like a garden of herbs;
content_old: 10 For the land which thou art entering to possess not like the land of Egypt, it is, from whence ye came out,—where thou didst sow thy seed, and then water it with thy foot､ like a garden of herbs;

content: 11 but the land whereinto ye are passing over to possess it is a land of hills､ and valleys,—which of the rain of the heavens doth drink water:
content_old: 11 but the land whereinto ye are passing over to possess it is a land of hills､ and valleys,—which of the rain of the heavens doth drink water:

content: 12 a land which Yahweh thy God careth for,—continually are the eyes of Yahweh thy God upon it, from the beginning of the year､ even unto the end of the year.
content_old: 12 a land which Yahweh thy God careth for,—continually are the eyes of Yahweh thy God upon it, from the beginning of the year､ even unto the end of the year.

content: 13 And it shall come to pass if ye will hearken unto my commandments､ which I am commanding you､ to-day,—to love Yahweh your God､ and to serve him, with all your heart､ and with all your soul
content_old: 13 And it shall come to pass if ye will hearken unto my commandments､ which I am commanding you､ to-day,—to love Yahweh your God､ and to serve him, with all your heart､ and with all your soul

content: 14 then saith he I will give the rain of your land in it season､ the early rain and the latter rain; so shalt thou gather in thy corn, and thy new wine､ and thine oil;
content_old: 14 then saith he I will give the rain of your land in it season､ the early rain and the latter rain; so shalt thou gather in thy corn, and thy new wine､ and thine oil;

content: 15 and I will give grass in thy field for thy cattle,—and thou shalt eat and be satisfied.
content_old: 15 and I will give grass in thy field for thy cattle,—and thou shalt eat and be satisfied.

content: 16 Take heed to yourselves, lest your heart be befooled,—and ye turn aside､ and serve other gods, and bow down to them.
content_old: 16 Take heed to yourselves, lest your heart be befooled,—and ye turn aside､ and serve other gods, and bow down to them.

content: 17 So would the anger of Yahweh kindle upon you､ and he would shut up the heavens､ that there should be no rain, and the ground would not yield her increase,—so should ye perish speedily､ from off the good land, which Yahweh is giving unto you.
content_old: 17 So would the anger of Yahweh kindle upon you､ and he would shut up the heavens､ that there should be no rain, and the ground would not yield her increase,—so should ye perish speedily､ from off the good land, which Yahweh is giving unto you.

content: 18 Therefore shall ye lay these my words upon your heart､ and upon your soul,—and bind them for a sign upon your hand, and they shall serve as bands between your eyes;
content_old: 18 Therefore shall ye lay these my words upon your heart､ and upon your soul,—and bind them for a sign upon your hand, and they shall serve as bands between your eyes;

content: 19 and ye shall teach them unto your children､ by speaking of them,—when thou sittest in thy house､ and when thou walkest by the way, and when thou liest down､ and when thou risest up;
content_old: 19 and ye shall teach them unto your children､ by speaking of them,—when thou sittest in thy house､ and when thou walkest by the way, and when thou liest down､ and when thou risest up;

content: 20 and thou shalt write them upon the door-posts of thy house､ and within thy gates:
content_old: 20 and thou shalt write them upon the door-posts of thy house､ and within thy gates:

content: 21 that your days may multiply､ and the days of your children, upon the soil which Yahweh sware unto your fathers､ to give unto them,—like the days of the heavens upon the earth.
content_old: 21 that your days may multiply､ and the days of your children, upon the soil which Yahweh sware unto your fathers､ to give unto them,—like the days of the heavens upon the earth.

content: 22 For if ye do indeed keep all this commandment､ which I am commanding you to do it,—to love Yahweh your God､ to walk in all his ways､ and to cleave unto him
content_old: 22 For if ye do indeed keep all this commandment､ which I am commanding you to do it,—to love Yahweh your God､ to walk in all his ways､ and to cleave unto him

content: 23 then will Yahweh dispossess all these nations､ from before you,—and ye shall dispossess nations greater and stronger than ye:
content_old: 23 then will Yahweh dispossess all these nations､ from before you,—and ye shall dispossess nations greater and stronger than ye:

content: 24 every place whereon the sole of your foot shall tread yours shall it be,—from the desert and the Lebanon､ from the river—the river Euphrates､ even unto the hinder sea shall be your boundary.
content_old: 24 every place whereon the sole of your foot shall tread yours shall it be,—from the desert and the Lebanon､ from the river—the river Euphrates､ even unto the hinder sea shall be your boundary.

content: 25 No man shall stand before you,—the dread of you and the fear of you will Yahweh your God put forth over the face of all the land､ whereon ye shall tread, as he spake unto you.
content_old: 25 No man shall stand before you,—the dread of you and the fear of you will Yahweh your God put forth over the face of all the land､ whereon ye shall tread, as he spake unto you.

content: 26 See! I am setting before you､ to-day,—a blessing､ and a curse:
content_old: 26 See! I am setting before you､ to-day,—a blessing､ and a curse:

content: 27 the blessing when ye shall hearken unto the commandments of Yahweh your God, which I am commanding you､ to-day;
content_old: 27 the blessing when ye shall hearken unto the commandments of Yahweh your God, which I am commanding you､ to-day;

content: 28 and the curse if ye shall not hearken unto the commandments of Yahweh your God, but shall turn aside out of the way which I am commanding you､ to-day,—to go after other gods､ which ye know not.
content_old: 28 and the curse if ye shall not hearken unto the commandments of Yahweh your God, but shall turn aside out of the way which I am commanding you､ to-day,—to go after other gods､ which ye know not.

content: 29 And it shall come to pass when Yahweh thy God shall bring thee into the land､ which thou art entering to possess then shalt thou put the blessing､ upon Mount Gerizim, and the curse､ upon Mount Ebal.
content_old: 29 And it shall come to pass when Yahweh thy God shall bring thee into the land､ which thou art entering to possess then shalt thou put the blessing､ upon Mount Gerizim, and the curse､ upon Mount Ebal.

content: 30 Are they not over the Jordan､ on the way towards the entering in of the sun, in the land of the Canaanite､ who dwelleth in the plain over against Gilgal､ beside the Teacher’s Terebinths?
content_old: 30 Are they not over the Jordan､ on the way towards the entering in of the sun, in the land of the Canaanite､ who dwelleth in the plain over against Gilgal､ beside the Teacher’s Terebinths?

content: 31 For ye are passing over the Jordan, to enter to possess the land which Yahweh your God is giving unto you,—so shall ye possess it､ and dwell therein.
content_old: 31 For ye are passing over the Jordan, to enter to possess the land which Yahweh your God is giving unto you,—so shall ye possess it､ and dwell therein.

content: 1 These are the statutes and the regulations which ye must observe to do, in the land which Yahweh the God of thy fathers hath given unto thee､ to possess it,—all the days that ye are living upon the soil:
content_old: 1 These are the statutes and the regulations which ye must observe to do, in the land which Yahweh the God of thy fathers hath given unto thee､ to possess it,—all the days that ye are living upon the soil:

content: 2 Ye must utterly destroy all the places､ where the nations whom ye are dispossessing have served their gods,— Upon the high mountains､ And upon the hills, And under every green tree;
content_old: 2 Ye must utterly destroy all the places､ where the nations whom ye are dispossessing have served their gods,— Upon the high mountains､ And upon the hills, And under every green tree;

content: 3 And ye must tear down their altars､ And break in pieces their pillars, And their sacred stems must ye consume with fire, And the carved images of their gods must ye fell to the ground,— And destroy their name out of that place.
content_old: 3 And ye must tear down their altars､ And break in pieces their pillars, And their sacred stems must ye consume with fire, And the carved images of their gods must ye fell to the ground,— And destroy their name out of that place.

content: 4 Ye must not do thus unto Yahweh your God;
content_old: 4 Ye must not do thus unto Yahweh your God;

content: 5 but unto the place which Yahweh your God shall choose､ out of all your tribes, to put his name there,—as his habitation shall ye ask your way､ and come in thither;
content_old: 5 but unto the place which Yahweh your God shall choose､ out of all your tribes, to put his name there,—as his habitation shall ye ask your way､ and come in thither;

content: 6 and bring in thither your ascending-offerings､ and your sacrifices, and your tithes, and the heave-offering of your hand,—and your vow-offerings､ and your freewill-offerings, and the firstlings of your herd､ and of your flock;
content_old: 6 and bring in thither your ascending-offerings､ and your sacrifices, and your tithes, and the heave-offering of your hand,—and your vow-offerings､ and your freewill-offerings, and the firstlings of your herd､ and of your flock;

content: 7 and shall eat there､ before Yahweh your God, and rejoice in all whereunto ye are putting your hand, ye､ and your households,—wherewith Yahweh thy God hath blessed thee.
content_old: 7 and shall eat there､ before Yahweh your God, and rejoice in all whereunto ye are putting your hand, ye､ and your households,—wherewith Yahweh thy God hath blessed thee.

content: 8 Ye must not do according to all that we are doing here､ to-day,—every man､ whatsoever is right in his own eyes.
content_old: 8 Ye must not do according to all that we are doing here､ to-day,—every man､ whatsoever is right in his own eyes.

content: 9 Because ye have not entered､ as yet,—into the resting-place and into the inheritance､ which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee.
content_old: 9 Because ye have not entered､ as yet,—into the resting-place and into the inheritance､ which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee.

content: 10 But when ye shall pass over the Jordan, and settle down in the land which Yahweh your God is causing you to inherit,—and he shall give you rest from all your enemies round about, and ye shall dwell securely
content_old: 10 But when ye shall pass over the Jordan, and settle down in the land which Yahweh your God is causing you to inherit,—and he shall give you rest from all your enemies round about, and ye shall dwell securely

content: 11 then shall it be, that unto the place which Yahweh your God shall choose to make a habitation for his name there thither shall ye bring in all that I am commanding you,—your ascending-offerings and your sacrifices､ your tithes､ and the heave-offering of your hand, and all your chosen vow-offerings which ye shall vow unto Yahweh.
content_old: 11 then shall it be, that unto the place which Yahweh your God shall choose to make a habitation for his name there thither shall ye bring in all that I am commanding you,—your ascending-offerings and your sacrifices､ your tithes､ and the heave-offering of your hand, and all your chosen vow-offerings which ye shall vow unto Yahweh.

content: 12 So shall ye rejoice before Yahweh your God, ye､ and your sons､ and your daughters, and your servants､ and your handmaids,—and the Levite that is within your gates, forasmuch as he hath neither portion nor inheritance with you.
content_old: 12 So shall ye rejoice before Yahweh your God, ye､ and your sons､ and your daughters, and your servants､ and your handmaids,—and the Levite that is within your gates, forasmuch as he hath neither portion nor inheritance with you.

content: 13 Take heed to thyself, lest thou cause thine ascending-sacrifice to go up in just any place which thou shalt see;
content_old: 13 Take heed to thyself, lest thou cause thine ascending-sacrifice to go up in just any place which thou shalt see;

content: 14 but in the place which Yahweh shall choose in one of thy tribes there shalt thou cause thine ascending-sacrifice to go up, and there shalt thou do all that I am commanding thee.
content_old: 14 but in the place which Yahweh shall choose in one of thy tribes there shalt thou cause thine ascending-sacrifice to go up, and there shalt thou do all that I am commanding thee.

content: 15 Howbeit of anything thy soul desireth mayest thou sacrifice and so eat flesh—according to the blessing of Yahweh thy God which he hath bestowed upon thee､ in all thy gates, the unclean and the clean may eat thereof,—as the gazelle and as the hart.
content_old: 15 Howbeit of anything thy soul desireth mayest thou sacrifice and so eat flesh—according to the blessing of Yahweh thy God which he hath bestowed upon thee､ in all thy gates, the unclean and the clean may eat thereof,—as the gazelle and as the hart.

content: 16 Howbeit the blood shall ye not eat,—upon the earth shalt thou pour it out､ like water.
content_old: 16 Howbeit the blood shall ye not eat,—upon the earth shalt thou pour it out､ like water.

content: 17 Thou mayest not eat within thy gates､ the tithe of thy corn､ or of thy new wine or of thine oil, or the firstlings of thy herd､ or of thy flock,—nor any of thy vow-offerings which thou shalt vow, nor thy freewill-offerings､ nor the heave-offering of thy hand;
content_old: 17 Thou mayest not eat within thy gates､ the tithe of thy corn､ or of thy new wine or of thine oil, or the firstlings of thy herd､ or of thy flock,—nor any of thy vow-offerings which thou shalt vow, nor thy freewill-offerings､ nor the heave-offering of thy hand;

content: 18 but before Yahweh thy God shalt thou eat it､ in the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose, thou､ and thy son､ and thy daughter､ and thy servant and thy handmaid, and the Levite who is within thy gates,—so shalt thou rejoice before Yahweh thy God, in all whereunto thou puttest thy hand.
content_old: 18 but before Yahweh thy God shalt thou eat it､ in the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose, thou､ and thy son､ and thy daughter､ and thy servant and thy handmaid, and the Levite who is within thy gates,—so shalt thou rejoice before Yahweh thy God, in all whereunto thou puttest thy hand.

content: 19 Take heed to thyself, lest thou forsake the Levite,—all thy days､ upon thy soil.
content_old: 19 Take heed to thyself, lest thou forsake the Levite,—all thy days､ upon thy soil.

content: 20 When Yahweh thy God shall enlarge thy boundary—as he hath spoken unto thee—and thou shalt say､ I would eat flesh because thy soul desireth to eat flesh of whatsoever thy soul desireth mayest thou eat flesh.
content_old: 20 When Yahweh thy God shall enlarge thy boundary—as he hath spoken unto thee—and thou shalt say､ I would eat flesh because thy soul desireth to eat flesh of whatsoever thy soul desireth mayest thou eat flesh.

content: 21 When the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose to put his name there､ shall be too far for thee then shalt thou sacrifice of thy herd or of thy flock､ which Yahweh hath given unto thee, as I have commanded thee,—and shalt eat, within thine own gates, of whatsoever thy soul desireth.
content_old: 21 When the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose to put his name there､ shall be too far for thee then shalt thou sacrifice of thy herd or of thy flock､ which Yahweh hath given unto thee, as I have commanded thee,—and shalt eat, within thine own gates, of whatsoever thy soul desireth.

content: 22 Even as the gazelle and the hart is eaten so shalt thou eat it,—the unclean and the clean alike shall eat it.
content_old: 22 Even as the gazelle and the hart is eaten so shalt thou eat it,—the unclean and the clean alike shall eat it.

content: 23 Howbeit firmly refrain from eating the blood; for the blood is the life,—therefore must thou not eat the life with the flesh.
content_old: 23 Howbeit firmly refrain from eating the blood; for the blood is the life,—therefore must thou not eat the life with the flesh.

content: 24 Thou shalt not eat it,—upon the earth shalt thou pour it out､ like water.
content_old: 24 Thou shalt not eat it,—upon the earth shalt thou pour it out､ like water.

content: 25 Thou shalt not eat it,—that it may be well with thee､ and with thy children after thee, when thou shalt do that which is right in the eyes of Yahweh.
content_old: 25 Thou shalt not eat it,—that it may be well with thee､ and with thy children after thee, when thou shalt do that which is right in the eyes of Yahweh.

content: 26 Howbeit thy holy things which thou shalt have､ and thy vow-offerings shalt thou take and come in, unto the place which Yahweh shall choose;
content_old: 26 Howbeit thy holy things which thou shalt have､ and thy vow-offerings shalt thou take and come in, unto the place which Yahweh shall choose;

content: 27 and shalt offer thine ascending-sacrifices､ the flesh and the blood､ upon the altar of Yahweh thy God,—and the blood of thine other sacrifices shall be poured out upon the altar of Yahweh thy God, and then the flesh shalt thou eat.
content_old: 27 and shalt offer thine ascending-sacrifices､ the flesh and the blood､ upon the altar of Yahweh thy God,—and the blood of thine other sacrifices shall be poured out upon the altar of Yahweh thy God, and then the flesh shalt thou eat.

content: 28 Observe and hear all these things which I am commanding thee,—that it may be well with thee､ and with thy children after thee,—unto times age-abiding, so long as thou shalt do that which is pleasing and right in the eyes of Yahweh thy God.
content_old: 28 Observe and hear all these things which I am commanding thee,—that it may be well with thee､ and with thy children after thee,—unto times age-abiding, so long as thou shalt do that which is pleasing and right in the eyes of Yahweh thy God.

content: 29 When Yahweh thy God shall cut off from before thee､ the nations whom thou art going in to dispossess,—and thou do dispossess them, and dwell in their land
content_old: 29 When Yahweh thy God shall cut off from before thee､ the nations whom thou art going in to dispossess,—and thou do dispossess them, and dwell in their land

content: 30 take heed to thyself､ lest thou be thrust after them, after they have been destroyed from before thee,—and lest thou enquire after their gods､ saying— In what manner did these nations serve their gods, that I too may do likewise?
content_old: 30 take heed to thyself､ lest thou be thrust after them, after they have been destroyed from before thee,—and lest thou enquire after their gods､ saying— In what manner did these nations serve their gods, that I too may do likewise?

content: 31 Thou shalt not do likewise unto Yahweh thy God,—for everything that is an abomination unto Yahweh､ which he doth hate have they done unto their gods, for even their sons and their daughters do they consume with fire unto their gods.
content_old: 31 Thou shalt not do likewise unto Yahweh thy God,—for everything that is an abomination unto Yahweh､ which he doth hate have they done unto their gods, for even their sons and their daughters do they consume with fire unto their gods.

content: 1 When there shall arise in thy midst—a prophet, or a dreamer of dreams,—and he shall give unto thee a sign or a wonder;
content_old: 1 When there shall arise in thy midst—a prophet, or a dreamer of dreams,—and he shall give unto thee a sign or a wonder;

content: 2 and the sign or the wonder shall come in､ whereof he spake unto thee､ saying,— Let us go after other gods､ which ye know not､ and let us serve them
content_old: 2 and the sign or the wonder shall come in､ whereof he spake unto thee､ saying,— Let us go after other gods､ which ye know not､ and let us serve them

content: 3 thou shalt not hearken unto the words of that prophet, or unto that dreamer of dreams,—for Yahweh your God is putting you to the proof to know whether ye do love Yahweh your God, with all your heart and with all your soul.
content_old: 3 thou shalt not hearken unto the words of that prophet, or unto that dreamer of dreams,—for Yahweh your God is putting you to the proof to know whether ye do love Yahweh your God, with all your heart and with all your soul.

content: 4 After Yahweh your God shall ye walk､ And him shall ye revere,— And his commandments shall ye observe､ And unto his voice shall ye hearken, And him shall ye serve､ And unto him shall ye cleave.
content_old: 4 After Yahweh your God shall ye walk､ And him shall ye revere,— And his commandments shall ye observe､ And unto his voice shall ye hearken, And him shall ye serve､ And unto him shall ye cleave.

content: 5 And that prophet､ or that dreamer of dreams shall be put to death､ because he hath spoken revolt against Yahweh your God,—who brought you forth out of the land of Egypt､ and redeemed thee out of the house of servants, to seduce thee out of the way wherein Yahweh thy God hath commanded thee to walk,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst.
content_old: 5 And that prophet､ or that dreamer of dreams shall be put to death､ because he hath spoken revolt against Yahweh your God,—who brought you forth out of the land of Egypt､ and redeemed thee out of the house of servants, to seduce thee out of the way wherein Yahweh thy God hath commanded thee to walk,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst.

content: 6 When thy brother—son of thine own mother､ or thine own son or thine own daughter､ or the wife of thy bosom､ or thy friend who is as thine own soul､ shall entice thee secretly saying,— Let us go and serve other gods, whom thou hast not known thou､ nor thy fathers;
content_old: 6 When thy brother—son of thine own mother､ or thine own son or thine own daughter､ or the wife of thy bosom､ or thy friend who is as thine own soul､ shall entice thee secretly saying,— Let us go and serve other gods, whom thou hast not known thou､ nor thy fathers;

content: 7 of the gods of the peoples who are round about you, who are near unto thee, or who are far off from thee,—from one end of the earth even unto the other end of the earth
content_old: 7 of the gods of the peoples who are round about you, who are near unto thee, or who are far off from thee,—from one end of the earth even unto the other end of the earth

content: 8 thou shalt not consent unto him, neither shalt thou hearken unto him,—neither shall thine eye look with pity upon him, neither shalt thou spare—neither shalt thou conceal him;
content_old: 8 thou shalt not consent unto him, neither shalt thou hearken unto him,—neither shall thine eye look with pity upon him, neither shalt thou spare—neither shalt thou conceal him;

content: 9 but thou shalt slay him, thine own hand shall be on him first､ to put him to death,—and the hand of all the people､ afterwards.
content_old: 9 but thou shalt slay him, thine own hand shall be on him first､ to put him to death,—and the hand of all the people､ afterwards.

content: 10 And thou shalt stone him with stones､ that he die,—for he hath sought to seduce thee from Yahweh thy God, who brought thee forth out of the land of Egypt､ out of the house of servants.
content_old: 10 And thou shalt stone him with stones､ that he die,—for he hath sought to seduce thee from Yahweh thy God, who brought thee forth out of the land of Egypt､ out of the house of servants.

content: 11 And all Israel shall hear and fear,—and shall not again do according to this wickedness､ in thy midst.
content_old: 11 And all Israel shall hear and fear,—and shall not again do according to this wickedness､ in thy midst.

content: 12 When thou shalt hear—in one of thy cities､ which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee to dwell there—saying:
content_old: 12 When thou shalt hear—in one of thy cities､ which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee to dwell there—saying:

content: 13 There have gone forth men､ sons of the Abandoned One､ out of thy midst, and have seduced the inhabitants of their city, saying,— Let us go､ and serve other gods which ye have not known;
content_old: 13 There have gone forth men､ sons of the Abandoned One､ out of thy midst, and have seduced the inhabitants of their city, saying,— Let us go､ and serve other gods which ye have not known;

content: 14 and thou shalt enquire､ and search out､ and ask diligently,—and lo! true—certain is the thing, this abomination hath been done in thy midst
content_old: 14 and thou shalt enquire､ and search out､ and ask diligently,—and lo! true—certain is the thing, this abomination hath been done in thy midst

content: 15 then shalt thou smite the inhabitants of that city with the edge of the sword, devoting it to destruction､ and all that is therein､ and the cattle thereof､ with the edge of the sword,—
content_old: 15 then shalt thou smite the inhabitants of that city with the edge of the sword, devoting it to destruction､ and all that is therein､ and the cattle thereof､ with the edge of the sword,—

content: 16 and all the spoil thereof shalt thou gather together into the midst of the broadway thereof, and shalt consume with fire the city and all the spoil thereof､ every whit unto Yahweh thy God,—and it shall be a heap unto times age-abiding, it shall be built no more.
content_old: 16 and all the spoil thereof shalt thou gather together into the midst of the broadway thereof, and shalt consume with fire the city and all the spoil thereof､ every whit unto Yahweh thy God,—and it shall be a heap unto times age-abiding, it shall be built no more.

content: 17 So shall there not cleave to thy hand aught of the devoted thing,—that Yahweh may turn away from the glow of his anger､ and grant thee compassion､ and have compassion upon thee and multiply thee, as he sware unto thy fathers:
content_old: 17 So shall there not cleave to thy hand aught of the devoted thing,—that Yahweh may turn away from the glow of his anger､ and grant thee compassion､ and have compassion upon thee and multiply thee, as he sware unto thy fathers:

content: 1 Sons are ye unto Yahweh your God,—ye shall not cut yourselves, neither shall ye put baldness between your eyes､ for the dead.
content_old: 1 Sons are ye unto Yahweh your God,—ye shall not cut yourselves, neither shall ye put baldness between your eyes､ for the dead.

content: 2 For a holy people thou art unto Yahweh thy God,—and of thee did Yahweh make choice､ that thou shouldest become his people as a treasure, above all the peoples that are on the face of the ground.
content_old: 2 For a holy people thou art unto Yahweh thy God,—and of thee did Yahweh make choice､ that thou shouldest become his people as a treasure, above all the peoples that are on the face of the ground.

content: 3 Thou shalt not eat any abominable thing.
content_old: 3 Thou shalt not eat any abominable thing.

content: 4 These are the beasts which ye may eat,—the ox, the young of sheep､ and the young of goats;
content_old: 4 These are the beasts which ye may eat,—the ox, the young of sheep､ and the young of goats;

content: 5 the hart and the gazelle､ and the roebuck,—and the wild goat and the mountain goat､ and the wild ox､ and the mountain sheep.
content_old: 5 the hart and the gazelle､ and the roebuck,—and the wild goat and the mountain goat､ and the wild ox､ and the mountain sheep.

content: 6 And every beast that parteth the hoof and cleaveth the cleft into two claws, chewing the cud､ among beasts the same shall ye eat.
content_old: 6 And every beast that parteth the hoof and cleaveth the cleft into two claws, chewing the cud､ among beasts the same shall ye eat.

content: 7 Nevertheless these shall ye not eat､ of them that chew the cud, and of them that divide the cloven hoof,—the camel､ and the hare､ and the rabbit､ for though they do chew the cud yet the hoof do they not part, unclean they are unto you.
content_old: 7 Nevertheless these shall ye not eat､ of them that chew the cud, and of them that divide the cloven hoof,—the camel､ and the hare､ and the rabbit､ for though they do chew the cud yet the hoof do they not part, unclean they are unto you.

content: 8 And the swine because though he doth divide the hoof yet he cheweth not the cud, unclean he is unto you,—of their flesh shall ye not eat, and their car-cases shall ye not touch.
content_old: 8 And the swine because though he doth divide the hoof yet he cheweth not the cud, unclean he is unto you,—of their flesh shall ye not eat, and their car-cases shall ye not touch.

content: 9 These may ye eat of all that are in the waters,—whatsoever hath fins and scales ye may eat;
content_old: 9 These may ye eat of all that are in the waters,—whatsoever hath fins and scales ye may eat;

content: 10 and whatsoever hath not fins and scales ye may not eat,—unclean it is unto you.
content_old: 10 and whatsoever hath not fins and scales ye may not eat,—unclean it is unto you.

content: 11 Of every clean bird ye may eat;
content_old: 11 Of every clean bird ye may eat;

content: 12 saving these of which ye may not eat,—the eagle and the ossifrage､ and the osprey;
content_old: 12 saving these of which ye may not eat,—the eagle and the ossifrage､ and the osprey;

content: 13 and the vulture､ and the kite, and the falcon､ after its kind;
content_old: 13 and the vulture､ and the kite, and the falcon､ after its kind;

content: 14 and every raven､ after its kind;
content_old: 14 and every raven､ after its kind;

content: 15 and the female ostrich, and the male ostrich､ and the sea-gull,—and the hawk､ after its kind;
content_old: 15 and the female ostrich, and the male ostrich､ and the sea-gull,—and the hawk､ after its kind;

content: 16 and the pelican and the bittern､ and the swan;
content_old: 16 and the pelican and the bittern､ and the swan;

content: 17 and the vomiting pelican and the little vulture､ and the gannet;
content_old: 17 and the vomiting pelican and the little vulture､ and the gannet;

content: 18 and the stork, and the parrot､ after its kind,—and the mountain-cock､ and the bat.
content_old: 18 and the stork, and the parrot､ after its kind,—and the mountain-cock､ and the bat.

content: 19 And as for every creeping thing that flieth unclean it is unto you,—they shall not be eaten
content_old: 19 And as for every creeping thing that flieth unclean it is unto you,—they shall not be eaten

content: 20 All clean fowls ye may eat.
content_old: 20 All clean fowls ye may eat.

content: 21 Ye shall not eat any thing that dieth of itself: to the sojourner who is within thy gates mayest thou give it and he may eat it､ or thou mayest sell it to a foreigner, for a holy people art thou､ unto Yahweh thy God. Thou shalt not boil a kid､ in the milk of its dam.
content_old: 21 Ye shall not eat any thing that dieth of itself: to the sojourner who is within thy gates mayest thou give it and he may eat it､ or thou mayest sell it to a foreigner, for a holy people art thou､ unto Yahweh thy God. Thou shalt not boil a kid､ in the milk of its dam.

content: 22 Thou shalt surely tithe all the increase of thy seed,—which the field bringeth forth year by year.
content_old: 22 Thou shalt surely tithe all the increase of thy seed,—which the field bringeth forth year by year.

content: 23 And thou shalt eat､ before Yahweh thy God—in the place which he shall choose､ to make a habitation for his name there,—the tithe of thy corn､ thy new wine and thine oil, and the firstlings of thy herd､ and of thy flock,—that thou mayest learn to revere Yahweh thy God､ all the days.
content_old: 23 And thou shalt eat､ before Yahweh thy God—in the place which he shall choose､ to make a habitation for his name there,—the tithe of thy corn､ thy new wine and thine oil, and the firstlings of thy herd､ and of thy flock,—that thou mayest learn to revere Yahweh thy God､ all the days.

content: 24 But when the way becometh too long for thee､ because thou canst not carry it, because the place is too far for thee､ which Yahweh thy God shall choose to put his name､ there,—because Yahweh thy God blesseth thee
content_old: 24 But when the way becometh too long for thee､ because thou canst not carry it, because the place is too far for thee､ which Yahweh thy God shall choose to put his name､ there,—because Yahweh thy God blesseth thee

content: 25 then shalt thou turn it into silver,—and shalt bind up the silver in thy hand, and shalt journey unto the place､ which Yahweh thy God shall choose;
content_old: 25 then shalt thou turn it into silver,—and shalt bind up the silver in thy hand, and shalt journey unto the place､ which Yahweh thy God shall choose;

content: 26 and shalt turn the silver into whatsoever thy soul desireth—of the herd or of the flock､ or of wine､ or of strong drink, or of whatsoever thy soul shall ask thee for,—and shalt eat it there､ before Yahweh thy God, and shalt rejoice､ thou and thy household
content_old: 26 and shalt turn the silver into whatsoever thy soul desireth—of the herd or of the flock､ or of wine､ or of strong drink, or of whatsoever thy soul shall ask thee for,—and shalt eat it there､ before Yahweh thy God, and shalt rejoice､ thou and thy household

content: 27 and the Levite who is within thy gates thou shalt not forsake him,—for he hath neither portion nor inheritance with thee.
content_old: 27 and the Levite who is within thy gates thou shalt not forsake him,—for he hath neither portion nor inheritance with thee.

content: 28 At the end of three years shalt thou bring forth all the tithe of thine increase､ in that year,—and shalt lay it up within thy gates;
content_old: 28 At the end of three years shalt thou bring forth all the tithe of thine increase､ in that year,—and shalt lay it up within thy gates;

content: 1 At the end of seven years shalt thou make a release.
content_old: 1 At the end of seven years shalt thou make a release.

content: 2 And this shall be the manner of the release, Every creditor who lendeth aught to his neighbour his hand shall release it,—he shall not exact it of his neighbour or his brother, because there hath been proclaimed a release､ unto Yahweh.
content_old: 2 And this shall be the manner of the release, Every creditor who lendeth aught to his neighbour his hand shall release it,—he shall not exact it of his neighbour or his brother, because there hath been proclaimed a release､ unto Yahweh.

content: 3 Of a foreigner thou mayest exact it,—but what thou hast with thy brother thy hand shall release;
content_old: 3 Of a foreigner thou mayest exact it,—but what thou hast with thy brother thy hand shall release;

content: 4 save when there shall be among you no needy person,—for Yahweh will indeed bless thee, in the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee as an inheritance､ to possess it:
content_old: 4 save when there shall be among you no needy person,—for Yahweh will indeed bless thee, in the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee as an inheritance､ to possess it:

content: 5 only if thou do hearken unto the voice of Yahweh thy God,—to observe to do—all this commandment which I am commanding thee to-day.
content_old: 5 only if thou do hearken unto the voice of Yahweh thy God,—to observe to do—all this commandment which I am commanding thee to-day.

content: 6 When Yahweh thy God hath blessed thee, as he spake unto thee then shalt thou lend unto many nations､ but thou shalt not borrow, and､ thou shalt rule over many nations､ but over thee shall they not rule.
content_old: 6 When Yahweh thy God hath blessed thee, as he spake unto thee then shalt thou lend unto many nations､ but thou shalt not borrow, and､ thou shalt rule over many nations､ but over thee shall they not rule.

content: 7 When there cometh to be among you a needy person､ any one of thy brethren､ within any one of thy gates, in thy land､ which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee thou shalt not harden thy heart､ nor shut thy hand from thy needy brother;
content_old: 7 When there cometh to be among you a needy person､ any one of thy brethren､ within any one of thy gates, in thy land､ which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee thou shalt not harden thy heart､ nor shut thy hand from thy needy brother;

content: 8 but thou shalt open thy hand unto him,—and lend him､ enough to meet the poverty which doth impoverish him.
content_old: 8 but thou shalt open thy hand unto him,—and lend him､ enough to meet the poverty which doth impoverish him.

content: 9 Take thou heed to thyself､ lest there be something near thine abandoned heart､ saying— Drawing nigh is the seventh year､ the year of release､ and so thine eye be evil against thy needy brother, and thou give not unto him,—and he cry out against thee､ unto Yahweh, and it become in thee､ a sin!
content_old: 9 Take thou heed to thyself､ lest there be something near thine abandoned heart､ saying— Drawing nigh is the seventh year､ the year of release､ and so thine eye be evil against thy needy brother, and thou give not unto him,—and he cry out against thee､ unto Yahweh, and it become in thee､ a sin!

content: 10 Thou shalt give unto him, and thy heart shall not be evil when thou givest unto him,—for on account of this very thing will Yahweh thy God bless thee, in all that thou doest､ and in all whereunto thou puttest thy hand.
content_old: 10 Thou shalt give unto him, and thy heart shall not be evil when thou givest unto him,—for on account of this very thing will Yahweh thy God bless thee, in all that thou doest､ and in all whereunto thou puttest thy hand.

content: 11 For the needy will not cease out of the midst of the land､—for this cause am I commanding thee��� saying, Thou shalt open thy hand unto thy brother､ to thy poor and to thy needy､ in thy land.
content_old: 11 For the needy will not cease out of the midst of the land､—for this cause am I commanding thee��� saying, Thou shalt open thy hand unto thy brother､ to thy poor and to thy needy､ in thy land.

content: 12 When thy brother､ a Hebrew man (or a Hebrew woman) selleth himself unto thee then shall he serve thee six years,—and in the seventh year shalt thou let him go out free､ from thee;
content_old: 12 When thy brother､ a Hebrew man (or a Hebrew woman) selleth himself unto thee then shall he serve thee six years,—and in the seventh year shalt thou let him go out free､ from thee;

content: 13 and when thou lettest him go out free､ from thee thou shalt not let him go out empty:
content_old: 13 and when thou lettest him go out free､ from thee thou shalt not let him go out empty:

content: 14 thou shalt richly load him out of thy flock, and out of thy threshing-floor､ and out of thy wine-vat,—of that wherewith Yahweh thy God hath blessed thee shalt thou give unto him;
content_old: 14 thou shalt richly load him out of thy flock, and out of thy threshing-floor､ and out of thy wine-vat,—of that wherewith Yahweh thy God hath blessed thee shalt thou give unto him;

content: 15 and thou shalt remember､ that a servant thou wast､ in the land of Egypt, and that Yahweh thy God redeemed thee,—for this cause am I commanding thee this thing､ to-day.
content_old: 15 and thou shalt remember､ that a servant thou wast､ in the land of Egypt, and that Yahweh thy God redeemed thee,—for this cause am I commanding thee this thing､ to-day.

content: 16 And it shall be if he shall say unto thee, I will not go away from thee,— because he loveth thee､ and thy household, because he is well off with thee
content_old: 16 And it shall be if he shall say unto thee, I will not go away from thee,— because he loveth thee､ and thy household, because he is well off with thee

content: 17 then shalt thou take an awl､ and thrust it through his ear unto the door, so shall he be thy servant all his life. And unto thine handmaid also shalt thou do thus.
content_old: 17 then shalt thou take an awl､ and thrust it through his ear unto the door, so shall he be thy servant all his life. And unto thine handmaid also shalt thou do thus.

content: 18 It shall not be hard in thine eyes､ when thou lettest him go out free､ from thee; for to the double of the hire of a hireling hath he served thee､ six years,—so will Yahweh thy God bless thee､ in all that thou doest.
content_old: 18 It shall not be hard in thine eyes､ when thou lettest him go out free､ from thee; for to the double of the hire of a hireling hath he served thee､ six years,—so will Yahweh thy God bless thee､ in all that thou doest.

content: 19 Every firstling that is brought forth in thy herd and in thy flock､ that is a male shalt thou hallow unto Yahweh thy God,—thou shalt not work with a firstling of thine oxen, neither shalt thou shear a firstling of thy flock:
content_old: 19 Every firstling that is brought forth in thy herd and in thy flock､ that is a male shalt thou hallow unto Yahweh thy God,—thou shalt not work with a firstling of thine oxen, neither shalt thou shear a firstling of thy flock:

content: 20 before Yahweh thy God shalt thou eat it､ year by year, in the place which Yahweh shall choose,—thou､ and thy household.
content_old: 20 before Yahweh thy God shalt thou eat it､ year by year, in the place which Yahweh shall choose,—thou､ and thy household.

content: 21 But when there is in it any blemish､ lameness or blindness, any ill blemish thou shalt not sacrifice it unto Yahweh thy God:
content_old: 21 But when there is in it any blemish､ lameness or blindness, any ill blemish thou shalt not sacrifice it unto Yahweh thy God:

content: 22 within thine own gates mayest thou eat it,—the unclean of you and the clean､ alike, as the gazelle and as the hart.
content_old: 22 within thine own gates mayest thou eat it,—the unclean of you and the clean､ alike, as the gazelle and as the hart.

content: 1 Observe the month of Abib, when thou shalt keep a passover unto Yahweh thy God,—for in the month of Abib did Yahweh thy God bring thee forth out of Egypt､ by night:
content_old: 1 Observe the month of Abib, when thou shalt keep a passover unto Yahweh thy God,—for in the month of Abib did Yahweh thy God bring thee forth out of Egypt､ by night:

content: 2 therefore shalt thou sacrifice a passover unto Yahweh thy God､ of flock or herd,—in the place which Yahweh shall choose､ to make a habitation for his name there.
content_old: 2 therefore shalt thou sacrifice a passover unto Yahweh thy God､ of flock or herd,—in the place which Yahweh shall choose､ to make a habitation for his name there.

content: 3 Thou shalt not eat therewith､ any thing leavened, seven days shalt thou eat therewith unleavened cakes､ the bread of humiliation,—for in haste camest thou forth out of the land of Egypt, that thou mayest remember the day when thou camest forth out of the land of Egypt, all the days of thy life.
content_old: 3 Thou shalt not eat therewith､ any thing leavened, seven days shalt thou eat therewith unleavened cakes､ the bread of humiliation,—for in haste camest thou forth out of the land of Egypt, that thou mayest remember the day when thou camest forth out of the land of Egypt, all the days of thy life.

content: 4 And there shall not be seen with thee leaven､ in any of thy bounds､ seven days,—neither shall there remain all night of the flesh which thou shalt sacrifice in the evening､ on the first day､ unto the morning.
content_old: 4 And there shall not be seen with thee leaven､ in any of thy bounds､ seven days,—neither shall there remain all night of the flesh which thou shalt sacrifice in the evening､ on the first day､ unto the morning.

content: 5 Thou mayest not sacrifice the passover,—within any of thine own gates､ which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee;
content_old: 5 Thou mayest not sacrifice the passover,—within any of thine own gates､ which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee;

content: 6 but in the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose to make a habitation for his name there shalt thou sacrifice the passover､ in the evening,—at the going in of the sun, at the very time thou camest forth out of Egypt.
content_old: 6 but in the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose to make a habitation for his name there shalt thou sacrifice the passover､ in the evening,—at the going in of the sun, at the very time thou camest forth out of Egypt.

content: 7 Therefore shalt thou cook and eat it in the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose,—and shalt turn away in the morning, and go thy way unto thy tents.
content_old: 7 Therefore shalt thou cook and eat it in the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose,—and shalt turn away in the morning, and go thy way unto thy tents.

content: 8 Six days shalt thou eat unleavened cakes,—and on the seventh day shall be a closing feast､ unto Yahweh thy God, thou shalt do no work.
content_old: 8 Six days shalt thou eat unleavened cakes,—and on the seventh day shall be a closing feast､ unto Yahweh thy God, thou shalt do no work.

content: 9 Seven weeks shalt thou count unto thee,—from the beginning of thrusting in the sickle into the standing corn shalt thou begin to count, seven weeks.
content_old: 9 Seven weeks shalt thou count unto thee,—from the beginning of thrusting in the sickle into the standing corn shalt thou begin to count, seven weeks.

content: 10 So shalt thou keep the festival of weeks unto Yahweh thy God, in the measure of the freewill offering of thy hand､ which thou shalt give,—as Yahweh thy God shall bless thee.
content_old: 10 So shalt thou keep the festival of weeks unto Yahweh thy God, in the measure of the freewill offering of thy hand､ which thou shalt give,—as Yahweh thy God shall bless thee.

content: 11 So shalt thou rejoice before Yahweh thy God—thou､ and thy son and thy daughter､ and thy servant and thy handmaid, and the Levite who is within thy gates, and the sojourner, and the fatherless and the widow､ who are in thy midst,—in the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose, to make a habitation for his name there.
content_old: 11 So shalt thou rejoice before Yahweh thy God—thou､ and thy son and thy daughter､ and thy servant and thy handmaid, and the Levite who is within thy gates, and the sojourner, and the fatherless and the widow､ who are in thy midst,—in the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose, to make a habitation for his name there.

content: 12 So shalt thou remember that a servant thou wast､ in Egypt,—and shalt observe and do these statutes.
content_old: 12 So shalt thou remember that a servant thou wast､ in Egypt,—and shalt observe and do these statutes.

content: 13 The festival of booths shalt thou keep for thyself､ seven days,—when thou hast gathered in out of thy threshing-floor､ and out of thy wine-vat.
content_old: 13 The festival of booths shalt thou keep for thyself､ seven days,—when thou hast gathered in out of thy threshing-floor､ and out of thy wine-vat.

content: 14 And thou shalt rejoice､ in thy festival,—thou､ and thy son and thy daughter､ and thy servant and thy handmaid, and the Levite and the sojourner､ and the fatherless and the widow､ who are within thy gates.
content_old: 14 And thou shalt rejoice､ in thy festival,—thou､ and thy son and thy daughter､ and thy servant and thy handmaid, and the Levite and the sojourner､ and the fatherless and the widow､ who are within thy gates.

content: 15 Seven days shalt thou keep festival unto Yahweh thy God, in the place which Yahweh shall choose,—for Yahweh thy God will bless thee in all thine increase､ and in all the work of thy hands,—therefore shalt thou do nothing but rejoice.
content_old: 15 Seven days shalt thou keep festival unto Yahweh thy God, in the place which Yahweh shall choose,—for Yahweh thy God will bless thee in all thine increase､ and in all the work of thy hands,—therefore shalt thou do nothing but rejoice.

content: 16 Three times in the year shall each one of thy males see the face of Yahweh thy God､ in the place which he shall choose, at the festival of unleavened cakes､ and at the festival of weeks､ and at the festival of booths,—and none shall see the face of Yahweh empty-handed:
content_old: 16 Three times in the year shall each one of thy males see the face of Yahweh thy God､ in the place which he shall choose, at the festival of unleavened cakes､ and at the festival of weeks､ and at the festival of booths,—and none shall see the face of Yahweh empty-handed:

content: 17 every man according as his hand can give,—according to the blessing of Yahweh thy God､ which he hath bestowed upon thee.
content_old: 17 every man according as his hand can give,—according to the blessing of Yahweh thy God､ which he hath bestowed upon thee.

content: 18 Judges and officers shalt thou appoint thee､ in all thy gates, which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee､ by thy tribes,—and they shall judge the people､ with righteous judgment.
content_old: 18 Judges and officers shalt thou appoint thee､ in all thy gates, which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee､ by thy tribes,—and they shall judge the people､ with righteous judgment.

content: 19 Thou shalt not wrest judgment, thou shalt not take note of faces,—nor shalt thou accept a bribe, for the bribe blindeth the eyes of wise men, and perverteth the words of righteous men.
content_old: 19 Thou shalt not wrest judgment, thou shalt not take note of faces,—nor shalt thou accept a bribe, for the bribe blindeth the eyes of wise men, and perverteth the words of righteous men.

content: 20 What is right､ what is right shalt thou pursue,—that thou mayest live､ and possess the land, which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee.
content_old: 20 What is right､ what is right shalt thou pursue,—that thou mayest live､ and possess the land, which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee.

content: 21 Thou shalt not plant thee､ as a sacred stem､ any tree,—near unto the altar of Yahweh thy God�� which thou shalt make for thyself;
content_old: 21 Thou shalt not plant thee､ as a sacred stem､ any tree,—near unto the altar of Yahweh thy God�� which thou shalt make for thyself;

content: 1 Thou shalt not sacrifice unto Yahweh thy God､ a bullock or a sheep wherein is a blemish, any unseemly thing: for an abomination unto Yahweh thy God it would be.
content_old: 1 Thou shalt not sacrifice unto Yahweh thy God､ a bullock or a sheep wherein is a blemish, any unseemly thing: for an abomination unto Yahweh thy God it would be.

content: 2 When there shall be found in thy midst､ within any of thy gates, which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee, man or woman who doeth the thing which is wicked in the eyes of Yahweh thy God､ by transgressing his covenant;
content_old: 2 When there shall be found in thy midst､ within any of thy gates, which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee, man or woman who doeth the thing which is wicked in the eyes of Yahweh thy God､ by transgressing his covenant;

content: 3 yea hath gone､ and served other gods, and bowed down unto them,—whether unto the sun or unto the moon､ or unto any of the host of the heavens､ which I have not commanded;
content_old: 3 yea hath gone､ and served other gods, and bowed down unto them,—whether unto the sun or unto the moon､ or unto any of the host of the heavens､ which I have not commanded;

content: 4 and it shall be told thee､ and thou shalt hear,—and shalt enquire diligently, and lo! true—certain is the report, this abominable thing hath been done in Israel
content_old: 4 and it shall be told thee､ and thou shalt hear,—and shalt enquire diligently, and lo! true—certain is the report, this abominable thing hath been done in Israel

content: 5 then shalt thou bring forth that man､ or that woman､ who hath done this wicked thing､ within thy gates—the man, or the woman,—and shalt stone them with stones､ that they die.
content_old: 5 then shalt thou bring forth that man､ or that woman､ who hath done this wicked thing､ within thy gates—the man, or the woman,—and shalt stone them with stones､ that they die.
