content: 6 At the mouth of two witnesses､ or three witnesses shall he that is to die be put to death,—he shall not be put to death at the mouth of one witness.
content_old: 6 At the mouth of two witnesses､ or three witnesses shall he that is to die be put to death,—he shall not be put to death at the mouth of one witness.

content: 7 The hand of the witnesses shall be upon him first to put him to death, and the hand of all the people afterwards,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst.
content_old: 7 The hand of the witnesses shall be upon him first to put him to death, and the hand of all the people afterwards,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst.

content: 8 When any matter of judgment shall be too difficult for thee—between blood and blood､ between plea and plea､ or between stroke and stroke, matters of contention within thy gates then shalt thou arise and go up unto the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose;
content_old: 8 When any matter of judgment shall be too difficult for thee—between blood and blood､ between plea and plea､ or between stroke and stroke, matters of contention within thy gates then shalt thou arise and go up unto the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose;

content: 9 and shalt come in unto the priests､ the Levites, and unto the judge､ who shall be in those days,—and shalt enquire､ and they shall declare unto thee､ the sentence of judgment;
content_old: 9 and shalt come in unto the priests､ the Levites, and unto the judge､ who shall be in those days,—and shalt enquire､ and they shall declare unto thee､ the sentence of judgment;

content: 10 and thou shalt do according to the sentence which they shall declare unto thee, out of that place､ which Yahweh shall choose,—yea thou shalt observe to do according to all which they shall direct thee:
content_old: 10 and thou shalt do according to the sentence which they shall declare unto thee, out of that place､ which Yahweh shall choose,—yea thou shalt observe to do according to all which they shall direct thee:

content: 11 according to the direction wherewith they direct thee､ and after the judgment which they shall announce to thee shalt thou do,—thou shalt not turn aside from the sentence which they shall declare unto thee to the right hand or to the left.
content_old: 11 according to the direction wherewith they direct thee､ and after the judgment which they shall announce to thee shalt thou do,—thou shalt not turn aside from the sentence which they shall declare unto thee to the right hand or to the left.

content: 12 And the man who shall do presumptuously by not hearkening unto the priest that standeth to minister there to Yahweh thy God, or unto the judge that man shall die, and so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of Israel.
content_old: 12 And the man who shall do presumptuously by not hearkening unto the priest that standeth to minister there to Yahweh thy God, or unto the judge that man shall die, and so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of Israel.

content: 13 And all the people shall hear and fear,—and shall not act presumptuously any more.
content_old: 13 And all the people shall hear and fear,—and shall not act presumptuously any more.

content: 14 When thou shalt enter into the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee, and shalt possess it and dwell therein,—and shalt say— I will set over me a king, like all the nations that are round about me
content_old: 14 When thou shalt enter into the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee, and shalt possess it and dwell therein,—and shalt say— I will set over me a king, like all the nations that are round about me

content: 15 thou shalt set over thee as king､ him whom Yahweh thy God shall choose,—out of the midst of thy brethren shalt thou set over thee a king, thou mayest not appoint over thee a man that is a foreigner, who is not thy brother.
content_old: 15 thou shalt set over thee as king､ him whom Yahweh thy God shall choose,—out of the midst of thy brethren shalt thou set over thee a king, thou mayest not appoint over thee a man that is a foreigner, who is not thy brother.

content: 16 Moreover he shall not multiply to himself horses, neither shall he cause the people to return to Egypt that he may multiply horses,—when Yahweh hath said unto you, Ye shall not again return this way any more.
content_old: 16 Moreover he shall not multiply to himself horses, neither shall he cause the people to return to Egypt that he may multiply horses,—when Yahweh hath said unto you, Ye shall not again return this way any more.

content: 17 Neither shall he multiply to himself wives, that his heart turn not aside,—nor silver and gold shall he multiply to himself greatly.
content_old: 17 Neither shall he multiply to himself wives, that his heart turn not aside,—nor silver and gold shall he multiply to himself greatly.

content: 18 But it shall be when he sitteth upon the throne of his kingdom then shall he write for himself a copy of this law upon a scroll､ out of that which is before the priests､ the Levites:
content_old: 18 But it shall be when he sitteth upon the throne of his kingdom then shall he write for himself a copy of this law upon a scroll､ out of that which is before the priests､ the Levites:

content: 19 so shall it be with him, and he shall read therein all the days of his life,—that he may learn to revere Yahweh his God, to observe all the words of this law and these statutes to do them:
content_old: 19 so shall it be with him, and he shall read therein all the days of his life,—that he may learn to revere Yahweh his God, to observe all the words of this law and these statutes to do them:

content: 1 Neither the priests the Levites nor any of the tribe of Levi, shall have either portion or inheritance with Israel,—the altar-flames of Yahweh and his inheritance shall they eat.
content_old: 1 Neither the priests the Levites nor any of the tribe of Levi, shall have either portion or inheritance with Israel,—the altar-flames of Yahweh and his inheritance shall they eat.

content: 2 But inheritance shall he not have､ in the midst of his brethren,—Yahweh is his inheritance, as he spake unto him.
content_old: 2 But inheritance shall he not have､ in the midst of his brethren,—Yahweh is his inheritance, as he spake unto him.

content: 3 This therefore shall be the due of the priests from the people from them who offer the sacrifice whether ox or lamb,—there shall be given unto the priest, the shoulder and the two cheeks､ and the maw:
content_old: 3 This therefore shall be the due of the priests from the people from them who offer the sacrifice whether ox or lamb,—there shall be given unto the priest, the shoulder and the two cheeks､ and the maw:

content: 4 the firstfruit of thy corn､ thy new wine and thine oil and the first of the fleece of thy flock shalt thou give unto him.
content_old: 4 the firstfruit of thy corn､ thy new wine and thine oil and the first of the fleece of thy flock shalt thou give unto him.

content: 5 For of him hath Yahweh thy God made choice out of all thy tribes,—to stand to minister in the name of Yahweh of him and his sons all the days.
content_old: 5 For of him hath Yahweh thy God made choice out of all thy tribes,—to stand to minister in the name of Yahweh of him and his sons all the days.

content: 6 And when the Levite shall come in out of any of thy gates out of any part of Israel, where he is sojourning,—yea､ shall come in with all the desire of his soul, into the place which Yahweh shall choose
content_old: 6 And when the Levite shall come in out of any of thy gates out of any part of Israel, where he is sojourning,—yea､ shall come in with all the desire of his soul, into the place which Yahweh shall choose

content: 7 then may he minister in the name of Yahweh his God,—like any of his brethren the Levites who are standing there before Yahweh.
content_old: 7 then may he minister in the name of Yahweh his God,—like any of his brethren the Levites who are standing there before Yahweh.

content: 8 Portion for portion shall they eat,—apart from his possessions upon his patrimony.
content_old: 8 Portion for portion shall they eat,—apart from his possessions upon his patrimony.

content: 9 When thou art coming into the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee thou shalt not learn to do according to the abominable doings of those nations.
content_old: 9 When thou art coming into the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee thou shalt not learn to do according to the abominable doings of those nations.

content: 10 There shall not be found in thy midst— One who causeth his son or his daughter to pass through fire,— Or who useth divination, hidden arts or enchantments Or who muttereth incantations;
content_old: 10 There shall not be found in thy midst— One who causeth his son or his daughter to pass through fire,— Or who useth divination, hidden arts or enchantments Or who muttereth incantations;

content: 11 Or who bindeth with spells,— Or who asketh of a familiar spirit or an oracle, Or who seeketh unto the dead.
content_old: 11 Or who bindeth with spells,— Or who asketh of a familiar spirit or an oracle, Or who seeketh unto the dead.

content: 12 For an abomination unto Yahweh is everyone who doeth these things,—and on account of these abominations is Yahweh thy God dispossessing them from before thee.
content_old: 12 For an abomination unto Yahweh is everyone who doeth these things,—and on account of these abominations is Yahweh thy God dispossessing them from before thee.

content: 13 Blameless shalt thou be､ with, Yahweh thy God;
content_old: 13 Blameless shalt thou be､ with, Yahweh thy God;

content: 14 for these nations whom thou art dispossessing unto them who use hidden arts and unto diviners do hearken, but as for thee not so doth Yahweh thy God suffer thee.
content_old: 14 for these nations whom thou art dispossessing unto them who use hidden arts and unto diviners do hearken, but as for thee not so doth Yahweh thy God suffer thee.

content: 15 A prophet out of thy midst､ of thy brethren､ like unto me will Yahweh thy God raise up unto thee—unto him shall ye hearken:—
content_old: 15 A prophet out of thy midst､ of thy brethren､ like unto me will Yahweh thy God raise up unto thee—unto him shall ye hearken:—

content: 16 according to all which thou didst ask of Yahweh thy God､ in Horeb, in the day of the convocation､ saying,— Let me no further hearken unto the voice of Yahweh my God, and this great fire let me not see any more､ lest I die.
content_old: 16 according to all which thou didst ask of Yahweh thy God､ in Horeb, in the day of the convocation､ saying,— Let me no further hearken unto the voice of Yahweh my God, and this great fire let me not see any more､ lest I die.

content: 17 And Yahweh said unto me: They have well said what they have spoken.
content_old: 17 And Yahweh said unto me: They have well said what they have spoken.

content: 18 A prophet will I raise up unto them､ out of the midst of their brethren､ like unto thee,—and I will put my words in his mouth, so shall he speak unto them whatsoever I shall command him.
content_old: 18 A prophet will I raise up unto them､ out of the midst of their brethren､ like unto thee,—and I will put my words in his mouth, so shall he speak unto them whatsoever I shall command him.

content: 19 And it shall come to pass､ that the man who will not hearken unto my words､ which he shall speak in my name I､ myself will require it of him.
content_old: 19 And it shall come to pass､ that the man who will not hearken unto my words､ which he shall speak in my name I､ myself will require it of him.

content: 20 Howbeit the prophet who shall presume to speak a word in my name��� which I have not commanded him to speak, or who shall speak in the name of other gods that prophet shall die.
content_old: 20 Howbeit the prophet who shall presume to speak a word in my name��� which I have not commanded him to speak, or who shall speak in the name of other gods that prophet shall die.

content: 21 And when thou shalt say in thy heart,— In what manner shall we know the word which Yahwh hath not spoken?
content_old: 21 And when thou shalt say in thy heart,— In what manner shall we know the word which Yahwh hath not spoken?

content: 1 When Yahweh thy God shall cut off the nations､ whose land Yahweh thy God is giving thee,—and thou shalt dispossess them､ and dwell in their cities､ and in their houses
content_old: 1 When Yahweh thy God shall cut off the nations､ whose land Yahweh thy God is giving thee,—and thou shalt dispossess them､ and dwell in their cities､ and in their houses

content: 2 three cities shalt thou set apart for thee,—in the midst of thy land which Yahweh thy God is giving thee to possess.
content_old: 2 three cities shalt thou set apart for thee,—in the midst of thy land which Yahweh thy God is giving thee to possess.

content: 3 Thou shalt prepare for thee a way, and shalt divide into three parts the boundary of thy land which Yahweh thy God shall cause thee to inherit,—and it shall be､ that every manslayer shall flee thither.
content_old: 3 Thou shalt prepare for thee a way, and shalt divide into three parts the boundary of thy land which Yahweh thy God shall cause thee to inherit,—and it shall be､ that every manslayer shall flee thither.

content: 4 And this is the case of the manslayer, who shall flee thither and live,—Whoso shall smite his neighbour unwittingly, he not having hated him aforetime;
content_old: 4 And this is the case of the manslayer, who shall flee thither and live,—Whoso shall smite his neighbour unwittingly, he not having hated him aforetime;

content: 5 as when one entereth with his neighbour into a forest､ to fell trees, and his hand fetcheth a stroke with the axe､ to cut down the tree, and the head flieth off from the handle, and lighteth upon his neighbour､ that he die he shall flee into one of these cities､ and live;
content_old: 5 as when one entereth with his neighbour into a forest､ to fell trees, and his hand fetcheth a stroke with the axe､ to cut down the tree, and the head flieth off from the handle, and lighteth upon his neighbour､ that he die he shall flee into one of these cities､ and live;

content: 6 lest the blood redeemer pursue the manslayer､ because his heart is hot, and overtake him､ because the way is long､ and he smite him so as to take away his life,—he not being worthy of death, seeing that he had not been hating him､ aforetime.
content_old: 6 lest the blood redeemer pursue the manslayer､ because his heart is hot, and overtake him､ because the way is long､ and he smite him so as to take away his life,—he not being worthy of death, seeing that he had not been hating him､ aforetime.

content: 7 For this cause am I commanding thee､ saying,—Three cities shalt thou set apart for thee.
content_old: 7 For this cause am I commanding thee､ saying,—Three cities shalt thou set apart for thee.

content: 8 But if Yahweh thy God should enlarge thy bounds, as he sware unto thy fathers,—and should give thee all the land､ which he spake of giving unto thy fathers;
content_old: 8 But if Yahweh thy God should enlarge thy bounds, as he sware unto thy fathers,—and should give thee all the land､ which he spake of giving unto thy fathers;

content: 9 because thou dost observe all this commandment､ to do it which I am commanding thee to-day, to love Yahweh thy God､ and to walk in his paths all the days then shalt thou add unto thee yet three cities､ unto these three;
content_old: 9 because thou dost observe all this commandment､ to do it which I am commanding thee to-day, to love Yahweh thy God､ and to walk in his paths all the days then shalt thou add unto thee yet three cities､ unto these three;

content: 10 that innocent blood may not be shed､ in the midst of thy land, which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee､ as an inheritance,—and so shed-blood be upon thee.
content_old: 10 that innocent blood may not be shed､ in the midst of thy land, which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee､ as an inheritance,—and so shed-blood be upon thee.

content: 11 But when any man shall be hating his neighbour, and shall lie in wait for him､ and rise up against him, and smite him so as to take away his life､ that he dieth,—and shall then flee into one of these cities
content_old: 11 But when any man shall be hating his neighbour, and shall lie in wait for him､ and rise up against him, and smite him so as to take away his life､ that he dieth,—and shall then flee into one of these cities

content: 12 then shall the elders of his city send and fetch him from thence,—and deliver him into the hand of the blood redeemer､ that he die;
content_old: 12 then shall the elders of his city send and fetch him from thence,—and deliver him into the hand of the blood redeemer､ that he die;

content: 13 thine eye shall not look with pity upon him,—so shalt thou consume the shedding of innocent blood out of Israel and it shall go well with thee.
content_old: 13 thine eye shall not look with pity upon him,—so shalt thou consume the shedding of innocent blood out of Israel and it shall go well with thee.

content: 14 Thou shalt not move back the boundary of thy neighbour, by which they set bounds at first,—in thine inheritance which thou shalt receive､ in the land which Yahweh thy God is giving thee to possess.
content_old: 14 Thou shalt not move back the boundary of thy neighbour, by which they set bounds at first,—in thine inheritance which thou shalt receive､ in the land which Yahweh thy God is giving thee to possess.

content: 15 One witness shall not rise up against a man for any iniquity､ or for any sin, with regard to any sin that he may commit,—at the mouth of two witnesses､ or at the mouth of three witnesses must a matter be established.
content_old: 15 One witness shall not rise up against a man for any iniquity､ or for any sin, with regard to any sin that he may commit,—at the mouth of two witnesses､ or at the mouth of three witnesses must a matter be established.

content: 16 When there shall rise up a wrongful witness against a man,—to answer against him､ perversely
content_old: 16 When there shall rise up a wrongful witness against a man,—to answer against him､ perversely

content: 17 then shall the two men who are at variance､ stand before Yahweh,—before the priests and the judges､ who shall be in those days;
content_old: 17 then shall the two men who are at variance､ stand before Yahweh,—before the priests and the judges､ who shall be in those days;

content: 18 and the judges shall make diligent inquisition,—and lo! if the witness be a false witness and falsely have answered against his brother
content_old: 18 and the judges shall make diligent inquisition,—and lo! if the witness be a false witness and falsely have answered against his brother

content: 19 then shall ye do unto him as he had thought to do unto his brother,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst;
content_old: 19 then shall ye do unto him as he had thought to do unto his brother,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst;

content: 20 and they who remain shall hear and fear,—and not go on to do again according to this wicked thing､ in thy midst:
content_old: 20 and they who remain shall hear and fear,—and not go on to do again according to this wicked thing､ in thy midst:

content: 1 When thou shalt go out to wage war against thine enemy､ and shalt see the horses and chariots of a people more in number than thou thou shalt not be afraid of them,—for Yahweh thy God is with thee, who brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.
content_old: 1 When thou shalt go out to wage war against thine enemy､ and shalt see the horses and chariots of a people more in number than thou thou shalt not be afraid of them,—for Yahweh thy God is with thee, who brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.

content: 2 And it shall be, when ye are coming nigh unto the battle that the priest shall approach and speak unto the people;
content_old: 2 And it shall be, when ye are coming nigh unto the battle that the priest shall approach and speak unto the people;

content: 3 and shall say unto them,— Hear､ O Israel, ye are coming near､ to-day､ unto battle､ against your enemies,—let not your heart faint､ do not fear､ nor start､ nor quake､ because of them.
content_old: 3 and shall say unto them,— Hear､ O Israel, ye are coming near､ to-day､ unto battle､ against your enemies,—let not your heart faint､ do not fear､ nor start､ nor quake､ because of them.

content: 4 For Yahweh your God is he that is going with you,—to fight for you against your enemies､ to save you.
content_old: 4 For Yahweh your God is he that is going with you,—to fight for you against your enemies､ to save you.

content: 5 Then shall the officers speak unto the people､ saying, Who is the man that hath built a new house､ and hath not dedicated it? let him go､ and return unto his house,—lest he die in the battle, and another man dedicate it.
content_old: 5 Then shall the officers speak unto the people､ saying, Who is the man that hath built a new house､ and hath not dedicated it? let him go､ and return unto his house,—lest he die in the battle, and another man dedicate it.

content: 6 And who is the man that hath planted a vineyard､ and hath not thrown it open? let him go､ and return unto his house,—lest he die in the battle, and another man throw it open.
content_old: 6 And who is the man that hath planted a vineyard､ and hath not thrown it open? let him go､ and return unto his house,—lest he die in the battle, and another man throw it open.

content: 7 And who is the man that hath betrothed a wife､ and hath not taken her? let him go､ and return unto his house,—lest he die in the battle, and another man take her.
content_old: 7 And who is the man that hath betrothed a wife､ and hath not taken her? let him go､ and return unto his house,—lest he die in the battle, and another man take her.

content: 8 Then shall the officers further speak unto the people, and say— Who is the man that is fearful and fainthearted? let him go､ and return unto his house,—lest his brethren’s heart melt as well as his heart.
content_old: 8 Then shall the officers further speak unto the people, and say— Who is the man that is fearful and fainthearted? let him go､ and return unto his house,—lest his brethren’s heart melt as well as his heart.

content: 9 And it shall be when the officers have made an end of speaking unto the people then shall they appoint captains of hosts､ at the head of the people.
content_old: 9 And it shall be when the officers have made an end of speaking unto the people then shall they appoint captains of hosts､ at the head of the people.

content: 10 When thou shalt come nigh unto a city, to fight against it,—then shalt thou proclaim unto it—peace.
content_old: 10 When thou shalt come nigh unto a city, to fight against it,—then shalt thou proclaim unto it—peace.

content: 11 And it shall be if peace be the answer it giveth thee, and it open unto thee then shall it be､ that all the people that are found therein shall become thy tributaries､ and shall serve thee.
content_old: 11 And it shall be if peace be the answer it giveth thee, and it open unto thee then shall it be､ that all the people that are found therein shall become thy tributaries､ and shall serve thee.

content: 12 But if it will not make peace with thee, but will make war with thee then shalt thou lay siege to it;
content_old: 12 But if it will not make peace with thee, but will make war with thee then shalt thou lay siege to it;

content: 13 and Yahweh thy God will deliver it into thy hand,—and thou shalt smite every male thereof､ with the edge of the sword;
content_old: 13 and Yahweh thy God will deliver it into thy hand,—and thou shalt smite every male thereof､ with the edge of the sword;

content: 14 but the women and the little ones and the cattle､ and all that shall be in the city—all the spoil thereof shalt thou take as thy prey,—so shalt thou eat the spoil of thine enemies, whom Yahweh thy God hath delivered unto thee.
content_old: 14 but the women and the little ones and the cattle､ and all that shall be in the city—all the spoil thereof shalt thou take as thy prey,—so shalt thou eat the spoil of thine enemies, whom Yahweh thy God hath delivered unto thee.

content: 15 Thus shalt thou do unto all the cities､ that are very far away from thee,—which are not of the cities of those nations.
content_old: 15 Thus shalt thou do unto all the cities､ that are very far away from thee,—which are not of the cities of those nations.

content: 16 But of the cities of these peoples､ which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee as an inheritance shalt thou not save alive､ any breathing thing.
content_old: 16 But of the cities of these peoples､ which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee as an inheritance shalt thou not save alive､ any breathing thing.

content: 17 But thou shalt devote them to destruction—the Hittites and the Amorites､ the Canaanites and the Perizzites, the Hivites､ and the Jebusites,—as Yahweh thy God hath commanded thee:
content_old: 17 But thou shalt devote them to destruction—the Hittites and the Amorites､ the Canaanites and the Perizzites, the Hivites､ and the Jebusites,—as Yahweh thy God hath commanded thee:

content: 18 lest they teach you to do, according to all their abominations､ which they have done unto their gods,—and so ye sin against Yahweh your God.
content_old: 18 lest they teach you to do, according to all their abominations､ which they have done unto their gods,—and so ye sin against Yahweh your God.

content: 19 When thou shalt besiege a city for many days､ to fight against it, to take it thou shalt not destroy the trees thereof､ by wielding against them an axe, when of them thou mightest eat, them therefore､ shalt thou not cut down,—for､ Is the tree of the field a man, that it should enter､ because of thee､ into the siege?
content_old: 19 When thou shalt besiege a city for many days､ to fight against it, to take it thou shalt not destroy the trees thereof､ by wielding against them an axe, when of them thou mightest eat, them therefore､ shalt thou not cut down,—for､ Is the tree of the field a man, that it should enter､ because of thee､ into the siege?

content: 1 When there shall be found one slain､ on the soil which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee to possess, lying prostrate in the field,—it not being known who smote him
content_old: 1 When there shall be found one slain､ on the soil which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee to possess, lying prostrate in the field,—it not being known who smote him

content: 2 then shall thine elders and thy judges go forth,—and measure unto the cities that are round about the slain;
content_old: 2 then shall thine elders and thy judges go forth,—and measure unto the cities that are round about the slain;

content: 3 and it shall be that the city that is nearest unto the slain the elders of that city shall take a heifer of the herd､ which hath not been wrought with, which hath not drawn in a yoke;
content_old: 3 and it shall be that the city that is nearest unto the slain the elders of that city shall take a heifer of the herd､ which hath not been wrought with, which hath not drawn in a yoke;

content: 4 and the elders of that city shall take down the heifer into a ravine with an everflowing stream, which is neither tilled nor sown,—and shall behead there､ the heifer､ in the ravine.
content_old: 4 and the elders of that city shall take down the heifer into a ravine with an everflowing stream, which is neither tilled nor sown,—and shall behead there､ the heifer､ in the ravine.

content: 5 Then shall the priests､ the sons of Levi､ come near, for of them hath Yahweh thy God made choice､ to wait upon him, and to bless､ in the name of Yahweh,—and at their bidding shall be settled､ every controversy and every punishment;
content_old: 5 Then shall the priests､ the sons of Levi､ come near, for of them hath Yahweh thy God made choice､ to wait upon him, and to bless､ in the name of Yahweh,—and at their bidding shall be settled､ every controversy and every punishment;

content: 6 and all the elders of that city who are nearest unto the slain shall bathe their hands over the heifer that hath been beheaded in the ravine,
content_old: 6 and all the elders of that city who are nearest unto the slain shall bathe their hands over the heifer that hath been beheaded in the ravine,

content: 7 and shall respond､ and say,— Our hands shed not this blood, neither did our eyes see the deed.
content_old: 7 and shall respond､ and say,— Our hands shed not this blood, neither did our eyes see the deed.

content: 8 Be propitious unto thy people Israel､ whom thou hast redeemed､ O Yahweh, and do not impute innocent blood in the midst of thy people Israel. So shall they obtain propitiation for the guilt of shedding blood.
content_old: 8 Be propitious unto thy people Israel､ whom thou hast redeemed､ O Yahweh, and do not impute innocent blood in the midst of thy people Israel. So shall they obtain propitiation for the guilt of shedding blood.

content: 9 Thou therefore shalt consume the guilt of shedding innocent blood out of thy midst,—when thou shalt do that which is right in the eyes of Yahweh.
content_old: 9 Thou therefore shalt consume the guilt of shedding innocent blood out of thy midst,—when thou shalt do that which is right in the eyes of Yahweh.

content: 10 When thou shalt go forth to war､ against thine enemies,—and Yahweh thy God shall deliver them into thy hand､ and thou shalt take them captive;
content_old: 10 When thou shalt go forth to war､ against thine enemies,—and Yahweh thy God shall deliver them into thy hand､ and thou shalt take them captive;

content: 11 and shalt see among the captives a woman of beautiful figure,—and shalt have a desire unto her, and wouldest take her to thee to wife
content_old: 11 and shalt see among the captives a woman of beautiful figure,—and shalt have a desire unto her, and wouldest take her to thee to wife

content: 12 then shalt thou bring her into the midst of thy house,—and she shall shave her head and pare her nails;
content_old: 12 then shalt thou bring her into the midst of thy house,—and she shall shave her head and pare her nails;

content: 13 and put away the raiment of her captivity from off her､ and shall remain in thy house, and bewail her father and her mother､ for the space of a month,—and after that mayest thou go in unto her, and be her husband, and she shall be thy wife.
content_old: 13 and put away the raiment of her captivity from off her､ and shall remain in thy house, and bewail her father and her mother､ for the space of a month,—and after that mayest thou go in unto her, and be her husband, and she shall be thy wife.

content: 14 And it shall be､ if thou hast no pleasure in her then shalt thou let her go whither she will, but thou shalt not sell her for silver,—thou shalt not make merchandise of her, because thou hast humbled her.
content_old: 14 And it shall be､ if thou hast no pleasure in her then shalt thou let her go whither she will, but thou shalt not sell her for silver,—thou shalt not make merchandise of her, because thou hast humbled her.

content: 15 When a man shall have two wives—the one beloved and the other hated, and they have borne him sons､ both she that is beloved､ and she that is hated,—and it shall be that the firstborn son belongeth to her that is hated
content_old: 15 When a man shall have two wives—the one beloved and the other hated, and they have borne him sons､ both she that is beloved､ and she that is hated,—and it shall be that the firstborn son belongeth to her that is hated

content: 16 then shall it be that in the day when he maketh his sons to inherit that which he hath he may not treat the son of the beloved､ instead of the son of the hated､ as the firstborn;
content_old: 16 then shall it be that in the day when he maketh his sons to inherit that which he hath he may not treat the son of the beloved､ instead of the son of the hated､ as the firstborn;

content: 17 but the true firstborn､ the son of her that is hated shall he treat as firstborn､ by giving him double､ out of all that is found to be his,—for he is the beginning of his strength, his is the right of the firstborn.
content_old: 17 but the true firstborn､ the son of her that is hated shall he treat as firstborn､ by giving him double､ out of all that is found to be his,—for he is the beginning of his strength, his is the right of the firstborn.

content: 18 When a man hath a son､ rebellious and insulting, who will not hearken to the voice of his father, and to the voice of his mother,—though they chastise him yet will not hearken unto them
content_old: 18 When a man hath a son､ rebellious and insulting, who will not hearken to the voice of his father, and to the voice of his mother,—though they chastise him yet will not hearken unto them

content: 19 then shall his father and his mother lay hold of him,—and bring him forth unto the elders of his city, and unto the gate of his place;
content_old: 19 then shall his father and his mother lay hold of him,—and bring him forth unto the elders of his city, and unto the gate of his place;

content: 20 and shall say unto the elders of his city: This our son is rebellious and insulting,—he will not hearken unto our voice,—a glutton and a tippler.
content_old: 20 and shall say unto the elders of his city: This our son is rebellious and insulting,—he will not hearken unto our voice,—a glutton and a tippler.

content: 21 Then shall all the men of his city stone him with stones､ that he die, so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst,—and all Israel shall hear and fear.
content_old: 21 Then shall all the men of his city stone him with stones､ that he die, so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst,—and all Israel shall hear and fear.

content: 22 But when there shall be in any man a sin worthy of death､ and he is to be put to death,—and thou shalt hang him on a tree
content_old: 22 But when there shall be in any man a sin worthy of death､ and he is to be put to death,—and thou shalt hang him on a tree

content: 1 Thou shalt not see the ox of thy brother､ or his sheep､ going astray, and turn away from them,—thou shalt bring them back unto thy brother.
content_old: 1 Thou shalt not see the ox of thy brother､ or his sheep､ going astray, and turn away from them,—thou shalt bring them back unto thy brother.

content: 2 And if thy brother be not nigh unto thee､ or thou know him not then shalt thou make room for it within thine own shed､ and it shall be with thee､ until thy brother seek after it, when thou shalt return it unto him.
content_old: 2 And if thy brother be not nigh unto thee､ or thou know him not then shalt thou make room for it within thine own shed､ and it shall be with thee､ until thy brother seek after it, when thou shalt return it unto him.

content: 3 And so shalt thou do with his ass､ and so shalt thou do with his mantle､ and so shalt thou do with any lost thing of thy brother’s､ which shall go astray from him､ and thou shalt find,—thou mayest not turn away.
content_old: 3 And so shalt thou do with his ass､ and so shalt thou do with his mantle､ and so shalt thou do with any lost thing of thy brother’s､ which shall go astray from him､ and thou shalt find,—thou mayest not turn away.

content: 4 Thou shalt not see the ass of thy brother､ or his ox､ fallen in the way､ and turn away from them,—thou shalt raise them with him.
content_old: 4 Thou shalt not see the ass of thy brother､ or his ox､ fallen in the way､ and turn away from them,—thou shalt raise them with him.

content: 5 A woman shall not have on the wearing apparel of a man, nor shall a man put on the mantle of a woman; for an abomination to Yahweh thy God is any one who doeth these things.
content_old: 5 A woman shall not have on the wearing apparel of a man, nor shall a man put on the mantle of a woman; for an abomination to Yahweh thy God is any one who doeth these things.

content: 6 When a bird’s-nest chanceth to be before thee,—in the way､ in any tree or upon the ground､ whether with nestlings or eggs, and the mother be sitting upon the nestlings or upon the eggs thou shalt not take the mother upon the young;
content_old: 6 When a bird’s-nest chanceth to be before thee,—in the way､ in any tree or upon the ground､ whether with nestlings or eggs, and the mother be sitting upon the nestlings or upon the eggs thou shalt not take the mother upon the young;

content: 7 thou shalt let go the mother, and then her young mayest thou take for thyself,—that it may go well with thee, and that thou mayest prolong thy days.
content_old: 7 thou shalt let go the mother, and then her young mayest thou take for thyself,—that it may go well with thee, and that thou mayest prolong thy days.

content: 8 When thou buildest a new house then shalt thou make a parapet to thy roof, so shalt thou not treasure up blood-guiltiness against thy house, for he that is in danger of falling might fall therefrom.
content_old: 8 When thou buildest a new house then shalt thou make a parapet to thy roof, so shalt thou not treasure up blood-guiltiness against thy house, for he that is in danger of falling might fall therefrom.

content: 9 Thou shalt not sow thy vineyard with two sorts of seed,—lest the fulness of the seed which thou sowest, and the increase of thy vineyard be profaned.
content_old: 9 Thou shalt not sow thy vineyard with two sorts of seed,—lest the fulness of the seed which thou sowest, and the increase of thy vineyard be profaned.

content: 10 Thou shalt not plough with an ox and an ass､ together.
content_old: 10 Thou shalt not plough with an ox and an ass､ together.

content: 11 Thou shalt not put on linsey-woolsey, of wool and flax､ together.
content_old: 11 Thou shalt not put on linsey-woolsey, of wool and flax､ together.

content: 12 Tassels shalt thou make thee,—on the four corners of thy vesture､ wherewith thou dost cover thyself.
content_old: 12 Tassels shalt thou make thee,—on the four corners of thy vesture､ wherewith thou dost cover thyself.

content: 13 When a man taketh a wife,—and goeth in unto her､ and hateth her;
content_old: 13 When a man taketh a wife,—and goeth in unto her､ and hateth her;

content: 14 and raiseth against her､ occasions of speech, and bringeth upon her an evil name, and saith— This woman I took, and approached her, and found not that she had the tokens of virginity
content_old: 14 and raiseth against her､ occasions of speech, and bringeth upon her an evil name, and saith— This woman I took, and approached her, and found not that she had the tokens of virginity

content: 15 then shall the father of the damsel and her mother take and bring forth the tokens of the virginity of the damsel､ unto the elders of the city､ in the gate;
content_old: 15 then shall the father of the damsel and her mother take and bring forth the tokens of the virginity of the damsel､ unto the elders of the city､ in the gate;

content: 16 and the father of the damsel shall say unto the elders,— My daughter gave I unto this man to wife､ and he hated her;
content_old: 16 and the father of the damsel shall say unto the elders,— My daughter gave I unto this man to wife､ and he hated her;

content: 17 and lo! he hath raised occasions of speech､ saying— I found not that thy daughter had the tokens of virginity and yet these are the tokens of the virginity of my daughter. And they shall spread out the garment before the elders of the city.
content_old: 17 and lo! he hath raised occasions of speech､ saying— I found not that thy daughter had the tokens of virginity and yet these are the tokens of the virginity of my daughter. And they shall spread out the garment before the elders of the city.

content: 18 Then shall the elders of that city take the man,—and chastise him;
content_old: 18 Then shall the elders of that city take the man,—and chastise him;

content: 19 and fine him a hundred shekels of silver､ and give unto the father of the damsel, because he hath brought an evil name upon a virgin of Israel,—and she shall remain his wife, he may not put her away､ all his days.
content_old: 19 and fine him a hundred shekels of silver､ and give unto the father of the damsel, because he hath brought an evil name upon a virgin of Israel,—and she shall remain his wife, he may not put her away､ all his days.

content: 20 But if this thing be true,—and the tokens of virginity be not found with the damsel
content_old: 20 But if this thing be true,—and the tokens of virginity be not found with the damsel

content: 21 then shall they bring forth the damsel into the entrance of her father’s house､ and the men of her city shall stone her with stones､ that she die, because she hath wrought wickedness in Israel, by committing unchastity in her father’s house,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst.
content_old: 21 then shall they bring forth the damsel into the entrance of her father’s house､ and the men of her city shall stone her with stones､ that she die, because she hath wrought wickedness in Israel, by committing unchastity in her father’s house,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst.

content: 22 When a man is found lying with a woman married to a husband then shall both of them die, the man that lay with the woman､ and the woman,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of Israel.
content_old: 22 When a man is found lying with a woman married to a husband then shall both of them die, the man that lay with the woman､ and the woman,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of Israel.

content: 23 When a damsel that is a virgin is betrothed to a husband,—and a man findeth her in the city､ and lieth with her
content_old: 23 When a damsel that is a virgin is betrothed to a husband,—and a man findeth her in the city､ and lieth with her

content: 24 then shall ye bring them both out unto the gate of that city､ and stone them with stones､ that they die, the damsel because she made not an outcry in the city, and the man because he hath humbled his neighbour’s wife,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst.
content_old: 24 then shall ye bring them both out unto the gate of that city､ and stone them with stones､ that they die, the damsel because she made not an outcry in the city, and the man because he hath humbled his neighbour’s wife,—so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst.

content: 25 But if in the field the man find the betrothed damsel, and the man force her and lie with her then shall the man that lay with her die he alone;
content_old: 25 But if in the field the man find the betrothed damsel, and the man force her and lie with her then shall the man that lay with her die he alone;

content: 26 but unto the damsel shalt thou do nothing, the damsel is not guilty of a sin worthy of death,—for as when a man riseth up against his neighbour､ and smiteth him so as to take away life so is this matter;
content_old: 26 but unto the damsel shalt thou do nothing, the damsel is not guilty of a sin worthy of death,—for as when a man riseth up against his neighbour､ and smiteth him so as to take away life so is this matter;

content: 27 for in the field he found her,—the betrothed damsel made an outcry, and there was none to save her.
content_old: 27 for in the field he found her,—the betrothed damsel made an outcry, and there was none to save her.

content: 28 When a man findeth a damsel that is a virgin who is not betrothed, and layeth hold of her､ and lieth with her,—and they are found
content_old: 28 When a man findeth a damsel that is a virgin who is not betrothed, and layeth hold of her､ and lieth with her,—and they are found

content: 29 then shall the man who lay with her give unto the damsel’s father､ fifty shekels of silver,—and she shall be his wife､ because he hath humbled her, he may not put her away､ all his days.
content_old: 29 then shall the man who lay with her give unto the damsel’s father､ fifty shekels of silver,—and she shall be his wife､ because he hath humbled her, he may not put her away､ all his days.

content: 1 Neither he that hath been mutilated by crushing､ nor he that hath had his privy member cut off､ shall enter into the convocation of Yahweh.
content_old: 1 Neither he that hath been mutilated by crushing､ nor he that hath had his privy member cut off､ shall enter into the convocation of Yahweh.

content: 2 A bastard shall not enter into the convocation of Yahweh,—even to the tenth generation shall none of his enter into the convocation of Yahweh.
content_old: 2 A bastard shall not enter into the convocation of Yahweh,—even to the tenth generation shall none of his enter into the convocation of Yahweh.

content: 3 Neither an Ammonite nor a Moabite shall enter into the convocation of Yahweh,—even to the tenth generation shall none that belong to them enter into the convocation of Yahweh､ unto times age-abiding:
content_old: 3 Neither an Ammonite nor a Moabite shall enter into the convocation of Yahweh,—even to the tenth generation shall none that belong to them enter into the convocation of Yahweh､ unto times age-abiding:

content: 4 because they met you not with bread and water, in the way､ when ye came forth out of Egypt,—but hired against thee Balaam son of Beor､ from Pethor of Mesopotamia､ to curse thee.
content_old: 4 because they met you not with bread and water, in the way､ when ye came forth out of Egypt,—but hired against thee Balaam son of Beor､ from Pethor of Mesopotamia､ to curse thee.

content: 5 Nevertheless､ Yahweh thy God consented not to hearken unto Baalam, but Yahweh thy God turned､ for thee､ the curse into a blessing,—because Yahweh thy God loved thee.
content_old: 5 Nevertheless､ Yahweh thy God consented not to hearken unto Baalam, but Yahweh thy God turned､ for thee､ the curse into a blessing,—because Yahweh thy God loved thee.

content: 6 Thou shalt not seek their peace､ nor their welfare,—all thy days､ unto times age-abiding.
content_old: 6 Thou shalt not seek their peace､ nor their welfare,—all thy days､ unto times age-abiding.

content: 7 Thou shalt not abhor an Edomite, for thy brother he is,—thou shalt not abhor an Egyptian, for a sojourner becamest thou in his land;
content_old: 7 Thou shalt not abhor an Edomite, for thy brother he is,—thou shalt not abhor an Egyptian, for a sojourner becamest thou in his land;

content: 8 the sons who are born to them､ of the third generation may enter unto them in the convocation of Yahweh.
content_old: 8 the sons who are born to them､ of the third generation may enter unto them in the convocation of Yahweh.

content: 9 When thou goest forth into camp against thine enemies then shalt thou beware of everything foul.
content_old: 9 When thou goest forth into camp against thine enemies then shalt thou beware of everything foul.

content: 10 When there is in thy midst a man who is not clean､ through a mischance of the night then shall he go forth unto the outside of the camp, he shall not come into the midst of the camp;
content_old: 10 When there is in thy midst a man who is not clean､ through a mischance of the night then shall he go forth unto the outside of the camp, he shall not come into the midst of the camp;

content: 11 but it shall be､ when the evening cometh on､ he shall bathe himself in water,—and at the going in of the sun he shall come into the midst of the camp.
content_old: 11 but it shall be､ when the evening cometh on､ he shall bathe himself in water,—and at the going in of the sun he shall come into the midst of the camp.

content: 12 And a place aside shalt thou have, without the camp,—whither thou canst go forth abroad;
content_old: 12 And a place aside shalt thou have, without the camp,—whither thou canst go forth abroad;

content: 13 and a blade shalt thou have upon thy staff,—so shall it be､ that when thou wouldest sit down outside thou shalt dig therewith, and shalt turn back､ and cover that which hath passed from thee:
content_old: 13 and a blade shalt thou have upon thy staff,—so shall it be､ that when thou wouldest sit down outside thou shalt dig therewith, and shalt turn back､ and cover that which hath passed from thee:

content: 14 for Yahweh thy God walketh to and fro in the midst of thy camp､ to rescue thee､ and to deliver up thine enemies before thee, so shall thy camps be holy,—and he shall see in thee no shameful thing, that he should turn away from following thee.
content_old: 14 for Yahweh thy God walketh to and fro in the midst of thy camp､ to rescue thee､ and to deliver up thine enemies before thee, so shall thy camps be holy,—and he shall see in thee no shameful thing, that he should turn away from following thee.

content: 15 Thou shalt not deliver up a slave unto his lord,—one who maketh his escape unto thee､ from his lord:
content_old: 15 Thou shalt not deliver up a slave unto his lord,—one who maketh his escape unto thee､ from his lord:

content: 16 with thee shall he remain､ in thy midst､ in the place which he shall choose in any of thy gates､ where it seemeth good to him,—thou shalt not oppress him.
content_old: 16 with thee shall he remain､ in thy midst､ in the place which he shall choose in any of thy gates､ where it seemeth good to him,—thou shalt not oppress him.

content: 17 There shall be no female devotee of the daughters of Israel,—neither shall there be a male devotee､ of the sons of Israel.
content_old: 17 There shall be no female devotee of the daughters of Israel,—neither shall there be a male devotee､ of the sons of Israel.

content: 18 Thou shalt not bring the wages of an unchaste woman､ or the hire of a dog､ into the house of Yahweh thy God､ for any vow,—for an abomination unto Yahweh thy God are they both.
content_old: 18 Thou shalt not bring the wages of an unchaste woman､ or the hire of a dog､ into the house of Yahweh thy God､ for any vow,—for an abomination unto Yahweh thy God are they both.

content: 19 Thou shalt not lend on interest to thy brother, interest of silver､ interest of food,—interest of any thing that can be lent on interest:
content_old: 19 Thou shalt not lend on interest to thy brother, interest of silver､ interest of food,—interest of any thing that can be lent on interest:

content: 20 to a foreigner thou mayest lend on interest, but to thy brother shalt thou not lend on interest,—that Yahweh thy God may bless thee､ in everything whereunto thou puttest thy hand, upon the land which thou art entering to possess.
content_old: 20 to a foreigner thou mayest lend on interest, but to thy brother shalt thou not lend on interest,—that Yahweh thy God may bless thee､ in everything whereunto thou puttest thy hand, upon the land which thou art entering to possess.

content: 21 When thou shalt vow a vow unto Yahweh thy God thou shalt not delay to make it good,—for Yahweh thy God would require it of thee, and it should be､ in thee､ sin.
content_old: 21 When thou shalt vow a vow unto Yahweh thy God thou shalt not delay to make it good,—for Yahweh thy God would require it of thee, and it should be､ in thee､ sin.

content: 22 But if thou refrain from vowing it shall not be､ in thee sin.
content_old: 22 But if thou refrain from vowing it shall not be､ in thee sin.

content: 23 That which goeth forth out of thy lips thou must observe and do,—according as thou didst vow unto Yahweh thy God the free-will offering of which thou didst speak with thy mouth.
content_old: 23 That which goeth forth out of thy lips thou must observe and do,—according as thou didst vow unto Yahweh thy God the free-will offering of which thou didst speak with thy mouth.

content: 24 When thou enterest into the vineyard of thy neighbour then mayest thou eat grapes at thy pleasure to thy fill､—but into thy vessel shalt thou put none.
content_old: 24 When thou enterest into the vineyard of thy neighbour then mayest thou eat grapes at thy pleasure to thy fill､—but into thy vessel shalt thou put none.

content: 1 When a man taketh a woman､ and marrieth her then shall it be､ if she find not favour in his eyes､ because he hath found in her some matter of shame that he shall write her a scroll of divorcement､ and put it into her hand, and shall send her forth､ out of his house.
content_old: 1 When a man taketh a woman､ and marrieth her then shall it be､ if she find not favour in his eyes､ because he hath found in her some matter of shame that he shall write her a scroll of divorcement､ and put it into her hand, and shall send her forth､ out of his house.

content: 2 And when she cometh forth out of his house then may she go her way, and become another man’s.
content_old: 2 And when she cometh forth out of his house then may she go her way, and become another man’s.

content: 3 But if the latter husband hate her, and write her a scroll of divorcement､ and put it into her hand, and send her away out of his house,—or if the latter husband die､ who had taken her to him to wife
content_old: 3 But if the latter husband hate her, and write her a scroll of divorcement､ and put it into her hand, and send her away out of his house,—or if the latter husband die､ who had taken her to him to wife

content: 4 then may her first husband who sent her away not again take her to become his wife､ after that she hath been defild, for that were an abomination before Yahweh,—lest thou bring sin upon the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee for an inheritance.
content_old: 4 then may her first husband who sent her away not again take her to become his wife､ after that she hath been defild, for that were an abomination before Yahweh,—lest thou bring sin upon the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee for an inheritance.

content: 5 When a man taketh a new wife he shall not go forth to war, neither shall he be charged with any business,—free shall he be for his own house one year, and shall rejoice with his wife whom he hath taken.
content_old: 5 When a man taketh a new wife he shall not go forth to war, neither shall he be charged with any business,—free shall he be for his own house one year, and shall rejoice with his wife whom he hath taken.

content: 6 No man shall take in pledge a handmill､ or an upper millstone,—for he would be taking life in pledge.
content_old: 6 No man shall take in pledge a handmill､ or an upper millstone,—for he would be taking life in pledge.

content: 7 When a man is found stealing any person from among his brethren､ of the sons of Israel, and making merchandise of him､ or selling him then shall that thief die, so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst.
content_old: 7 When a man is found stealing any person from among his brethren､ of the sons of Israel, and making merchandise of him､ or selling him then shall that thief die, so shalt thou consume the wicked thing out of thy midst.

content: 8 Take heed､ in the plague of leprosy､ that thou observe diligently, and do､—according to all that the priests the Levites shall direct you, as I have commanded them so shall ye observe to do.
content_old: 8 Take heed､ in the plague of leprosy､ that thou observe diligently, and do､—according to all that the priests the Levites shall direct you, as I have commanded them so shall ye observe to do.

content: 9 Remember that which Yahweh thy God did to Miriam,—by the way､ as ye came forth out of Egypt.
content_old: 9 Remember that which Yahweh thy God did to Miriam,—by the way､ as ye came forth out of Egypt.

content: 10 When thou lendest thy neighbour a loan of anything thou shalt not enter into his house､ to secure his pledge:
content_old: 10 When thou lendest thy neighbour a loan of anything thou shalt not enter into his house､ to secure his pledge:

content: 11 outside shalt thou stand, and the man to whom thou art lending shall bring forth unto thee his pledge､ outside.
content_old: 11 outside shalt thou stand, and the man to whom thou art lending shall bring forth unto thee his pledge､ outside.

content: 12 And if he be a poor man thou shalt not sleep in his pledge:
content_old: 12 And if he be a poor man thou shalt not sleep in his pledge:

content: 13 thou shalt restore to him the pledge､ at the going in of the sun, so shall he sleep in his own mantle､ and bless thee,—and unto thee shall it be righteousness､ before Yahweh thy God.
content_old: 13 thou shalt restore to him the pledge､ at the going in of the sun, so shall he sleep in his own mantle､ and bless thee,—and unto thee shall it be righteousness､ before Yahweh thy God.

content: 14 Thou shalt not oppress a hired servant､ that is poor and needy,—of thy brethren or of thy sojourners that are in thy land､ within thy gates;
content_old: 14 Thou shalt not oppress a hired servant､ that is poor and needy,—of thy brethren or of thy sojourners that are in thy land､ within thy gates;

content: 15 for his day shalt thou give his hire､ neither shall the sun go in upon it, for poor he is, and unto it is he lifting up his soul,—lest he cry out against thee､ unto Yahweh, and it be､ in thee､ a sin.
content_old: 15 for his day shalt thou give his hire､ neither shall the sun go in upon it, for poor he is, and unto it is he lifting up his soul,—lest he cry out against thee､ unto Yahweh, and it be､ in thee､ a sin.

content: 16 Fathers shall not be put to death for sons, nor shall sons be put to death for fathers,—every man for his own sin shall be put to death.
content_old: 16 Fathers shall not be put to death for sons, nor shall sons be put to death for fathers,—every man for his own sin shall be put to death.

content: 17 Thou shalt not pervert the judgment of the sojourner or the fatherless,—neither shalt thou take in pledge the garment of a widow;
content_old: 17 Thou shalt not pervert the judgment of the sojourner or the fatherless,—neither shalt thou take in pledge the garment of a widow;

content: 18 so shalt thou remember that a servant becamest thou in Egypt, and that Yahweh thy God redeemed thee from thence,—therefore am I commanding thee to do this thing.
content_old: 18 so shalt thou remember that a servant becamest thou in Egypt, and that Yahweh thy God redeemed thee from thence,—therefore am I commanding thee to do this thing.

content: 19 When thou cuttest down thy harvest in thy field､ and forgettest a sheaf in the field thou shalt not turn back to fetch it, to the sojourner､ to the fatherless, and to the widow shall it belong,—that Yahweh thy God may bless thee､ in all the work of thy hands.
content_old: 19 When thou cuttest down thy harvest in thy field､ and forgettest a sheaf in the field thou shalt not turn back to fetch it, to the sojourner､ to the fatherless, and to the widow shall it belong,—that Yahweh thy God may bless thee､ in all the work of thy hands.

content: 20 When thou beatest thine olive-tree thou shalt not glean after thee,—to the sojourner､ to the fatherless､ and to the widow shall it belong.
content_old: 20 When thou beatest thine olive-tree thou shalt not glean after thee,—to the sojourner､ to the fatherless､ and to the widow shall it belong.

content: 21 When thou cuttest off the grapes of thy vineyard thou shalt not go about picking after thee,—to the sojourner, to the fatherless and to the widow shall it belong:
content_old: 21 When thou cuttest off the grapes of thy vineyard thou shalt not go about picking after thee,—to the sojourner, to the fatherless and to the widow shall it belong:

content: 1 When there ariseth a controversy between men, and they come nigh unto judgment､ and judgment is granted them then shall they justify the righteous man, and condemn the lawless.
content_old: 1 When there ariseth a controversy between men, and they come nigh unto judgment､ and judgment is granted them then shall they justify the righteous man, and condemn the lawless.

content: 2 And it shall be—if the lawless man be worthy of stripes then shall the judge cause him to lie down､ and be beaten before him, according to the measure of his lawlessness, by number:
content_old: 2 And it shall be—if the lawless man be worthy of stripes then shall the judge cause him to lie down､ and be beaten before him, according to the measure of his lawlessness, by number:

content: 3 forty stripes may he give him､ not going beyond,—lest if he do go beyond､ to smite him above these､ with many stripes then should thy brother be of no account in thine eyes.
content_old: 3 forty stripes may he give him､ not going beyond,—lest if he do go beyond､ to smite him above these､ with many stripes then should thy brother be of no account in thine eyes.

content: 4 Thou shalt not muzzle an ox when he is treading out the corn.
content_old: 4 Thou shalt not muzzle an ox when he is treading out the corn.

content: 5 When brethren dwell together, and one of them dieth, having no son the wife of the dead shall not marry outside､ to a stranger,—her husband’s brother shall go in unto her, and take her unto him to wife､ and do for her as a husband’s brother.
content_old: 5 When brethren dwell together, and one of them dieth, having no son the wife of the dead shall not marry outside､ to a stranger,—her husband’s brother shall go in unto her, and take her unto him to wife､ and do for her as a husband’s brother.

content: 6 And it shall be､ that the firstborn which she beareth shall succeed in the name of his brother､ who is dead,—so shall his name not be wiped out from Israel.
content_old: 6 And it shall be､ that the firstborn which she beareth shall succeed in the name of his brother､ who is dead,—so shall his name not be wiped out from Israel.

content: 7 But if the man like not to take his sister-in-law then shall his sister-in-law go up unto the gate､ unto the elders､ and say— My husband’s brother hath refused､ to raise up unto his brother a name in Israel, he is not willing to do as a husband’s brother unto me.
content_old: 7 But if the man like not to take his sister-in-law then shall his sister-in-law go up unto the gate､ unto the elders､ and say— My husband’s brother hath refused､ to raise up unto his brother a name in Israel, he is not willing to do as a husband’s brother unto me.

content: 8 Then shall the elders of his city call him and speak unto him,—and he shall stand and say, I like not to take her.
content_old: 8 Then shall the elders of his city call him and speak unto him,—and he shall stand and say, I like not to take her.

content: 9 Then shall his brother’s wife come near unto him in the presence of the elders, and draw his shoe from off his foot, and spit in his face,—and respond and say, Thus shall it be done unto the man who will not build up the house of his brother.
content_old: 9 Then shall his brother’s wife come near unto him in the presence of the elders, and draw his shoe from off his foot, and spit in his face,—and respond and say, Thus shall it be done unto the man who will not build up the house of his brother.

content: 10 And his name shall be called in Israel,— The house of him who had his shoe drawn off.
content_old: 10 And his name shall be called in Israel,— The house of him who had his shoe drawn off.

content: 11 When men strive together one with another, and the wife of the one draweth near to deliver her husband out of the hand of him that smiteth him,—and she putteth forth her hand, and seizeth him by his parts of shame
content_old: 11 When men strive together one with another, and the wife of the one draweth near to deliver her husband out of the hand of him that smiteth him,—and she putteth forth her hand, and seizeth him by his parts of shame

content: 12 then shalt thou cut off her hand, thine eye shall not pity.
content_old: 12 then shalt thou cut off her hand, thine eye shall not pity.

content: 13 Thou shalt not have in thy bag divers weights,—a great and a small.
content_old: 13 Thou shalt not have in thy bag divers weights,—a great and a small.

content: 14 Thou shalt not have in thy house divers measures,—a great and a small.
content_old: 14 Thou shalt not have in thy house divers measures,—a great and a small.

content: 15 A weight､ full and just shalt thou have, a measure､ full and just shalt thou have,—that thy days may be prolonged upon the soil which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee.
content_old: 15 A weight､ full and just shalt thou have, a measure､ full and just shalt thou have,—that thy days may be prolonged upon the soil which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee.

content: 16 For an abomination unto Yahweh thy God is every one that doeth these things,—every one that doeth unjustly.
content_old: 16 For an abomination unto Yahweh thy God is every one that doeth these things,—every one that doeth unjustly.

content: 17 Remember that which Amalek did unto thee by the way when ye came forth out of Egypt;
content_old: 17 Remember that which Amalek did unto thee by the way when ye came forth out of Egypt;

content: 18 how he encountered thee by the way and cut off in thy rear all the worn-out behind thee, thou thyself being weary and worn,—how he feared not God.
content_old: 18 how he encountered thee by the way and cut off in thy rear all the worn-out behind thee, thou thyself being weary and worn,—how he feared not God.

content: 1 And it shall be when thou shalt enter into the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee for an inheritance,—and shalt possess it and dwell therein
content_old: 1 And it shall be when thou shalt enter into the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee for an inheritance,—and shalt possess it and dwell therein

content: 2 then shalt thou take—of the first of all the fruit of the soil which thou shalt bring in from thy land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee and shalt put it in a basket,—and go thy way unto the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose, to make a habitation for his name there.
content_old: 2 then shalt thou take—of the first of all the fruit of the soil which thou shalt bring in from thy land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee and shalt put it in a basket,—and go thy way unto the place which Yahweh thy God shall choose, to make a habitation for his name there.

content: 3 And thou shalt come in unto the priest who shall be in those days,—and shalt say unto him— I declare to-day unto Yahweh thy God, that I am come into the land which Yahweh sware unto our fathers that he would give unto us.
content_old: 3 And thou shalt come in unto the priest who shall be in those days,—and shalt say unto him— I declare to-day unto Yahweh thy God, that I am come into the land which Yahweh sware unto our fathers that he would give unto us.

content: 4 Then shall the priest take the basket out of thy hand,—and set it down before the altar of Yahweh thy God.
content_old: 4 Then shall the priest take the basket out of thy hand,—and set it down before the altar of Yahweh thy God.

content: 5 And thou shalt respond and say before Yahweh thy God— A Syrian ready to perish was my father, so he went down to Egypt, and became a sojourner there with men only few; but he became there a nation great､ mighty and numerous;
content_old: 5 And thou shalt respond and say before Yahweh thy God— A Syrian ready to perish was my father, so he went down to Egypt, and became a sojourner there with men only few; but he became there a nation great､ mighty and numerous;

content: 6 and the Egyptians badly entreated us, and humiliated us,—and put upon us harsh service;
content_old: 6 and the Egyptians badly entreated us, and humiliated us,—and put upon us harsh service;

content: 7 so we made outcry unto Yahweh God of our fathers,—and Yahweh hearkened unto our voice, and looked upon our humiliation and our toil､ and our oppression;
content_old: 7 so we made outcry unto Yahweh God of our fathers,—and Yahweh hearkened unto our voice, and looked upon our humiliation and our toil､ and our oppression;

content: 8 and Yahweh brought us forth out of Egypt, with a firm hand and with a stretched-out arm, and with great terror,—and with signs and with wonders;
content_old: 8 and Yahweh brought us forth out of Egypt, with a firm hand and with a stretched-out arm, and with great terror,—and with signs and with wonders;

content: 9 and brought us into this place,—and gave unto us this land, a land flowing with milk and honey.
content_old: 9 and brought us into this place,—and gave unto us this land, a land flowing with milk and honey.

content: 10 Now therefore lo! I have brought in the first of the fruit of the soil which thou hast given unto me､ O Yahweh. Thus shalt thou set it down before Yahweh thy God, and shalt bow thyself down before Yahweh thy God;
content_old: 10 Now therefore lo! I have brought in the first of the fruit of the soil which thou hast given unto me､ O Yahweh. Thus shalt thou set it down before Yahweh thy God, and shalt bow thyself down before Yahweh thy God;

content: 11 and shalt rejoice in all the good things which Yahweh thy God hath given unto thee and unto thy house,—thou and the Levite, and the sojourner who is in thy midst.
content_old: 11 and shalt rejoice in all the good things which Yahweh thy God hath given unto thee and unto thy house,—thou and the Levite, and the sojourner who is in thy midst.

content: 12 When thou shalt make an end of tithing all the tithe of thine increase in the third year the year of tithing,—and shalt give unto the Levite､ unto the sojourner､ unto the fatherless and unto the widow, and they shall eat within thy gates､ and be satisfied
content_old: 12 When thou shalt make an end of tithing all the tithe of thine increase in the third year the year of tithing,—and shalt give unto the Levite､ unto the sojourner､ unto the fatherless and unto the widow, and they shall eat within thy gates､ and be satisfied

content: 13 then shalt thou say—before Yahweh thy God:— I have carefully removed that which was hallowed out of the house､ moreover also I have given it unto the Levite､ and unto the sojourner unto the fatherless and unto the widow, according to all thy commandment which thou hast commanded me,—I have not transgressed any of thy commandments neither have I forgotten.
content_old: 13 then shalt thou say—before Yahweh thy God:— I have carefully removed that which was hallowed out of the house､ moreover also I have given it unto the Levite､ and unto the sojourner unto the fatherless and unto the widow, according to all thy commandment which thou hast commanded me,—I have not transgressed any of thy commandments neither have I forgotten.

content: 14 I have not eaten in my sorrow therefrom neither have I removed therefrom when unclean, neither have I given thereof unto the dead,—I have hearkened unto the voice of Yahweh my God, I have done according to all which thou hast commanded me.
content_old: 14 I have not eaten in my sorrow therefrom neither have I removed therefrom when unclean, neither have I given thereof unto the dead,—I have hearkened unto the voice of Yahweh my God, I have done according to all which thou hast commanded me.

content: 15 Look thou down out of thy holy habitation out of the heavens and bless thy people Israel, and the soil which thou hast given unto us,—as thou didst swear unto our fathers, a land flowing with milk and honey.
content_old: 15 Look thou down out of thy holy habitation out of the heavens and bless thy people Israel, and the soil which thou hast given unto us,—as thou didst swear unto our fathers, a land flowing with milk and honey.

content: 16 This day is Yahweh thy God commanding thee to do these statutes and the regulations,—thou shalt therefore observe and do them, with all thy heart and with all thy soul.
content_old: 16 This day is Yahweh thy God commanding thee to do these statutes and the regulations,—thou shalt therefore observe and do them, with all thy heart and with all thy soul.

content: 17 Thou hast avowed､ to-day that Yahweh shall be thy God and that thou wilt walk in his ways､ and keep his statutes and his commandments and his regulations and wilt hearken unto his voice.
content_old: 17 Thou hast avowed､ to-day that Yahweh shall be thy God and that thou wilt walk in his ways､ and keep his statutes and his commandments and his regulations and wilt hearken unto his voice.

content: 18 And Yahweh hath avowed to-day that thou shalt be his people as a treasure, as he spake unto thee,—and that thou shalt observe all his commandments;
content_old: 18 And Yahweh hath avowed to-day that thou shalt be his people as a treasure, as he spake unto thee,—and that thou shalt observe all his commandments;

content: 1 And Moses with the elders of Israel commanded the people saying,— Observe all the commandment which I am commanding you to-day.
content_old: 1 And Moses with the elders of Israel commanded the people saying,— Observe all the commandment which I am commanding you to-day.

content: 2 So then it shall be in the day when ye shall pass over the Jordan, into the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee—that thou shalt rear thee up great stones, and plaster them with plaster;
content_old: 2 So then it shall be in the day when ye shall pass over the Jordan, into the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee—that thou shalt rear thee up great stones, and plaster them with plaster;

content: 3 and shalt write upon them all the words of this law, when thou shalt pass over,—to the end that thou mayest enter upon the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee a land flowing with milk and honey, as Yahweh the God of thy fathers hath spoken unto thee.
content_old: 3 and shalt write upon them all the words of this law, when thou shalt pass over,—to the end that thou mayest enter upon the land which Yahweh thy God is giving unto thee a land flowing with milk and honey, as Yahweh the God of thy fathers hath spoken unto thee.

content: 4 So then it shall be､ when ye shall pass over the Jordan that ye shall rear up these stones which I am commanding you to-day in Mount Ebal,—and thou shalt plaster them with plaster.
content_old: 4 So then it shall be､ when ye shall pass over the Jordan that ye shall rear up these stones which I am commanding you to-day in Mount Ebal,—and thou shalt plaster them with plaster.

content: 5 And thou shalt build there an altar unto Yahweh thy God,—an altar of stones, thou shalt not wield thereupon any tool of iron.
content_old: 5 And thou shalt build there an altar unto Yahweh thy God,—an altar of stones, thou shalt not wield thereupon any tool of iron.

content: 6 Of whole stones shalt thou build the altar of Yahweh thy God,—then shalt thou cause to go up thereon ascending-sacrifices､ unto Yahweh thy God;
content_old: 6 Of whole stones shalt thou build the altar of Yahweh thy God,—then shalt thou cause to go up thereon ascending-sacrifices､ unto Yahweh thy God;

content: 7 and thou shalt sacrifice peace-offerings and shalt eat there,—and rejoice before Yahweh thy God.
content_old: 7 and thou shalt sacrifice peace-offerings and shalt eat there,—and rejoice before Yahweh thy God.

content: 8 And thou shalt write upon the stones all the words of this law doing it plainly and well.
content_old: 8 And thou shalt write upon the stones all the words of this law doing it plainly and well.

content: 9 And Moses and the priests the Levites spake unto all Israel saying,— Keep silence and hear O Israel, This day hast thou been made a people unto Yahweh thy God.
content_old: 9 And Moses and the priests the Levites spake unto all Israel saying,— Keep silence and hear O Israel, This day hast thou been made a people unto Yahweh thy God.

content: 10 Thou shalt therefore hearken unto the voice of Yahweh thy God,—and do his commandments and his statutes, which I am commanding thee､ to-day.
content_old: 10 Thou shalt therefore hearken unto the voice of Yahweh thy God,—and do his commandments and his statutes, which I am commanding thee､ to-day.

content: 11 And Moses commanded the people on that day, saying:
content_old: 11 And Moses commanded the people on that day, saying:

content: 12 These shall stand to bless the people upon Mount Gerizim, when ye have passed over the Jordan,—Simeon and Levi and Judah, and Issachar and Joseph and Benjamin;
content_old: 12 These shall stand to bless the people upon Mount Gerizim, when ye have passed over the Jordan,—Simeon and Levi and Judah, and Issachar and Joseph and Benjamin;

content: 13 and these shall stand by the curse in Mount Ebal,—Reuben Gad and Asher, and Zebulun Dan and Naphtali.
content_old: 13 and these shall stand by the curse in Mount Ebal,—Reuben Gad and Asher, and Zebulun Dan and Naphtali.

content: 14 Then shall the Levites respond and say unto every man of Israel with voice uplifted:—
content_old: 14 Then shall the Levites respond and say unto every man of Israel with voice uplifted:—

content: 15 Cursed be the man that maketh an image—cut or molten—an abomination unto Yahweh the work of the hands of the craftsman and putteth it in a secret place. And all the people shall respond and say— Amen.
content_old: 15 Cursed be the man that maketh an image—cut or molten—an abomination unto Yahweh the work of the hands of the craftsman and putteth it in a secret place. And all the people shall respond and say— Amen.

content: 16 Cursed be he that holdeth in light esteem his father or his mother. And all the people shall say— Amen.
content_old: 16 Cursed be he that holdeth in light esteem his father or his mother. And all the people shall say— Amen.

content: 17 Cursed be he that moveth back the boundary of his neighbour. And all the people shall say— Amen.
content_old: 17 Cursed be he that moveth back the boundary of his neighbour. And all the people shall say— Amen.

content: 18 Cursed be he that causeth the blind to wander in the way. And all the people shall say— Amen.
content_old: 18 Cursed be he that causeth the blind to wander in the way. And all the people shall say— Amen.

content: 19 Cursed be he that perverteth the right of the sojourner､ the fatherless､ or the widow. And all the people shall say— Amen.
content_old: 19 Cursed be he that perverteth the right of the sojourner､ the fatherless､ or the widow. And all the people shall say— Amen.

content: 20 Cursed be he that lieth with his father’s wife, because he hath turned aside his father’s coverlet. And all the people shall say— Amen.
content_old: 20 Cursed be he that lieth with his father’s wife, because he hath turned aside his father’s coverlet. And all the people shall say— Amen.

content: 21 Cursed be he that lieth with any beast. And all the people shall say— Amen.
content_old: 21 Cursed be he that lieth with any beast. And all the people shall say— Amen.

content: 22 Cursed be he that lieth with his sister, daughter of his father､ or daughter of his mother. And all the people shall say— Amen.
content_old: 22 Cursed be he that lieth with his sister, daughter of his father､ or daughter of his mother. And all the people shall say— Amen.

content: 23 Cursed be he that lieth with his mother-in-law. And all the people shall say— Amen.
content_old: 23 Cursed be he that lieth with his mother-in-law. And all the people shall say— Amen.

content: 24 Cursed be he that smiteth his neighbour secretly. And all the people shall say— Amen.
content_old: 24 Cursed be he that smiteth his neighbour secretly. And all the people shall say— Amen.

content: 25 Cursed be he that taketh a bribe to shed innocent blood. And all the people shall say— Amen.
content_old: 25 Cursed be he that taketh a bribe to shed innocent blood. And all the people shall say— Amen.

content: 1 And it shall be､ if thou wilt hearken unto the voice of Yahweh thy God, to observe to do all his commandments which I am commanding thee､ to-day then will Yahweh thy God set thee on high, above all the nations of the earth;
